154332222222222221.title: The Big Story

1543322222222222211.content:
You were an aspiring journalist at Vathun University, and worked for the school newspaper, but your editor was getting frustrated with you. Your stories were good, but the material you were finding was lacking and the editor was planning on dropping you, unless you could find a big story to break. It was just luck that you happened to overhear a conversation between your girlfriend's roommate and your girlfriend when you walked up to meet her after class.

"It's totally not fair. He gives the boys better grades, despite some of them being dumb as a stump!" your girlfriend's roommate, Sandy, complained.

"Is there even any way to prove it?" your girlfriend, Erica asked.

"What's going on?" you asked as you walked up to the table they were sitting at in the dining hall.

"Oh hey, Francis!" Erica exclaimed. "We're just talking about Professor Burgess."

"Oh, that's the philosophy professor right?" you asked.

"Yeah." Sandy sighed. "He's a hardass though. And he's a total sexist..."

"Really?" you asked.

"Yeah, I know a few other girls who took his class, and guys who barely showed up got the same grades, or better grades than those girls who showed up and did the work the whole semester." Sandy replied.

"That's horrible!" you remarked.

"Can't prove it though. Plus he's got tenure..." Sandy sighed.

"If only there was some way to show him. I'd say get a guy to write a paper for you, but that'd get you kicked out." Erica said.

That clicked into your brain and you started to get an ingenious idea. One that would solve both these problems with the same stone.

"I think I have a solution to your problem, Sandy." you said.

"Really?" Sandy and Erica asked at the same time. "What is it?"

"Well..." you started.
1543322222222222211.title: School newspaper (College Student)

15433222222222222111.content:
You explained your idea to the two girls who listened with curious attention.

"So I need a big story, and if I can prove that there's discrimination, then I'll be able to keep my spot on the paper." you said.

"And your idea for doing this is... crossdressing?" Erica asked.

"Think about it, a guy can't write Sandy's paper for her because it's plagiarism, but if a guy took the class disguised as a girl and handed in stuff that was written by a guy and was obviously done correctly and well, and we could prove that the grade was given purely out of bias..." you replied.

"It's not a bad idea. And I would like to see Burgess shown for the sexist he is." Sandy admitted. "Though I have no idea how you'd get registered as a girl this late in the semester or how you could even do it in the first place."

"Trust me. If I tell my editor, he'll know what to do. This exposé is too big to pass up." you said.

And you were right. You went to your editor that afternoon and proposed the story.

"That... is... brilliant!" your editor, Seth, exclaimed. "A sexist professor exposed in our paper! We break the story first! We'll have to wait a few months after you start taking the class but... I love it."

"And I can register into the class in the middle or do we have to wait?" you asked.

"I have some favors owed to me in the admissions department. I can get you credentials. Could probably get you placed in a female dorm too, but we need to make sure that you can pull it off. Do you have what you need?" Seth replied.

"My girlfriend should. Her and her roommate promised to help if you approved the story." you said.

"It's not only approved, but it might change this campus forever. See how you look and send me some pics so I can get an ID made up." Seth beamed. "This is the story of the century, Frankie."

You left Seth's office and headed down to Erica and Sandy's dorm. You knocked on the door, with Erica opening it.

"So...?" she asked.

"He approved it. We're good to go as long as I can pull it off." you replied.

"Then it's time for us to get to work." Sandy said, pulling out a chair from in front of her vanity.
15433222222222222111.title: Your idea

154332222222222221111.content:
"So what are you going to do?" you asked, as you sat down in the chair.

"Well, in order for this to work, you have to look and act radically different. We can't have someone you know out you in front of everyone and blow the entire disguise." Sandy said.

"Our plan is to radically change your hair color, put extensions in, obviously makeup and prosthetics for your chest and groin, and then we have to teach you how to act like a girl, and a specific type of girl, so no one will suspect anything." Erica said.

"Sounds like a plan..." you said, nervously as Sandy draped a cape over your shoulders.

"Say, how are you going to just miss all your other classes? Cause you'll have to live like this 24/7, right?" Sandy asked.

"That's what Seth said, and he said he'd take care of everything. He really likes the story..." you replied.

"Where are you even going to live?" Sandy asked.

"Seth's figuring it out I guess." you replied.

"Okay, let's get to work." Sandy said. "Your hair is black, so if we want radical change, we've gotta go all the way, bleach it all the way to blonde and then add matching extensions."

"Blonde?" you asked.

"Trust me, it'll be cute." Erica replied.

"Right, I trust you..." you sighed. "Let's get to work."

154332222222222223111.content:
When Simon jumped in, the door closed behind him. Suddenly, he heard a robotic voice: “Greetings user, I am BeautyPod. For the first step towards beautification, choose a hair style.”
Simon looked up and saw two large screens, one showing long wavy purple hair that goes down to the upper edge of the butt, the other showing short blonde hair going down to the lower neck.
154332222222222223111.title: Jump into the BeautyPod

1543322222222222231111.content:
Simon was now confused:” What was that about purple hair?” The BeautyPod buzzed and said in its monotone voice: “Option selected”.
Then, a large tube-like thing extended from the TOP and enveloped Simon’s head. Before he could panic, two robotic hands reached out and grabbed his arms. “For procedure to be successful, user has to remain still.”
After a few minutes, the tube-like mechanism was withdrawn. Long, wavy purple locks of hair descended almost gracefully down Simon’s back. He noticed that there was a small bun on the top right side of his feminized hair.
“Prepare for the final inclusion” A slot opened and out came a large pink bow held by a robotic limb. A moment later, Simon has a new pink bow to go with his purple hair.
1543322222222222231111.title: Long purple hair

15433222222222222311111.content:
“Cameras indicate a slight amount of hair at the user’s leg area. Proceeding with removal.”
Simon couldn’t do much as the machine extended two tubes and ejected a strange white liquid. After some robotic arms rubbed them all over his legs, Simon’s legs were as clean-shaven as a model’s
15433222222222222311111.title: Skirt

154332222222222223111111.content:
After a few minutes, the BeautyPod lifted Simon in the air and carried him down through a white shirt with black linings, pink stripes on the upper area and a pink bow pattern on the lower area.
Simon also felt his feet stepping into something. He looked down and saw new pink heels on his feet.
154332222222222223111111.title: Synthetic breast forms

154332222222222223111112.content:
After a few minutes, the BeautyPod lifted Simon in the air and carried him down through a white shirt with black linings, pink stripes on the upper area and a pink bow pattern on the lower area.
Simon also felt his feet stepping into something. He looked down and saw new pink heels on his feet.
154332222222222223111112.title: Heels

1543322222222222231111121.content:
Just then, a camera came out and appeared to look at Simon’s chest. Somewhat embarrassed him tried to cover his chest but with his arms held, he couldn’t.
The BeautyPod’s voice then stated: “Significant lack of breasts detected, proceeding with aid.”
Several arms came out of the machine, holding two breast forms as well as a weird strap. Simon could do nothing but watch as the machine wrapped the strap around him and then applied the C-cup breast forms on. Then, a rod from the machine poked a breast, somehow causing Simon to yelp.
“Test successful, user can feel stimuli via synthetic breast forms.”
1543322222222222231111121.title: Synthetic breasts

1543322222222222231112.content:
Simon was now confused:” Why would I want my hair to be blonde?” The BeautyPod buzzed and said in its monotone voice: “Option selected”.
Then, a large tube-like thing extended from the TOP and enveloped Simon’s head. Before he could panic, two robotic hands reached out and grabbed his arms. “For procedure to be successful, user has to remain still.”
After a few minutes, the tube-like mechanism was withdrawn. Simon now had a cute little hairdo, he stared at the mirror provided by the machine, looking at his now-feminine blonde hairdo while the lower area of his neck was tickled by the extended style.
1543322222222222231112.title: Short blonde hair

15433222222222222311122.content:
Just then, the BeautyPod said: “Prepare for clothing.”
Several slots opened and arms came out to hold Simon’s arms up. The boy looked up and saw something descending. He covered his eyes in fear, only to feel something slot over him snugly. He opened his eyes to find a red dress over him. Simon gingerly moves his legs in his new checked skirt.
View dress here: https://m.aliexpress.com/item/761361515....
15433222222222222311122.title: Dress

choices: Simon waits to be sure he is alone
Simon slips out before anyone else can show up
154332222222222223112.content:
Fearing the approaching footsteps, Simon ran past the BeautyPod, sliding behind the back of a nearby door. The footsteps drew nearer.

Holding his breath, Simon realized the steps were those of a pair of high heels. Peeking around the corner slightly, he saw a young woman, only around 25 or so, go by. She was dressed in a stereotypical Hawaiian style, with a bikini and pareo but wore a pair of high heeled sandals with them.

Come to think of it...there was supposed to be a Hawaiian bar of some sort here. Was she a waitress? Were they still open this late?

Simon decided against questioning it.
154332222222222223112.title: Something else

choices: The control panel! He was hiding in the BeautyPod!
1543322222222222231122.content:
Content with the passing girl, Simon emerged from his hiding place.

Ok...what now? Surely a place as big as this has plenty of places to hide-

“Good evening, Natasha. On your way to your shift?”

The sudden gruff voice caught Simon off guard. He quickly scurried behind the nearest door.

“Yeah, Bradley. The Tiki Lounge is doing a late night special event. Celebrating the boss’s grandson’s birthday. Fireworks, cake, the whole shabang.” A female voice replied.

“Ah, right. Well, be careful. I thought I saw someone or something scamper this way. Did you see anything?”

Simon held his breath.

“Nope. Maybe you’re just seeing things. Unless is one of the temp waitresses. Boss did say he was hiring a couple for tonight.”

“Maybe...well, Natasha, have a good night!”

Simon waited until the sounds of both had really gone for good.

He sighed in relief. He raised his hand, bumping something on the way to the door handle.
1543322222222222231122.title: Simon slips out before anyone else can show up

choices: Too late the BeautyPod gets to work
15433222222222222311222.content:
Simon froze as the room suddenly started to make low humming sounds. What the heck?

“BeautyPod activated. After-hours mode, engaged.” An automated voice seemed to come from the ceiling. “Employee state your name.”

Simon froze. On one hand he didn’t want to risk getting caught, on the other if he didn’t answer the machine might trigger some kind of alarm!

“S-Simon?” He said nervously.

The room went quiet. He didn’t dare breathe.

“Name found from list of temporary potential hires. Thank you for your patience. Welcome, Simone.”

Simon froze. “Wait...what?”
15433222222222222311222.title: The control panel! He was hiding in the BeautyPod!

choices: It’s the guard (Pretend to be a waitress)
It’s Natasha, looking for a waitress who didn’t show
154332222222222223112222.content:
“Preparing for cleansing. Removing clothes and depositing into laundry.”

Simon suddenly had his arms pulled upward as mechanical arms pulled at the sleeves of his shirt. At the same time, his legs were being removed of his pants, shoes, and even underwear. The machine pulled his loose short ponytail free, the hair tie caught up in his shirt as they, along with the rest of his clothes disappeared down a suddenly appearing chute. He stood feeling exposed even in the soft lighting of the pod, grateful there was no way someone could see inside.

“Beginning cleaning. Please remain still.”

Simon was suddenly held in place by clamps as an arm with a razor and another with some sort of nozzle approached him. There was nothing he could do as the nozzle sprayed shaving cream over him and the razor left him hairless everywhere below what was on his head. That included a rather tense moment with his crotch but luckily the machine only shave it clear of hair.

Simon breathed in relief at that at least.

“Cleaning initiated.” The machine said as another nozzle appeared, spraying him with warm water.

Through the torrent, pleasant though it was, he could smell feminine, flowery shampoo and soap go all over his hair and body. Admittedly, it felt pretty good and Simon almost forgot what was happening.

“Cleaning complete, beginning drying and preparing clothing.”

“Drying? And what was that about clo-“

WHOOOOOOOOOSH!

A warm current suddenly filled the room, cutting him off and slowly evaporating all the water from the room and even Simon’ hair, leaving the blond locks wavy on his shoulders.

“Clothing process initiated.”

“Ok now wait a-“

Simon was cut off again as a pink bikini bottom suddenly pulled up onto his legs and tightened up to his crotch, compressing his privates flat. The clamps had gently lifted him off the ground as a matching bikini top with a gold hoop connector latched around his chest, the padding around the chest giving the impression of small breasts. A white pareo wrapped around his hips, leaving much of his shaven leg slightly exposed as a pair of black high heeled sandals were slipped onto his feet.

“Whoa whoa whoa!” Simon tried to struggle but the bonds held tight as a pair of golden bangles were put on his right hand and a necklace with a seashell was placed around his neck.

“Finishing touches initiated.”

“Finishing...? What else can you d-“

The tube of red lipstick hit his lips, stopping his question. It rounded them over a few times, making the look inviting. Eyeliner and mascara were applied, and a small pop in each ear left small gold hoops in each.

The machine finally lowered him to the ground, tucking a pink flower into his hair.

“Process complete. Enjoy your day, Simone.” The machine spoke one last time before leaving Simon alone with his distinctly feminine reflection.

He...he looked like a young woman! A lot like the one from before!

He stood in shock for a second, staring blankly at his reflection in disbelief when a knock at the door made him yelp quietly.

“Hello? Who’s in there? It should only be employees only...”
154332222222222223112222.title: Too late the BeautyPod gets to work

1543322222222222231122221.content:
Simon turned from side to side, frantically looking for a place to hide, and other than back in the BeautyPod, which he wasn't eager to re-enter, for obvious reasons, his options were extremely limited.

"That's it! I'm coming in!" the guard shouted and pushed open the door.

Simon flinched and prepared for the guard to grab him, but nothing happened. Simon opened his eyes to see the guard eyeing him up and down, but not in the way he expected.

"Sorry about that, miss." the guard scratched the back of his head and readjusted his cap. "It's just that, if you don't tell me the room's occupied, then I've gotta come in to investigate. Part of the job."

Simon stood still, slightly shaking, and just smiled and shrugged.

"You must be one of the temps, look at that, Natasha was right..." the guard chuckled. "Well, the Tiki Bar is that way."

The guard pointed out the door and down the hall.

"If you get lost, try and find me, and I'd be glad to give you the tour." the guard said, before exiting the room and resuming his rounds.

"Phew." Simon said. "I didn't think the disguise was that good, but..."

On the one hand, Simon should try to get his clothes back, or at least try to get into something a tad more masculine... but on the other hand, this get-up guaranteed that Simon could walk the grounds without being caught, which seemed a far better option than dodging the guards like he had been doing. Plus, he had no guarantee how the BeautyPod would react if he went in twice.

Simon decided to...
1543322222222222231122221.title: It’s the guard (Pretend to be a waitress)

15433222222222222311222212.content:
Getting back into the pod was clearly not gonna happen, plus Simon had to get out of that room, in case anyone else came poking around. Walking in his new heeled sandals was tough, but after a few steps around the room, Simon was satisfied with his ability to walk. He was far less thrilled with all the new drafts and strange feelings that he was dealing with, given his state of dress. Still, escape was on his mind.

"I bet I can get into the kitchen wearing this, and get something to eat..." Simon said, slowly walking into the hallway as he noted his hunger.

Simon noted where the guard had gone, and decided against heading that way, just in case. Besides, the Tiki Bar was probably near the kitchen anyway.

As he strolled down the hallway, Simon expected to be caught any second, but even when he passed people in the hall, employees, customers, no one batted an eye at the tropical waitress they saw. Following the scent of food, Simon eventually ended up near a kitchen, spotting men and women, both dressed with a similar island theme, carrying trays outside, towards the Tiki Bar.

"This is it..." Simon thought to himself. "Go in, grab some grub, and find a place I can take this off and get new clothes."

As Simon approached the kitchen door, however, the door to the outside swung open, revealing...
15433222222222222311222212.title: Wander around the hotel

choices: The Hula dancers need another girl
154332222222222223112222121.content:
“Let’s see l, table four still- oh!” Natasha looked directly at Simon, but instead of suspicion like he expected, relief appeared on her face.

Natasha smiled taking Simon by the wrist. “Great! Hey, Joey! Another temp just showed up!” She shouted back into the kitchen pulling Simon along with her.

The chef, a large beefy man with tan skin and dark hair, smiled wide and earnest. “Oh, that’s good! And she’s a real cutie to boot. What’s your name, love?”

Simon found his voice caught in his throat. “Umm...”

Natasha flipped over the clipboard in her hand. “Easy, Joey, don’t put her on the spot...Let’s see...Mandy?”

Simon nervously shook his head.

“Simone?” Natasha looked back up.

Well...it had both gotten him into this mess and it wasn’t like anyone here would know how similar it was to his real name... Simon nodded.

“Ok, great. We thought you weren’t gonna show...” Natasha wrote something down on the clipboard before turning back to Simon, or rather as she thought, Simone.

“Ok, Simone... we could use your help right now with...”
154332222222222223112222121.title: Natasha

1543322222222222231122221211.content:
"Waiting tables!" Natasha finished as she checked the clipboard. "Joey, give her the tray for table four."

"Got it!" Joey replied, placing plates of food onto a tray.

"And you'll need one of these." Natasha handed Simon a notepad and pencil. "Food orders are already in, so just take any drink orders you get over to the bar."

"Here's table four," Joey handed the now full tray to Simon.

Simon struggled with the heavy wooden tray, being untrained in the typical movements of a waitress.

"Now jump to it!" Joey lightly smacked Simon's ass, causing Simon to involuntarily yelp in response.

Simon blushed and quickly shuffled out of the room, glancing at the tag attached to the side of the tray, thankful that it contained a chart of where each table was located, and who at what table had ordered what.

As he served, Simon heard a few comments, likely intended to be too quiet for him to hear regarding his looks, and quickly finished up before looking around for Natasha, who was busy speaking with the occupants of Table One.

"Might be a good time to head out..." Simon muttered as he started walking towards the door back into the hotel proper.

"Excuse me, miss?" a voice asked, tapping Simon on the shoulder.

Simon turned to see a man that he remembered being seated at one of the other tables. He had seemed to have been scrutinizing Simon for some reason.

"Yes?" Simon squeaked, worried that he was found out.

"We need another round of drinks. Two banana daiquiris, three Bahama Mamas and a draft." the man motioned to the table he had been seated at, where the occupants had empty glasses.

"Of course." Simon quickly jotted down what he had said and rushed over to the bar, handing the order to the bartender.

"You know you'll save a lot of time if you shorthand it. Lemme guess, temp?" the bartender asked as he started mixing the drinks.

"How'd you guess?" Simon chuckled weakly.

"Ah, hold one, we're out of something. I'll be right back." the bartender quickly rushed towards the kitchen.

As Simon waited, he was tapped on the shoulder once more.

"The bartender's making the drinks as fast as he can!" Simon snapped as he turned around, realizing it wasn't the man from before, but instead...
1543322222222222231122221211.title: Serving tables

choices: “You to join me for a moment?”
“Ask Natasha to assign you to my table?”
15433222222222222311222212112.content:
Simon felt his face go flush as he realized this wasn’t the man from before. The young man looked to be about his age, however very well dressed and with jet black hair slicked back into a short ponytail.

To Simon’s surprise, the boy also blushed. “Oh, sorry! I didn’t mean to startle you. Father never did introduce me to all the waitresses.” He cleared his throat and gently took Simon’s hand, kissing the top of it. “I’m Raphael. My father is the bar owner.”

Feeling trapped, Simon could only smile weakly. “S-Simone...” he replied softly, remembering his alias.

“Ah, Simone...how lovely.” Raphael smiled in return. “Now, pray, I could I ask for...”
15433222222222222311222212112.title: A young man (from Table One)

choices: Magister takes Simon to the restaurant
15433222222222222312.content:
Simon was waiting in the storage box hoping to find an opening to let himself out. He wasn’t really sure where to go once he was free but he hoped he might be able to pick up a job or find a place to sleep.

However he suddenly heard the footsteps of two large sounded men as they were moving boxes from the truck. Simon began to sweat as they grabbed his box and began moving him inside the hotel.

“Damn...this one is heavy!” A large sounded male voice said.

“Yeah...you think they put extra stuff in it?” Another large sounding voice said.

The two large men carried the box inside the hotel grunting as they finally set it down. Another set of footsteps approached them as Simon heard another male voice speak up. This one was softer and a little bit effeminate. He seemed to speak in a rather thick accent. Simon guessed British but he wasn’t positive.

“Hammer! Truck! What have I said about leaning on the boxes! What are you two oversized gorillas complaining about this time?” The new voice said in a really prickly tone.

“We’re sorry boss. This one is extra heavy!” One of the large voices said. By the sound of their tone and speech patterns Simon guessed the big guys were not too bright.

“Sometimes I wonder with all those muscles why you can’t use the only one that counts....” The little voice said with a loud sigh...

“You see these marks...The nails removed...This box was opened after sealing you idiots! Now open it!” The little voice said shrilly.

The two large guys ripped open the lid to the box as they saw their surprise stowaway inside...

Simon looked up and saw three men staring down at him. Two were huge muscle masses. Both wearing black t shirts and black pants and both had shaved heads. Their name badges said Hammer and Truck and when they turned around the word Security was written in silver on their backs.

The other man was much thinner and smaller. He was dressed in a very fine looking suit that was covered in a strange floral pattern. He had long silver hair that was done in a very fancy looking wrap. His fingernails were also painted black and even carried a walking stick with him that had an odd looking skull at the top of it.

“Well...well...what do we have here?” The thin man said.

“He’s a stowaway Boss!” Hammer said as the thin man suddenly smacked him on the head with his walking stick.

“I know that...you idiot...I was being sarcastic...” He said face palming himself.

Truck reached down and grabbed Simon like he weighed nothing. Pulling him outside of the box and standing him upright.

“Explain yourself whelp!” Truck said as the thin man held up hid hand.

“I’ll ask the questions boys....just be good apes and stand there silent for me.” He said putting his arm around Simon.

“I’m so sorry....Please let me introduce myself. My name is Magister. I supervise all the staff here at the Grand Hotel. Now...By your tattered clothes and appearance I’m guessing your runaway correct?” He asked Simon.

Simon took a deep breath as he nodded. “Yeah...I’m sorry I...I just couldn’t be at home any longer and....” Simon said before Magister interrupted him.

“Say no more! Please don’t bother trying to bore me with your backstory. Nothing personal I just really really don’t care...Now...tell me...what was your plan here? You barely look old enough to vote. I can’t imagine you planned on stealing from us did you?” Magister asked.

“No! No I’m not a thief! Honestly I’m looking for a job. I was hoping to kind of...start over. Do you need any bus boys or dishwashers?” Simon asked.

“Ahh...I see...you would be shocked if I told you how many young guys like you I’ve seen over the years. Well I hate to disappoint you but unfortunately I’m not looking for anyone like you at the moment.” Magister said.

“Please! I’ll do anything! Any job! I don’t care how messy it is!” Simon said.

“Anything? Well...I am aware of an opening at one of restaurants here in the hotel. It’s called The Secret Garden. The manager Gaia might be willing to bright you on but I’m telling you she is a hard lady to impress.” Magister said stroking his chin.

“Please I’ll do whatever she wants no worries!” Simon said showing a lot of enthusiasm.

“Well...if you are sure.” Magister said as he took Simon by the hand and began walking him through The Grand Hotel.

Simon was even more impressed with how amazing the hotel looked on the inside. The luxurious design was matched only by the wild and fantastic decor everywhere.

“The Grand Hotel is one of the finest resorts in the world. We own this private island we are on. We have our own casino, restaurants, shopping centers, pools, spa, and even a golf course and racing track. Pretty much if you can imagine it, we have it.” Magister said showing off the opulence of the Grand Hotel.

“This truly seems like a magical place...”Simon said a bit overwhelmed.

“You have no idea...” Magister said with a smile.
15433222222222222312.title: Simon is discovered by hotel staff

154332222222222223121.content:
On the elevator ride up to the shopping district Magister spoke a little to Simon.

“We cater to those with all sorts of wild desires. The more they pay the more we go out of our way to make their dreams come true. We do whatever it takes to maintain our reputation and most importantly our customers privacy.” Magister said as they took an elevator up several stores.

Magister took Simon up to the shopping district of the hotel as Simon was shocked at how big it was. Like an indoor shopping mall inside the hotel. Shops of types lined up next to each other as Simon was taken to a very Fancy looking restaurant.

Simon looked up to the sign “Eden, The Secret Garden.”

Inside was beyond anything Simon could imagine as a restaurant. It was covered with exotic looking plants and flowers to give it a real garden decor. There was also a live band playing classical music and even a waterfall they led down to a secret pool. The servers were all beautiful girls who all seemed to be wearing some kind of exotic floral clothing.

Magister took Simon inside as they went into kitchens were Simon saw many chefs all cooking really fancy looking meals.

They continued back until they reached an office. Knocking on the door a very strange looking woman opened the door. Her hair was braided into long dreadlocks. She had flowers all throughout her hair. She was dark and thick glasses and wore a tank top and mini skirt. Her arms and legs were also covered in tattoos. Most of which seemed to be flowers of some kind. She had large rings on almost every finger and even her toes as she was barefoot in her own office.

“Magister.....How many times have I got to tell you to stop bribing your gutter rats here.” She said putting out a cigarette and blowing the smoke at him.

Coughing a bit Magister smiled and tried to save face. “Gaia! It’s wonderful to see you too! Please let me introduce....oh...wow...this is embarrassing I never asked your name.” Magister said looking to Simon.

“It’s...Simon...Simon Green.” He said reaching out to Shake Gaia’s hand only to get a cold stare back.

“The answer is no Magister. The last little rat you sent me ran off remember!” Gaia said frustrated.

“Please Gaia, that was so long ago! She never wanted to be here anyway. She was just paying off someone else’s debt. Simon here came to us. He wants a job. A fresh start right?” Magister said looking to Simon.

“Yes Ma’am. Whatever you need. Dishes, wiping tables. I’m in for it.” Simon said.

“You here that energy! He’s going to be great!” Magister said with smile.

Gaia looked Simon up and down and sat back in her chair.

“You ever serve tables before kid?” She asked Simon.

“Yes ma’am. My mother owns a restaurant. I started working there when I was 15.” Simon said.

“Really? Well....Maybe...” Gaia said thinking for a moment.

“Fine...I’ll write up a contact. However if he breaks it I’m coming for you both!” Gaia said giving Magister a stern look.

Magister smiled and took his leave as Gaia reached into her desk and pulled out a large stack of papers.

“So...did Magister explain everything about this place to you?” Gaia asked.

“Well...sorta. He said you did special things for your customers and this was a magical place where dreams come true.” Simon said.

“This ain’t Disneyland kid...This is serious business. My top server Rose. She left us awhile ago and filling her spot had been a real pain. You will be taking her spot you understand? Now with working here comes some privileges but also debt...” Gaia said.

“Debt? What kind?” Simon asked.

“The kind you have to work off. You are given a free room, food, and clothing. All that must be paid off before you can voluntarily exit your employment contract, understand? You sign this and you are stuck with me for at least a year.” Gaia said.

“That’s totally fine I was hoping to stay much longer.” Simon said.

“That’s what they all say...Now...If you want to join the garden and become one of my flowers, sign here.” Gaia said handing him the contract.

Simon thought that sounded a bit weird but it was probably just the name the servers got with the whole garden decor...
154332222222222223121.title: Magister takes Simon to the restaurant

1543322222222222231211.content:
Gaia slid over the contract to Simon who looked over all the words on it not really making any sense of it. Like any contract is was wording so deeply that only someone really committed could have any hope to make sense of it. Simon didn’t think twice about it anyways. He was simply excited to get to work.

Gaia handed a long green pen. It looked like the branch of flower, it was even covered in thorns. Simon took it carefully as he tried to sign his name but no ink came out for some reason...

“Uhh...it’s not working.” He said confused.

“You have to prick your finger on a thorn. Trust me...” Gaia said with a smile.

A bit confused Simon touched one of the thorns as he felt a small singe pain as he noticed his finger was bleeding. The pen suddenly felt a bit heavier right afterwards as he began to sign his name again. This time however blood red ink seemed to come out perfectly as he signed his name. As he did he even noticed the small prick on his finger disappeared...

Satisfied Gaia took the contract and pen back. She rolled up the contract and put it away in a safe near her desk. Meanwhile Simon was still looking at his finger confused as to how that pen worked.

“Welcome to the garden...Rose.” She said with a smile.

“Uhh...thank you.” Simon said a bit confused. She was committed to this whole flower thing wasn’t she? He thought to himself.

“Now follow me. It’s time for the ceremony and to introduce you to the other flowers. Once the ceremony is complete I will have one of those brainless ogres Magister uses for security show you up to your new room. Training begins first thing tomorrow, understand?” She said looking back to him with a stern look.

“Yes ma’am...” Simon said a bit nervous.

Gaia took Simon farther back as they reached a large black door that had the heading “Dressing Room” on it.

Opening the door Gaia took Simon inside which as suggested seemed to be a large dressing room. There were wardrobes and mirrors, makeup and almost anything a woman would need to make herself look as beautiful as possible.

When they reached the center of the room however Simon suddenly froze as he began to blush. Sitting at each of their respective wardrobes was a beautiful girl. Engraved in each of the wardrobes was a name that seemed to match the flower that were named after.

(Iris, Marigold, Daisy, Jasmine, Lily, and finally the empty wardrobe which had the name Rose, written on it.)

Normally seeing a bunch of girls would make most young men nervous but what made Simon truly blush was each of the girls was totally naked....They didn’t seem to care or mind either. They were busy chatting and hanging out when Gaia and Simon entered and they suddenly fell dead silent...

Each of the girls sitting at the wardrobe was stunningly beautiful in their own way. Each of them had a very unique and distinctive appearance that helped them stand out. From their race, hair, body style, etc, each one of them was special. The only thing they seemed to have in common was each of them had a similar looking lower back tattoo. The tattoo for each of them was similar in design. It was the flower they were named after surrounded by thorny branches in a beautiful yet almost sad looking design.

“Flowers welcome! I come with wonderful news! We finally found our new Rose!” Gaia said clapping as the other girls joined in.

“Uhh...Hi...” Simon said waving as he still felt a bit embarrassed around all these naked ladies.

“You sure about this Mother Gaia? He doesn’t look ready for such a heavy task.” One of the girls said speaking up.

Simon saw it was Iris. She seemed to be Asian, probably Japanese by what he could tell.

“Now now..:We all know better...None of you were any different from this Rose at one point.” Gaia said.

“Umm...Miss Gaia...My name is Sii....Rose....My name is Sssss....Rose....My....Name....is....Simmm........Rose.” Simon kept saying.

No matter how hard he tried Simon couldn’t say his name for some reason. It was like his mouth wouldn’t let him. Every time he tried to say his name he could only say it was Rose...

“What’s wrong with me? Why can’t I say my name?” Simon said getting a bit scared.

“Oh she’s starting to get scared! That’s so cute!” One of girls said.

“You gave up that name. You are now Rose. One of the flower girls of Eden. Trained in the art of lust and seduction.” Gaia said with smile.

“I’m a guy though! I thought I was gonna be like a dishwasher?” Simon said backing up slowly.

“Please...I would never waste a soul contract on something so trivial...You are one of my girls now...so...shall we begin the ritual?” Gaia said looking to the other girls as they began to stab up and form a circle taking each other by the hand.

Simon now terrified tried to back away and run but the door outside was locked and wouldn’t budge.

All the girls began to form as circle as they began to recite a strange chant.

“Plant the Seed, Blossom and be reborn. Plant the seed, blossom and be reborn.”

These words they began to chant over and over again.

Rob guided the beautiful woman on his arm to an awaiting carriage that took them on a slow ride to a secluded scenic beach setting. An picnic laid out out with care. An assortment of fine cheeses and meats all carefully sliced for ease. Chilled champagne strawberries dipped in chocolate with whipped cream for dessert. Rob talked of his work and home vividly describing them to Rose who intently listened. She constructed an image of him that painted a portrait of a man who threw himself into his work. Finding only recently that money lacked the luster that it once shown him. Not that he disliked it for it brought him to Rose. A kismet meeting that continued to bring him joy. She blushed at the compliment.

Rob attempted to push for details on her. She found deception to him abhorrent. Telling the truth to the best of her ability, “There isn’t much to tell. I came here as I had no where else to go. My family gone and not many prospects for me. Signing a contract here transformed my life immensely. This place strikes me as having a dark underbelly. I would love to break the contract but I fear the consequences. The greatest perk is meeting you but I sadly anticipate your eventual departure. My plan is to enjoy our brief time together and not think on that.”

Rob’s arm wrapped about Rose tightening the distance between them. He said, “I lament our possible parting as well but I hope to be close for our time together.” Lifting her chin up to taste of her lips. They laid on the blanket petting each other locking lips and figures together. Rob positioned himself atop her as she lay back eagerly taking in all his attentions.

Rose parted her thighs as her legs worked to encircle her man. Her hands broke from him briefly to shimmy off the top of her dress exposing her breasts for him. His right hand took hold of the breast fingers stimulating her stiff nipples. Rose hooking her fingers beneath her panties sliding them across her silky soft thighs. Then she released his engorged manhood aching to nest inside Rose. They passionately connected till their stamina ran out. Rose safe and warm in his arms they drifted off to sleep together.

Waking they took a few minutes to straighten their clothing before calling for a carriage. Rob took the opportunity to hand feed Rose a couple strawberries dipping them in the whipped cream. Wiping stray cream from her lip. She took the chance to suck on his finger. Helping Rose into the carriage and snuggled up to her. They continued back too Rob’s room for intimate evening continuing the picnic activities and beyond.

1543322222222222232.content: Mom’s Secret Job- A young man has no idea what he his mother does for a living. She seems to be very secretive of her work. One he sneaks in and finds out she manages a very exclusive and private brothel. When he is discovered he is forced to pay the price for his intrusion...
1543322222222222232.title: Something else

15433222222222222321.content:
Andrew Wilson was tucked quietly into the back of his mother’s trunk in her nice SUV. The time had finally come for him to find out what she had been hiding all these years.

For years it was always just Andy and his mom Lauren. He never knew his dad, all he knew was his name was Thomas and he took off when Andy was a baby.

Andy grew up quite privileged compared to most kids his age. He lived in an upscale apartment in the heart of the city and even had a maid who cleaned and helped babysit him when he was young.

Andy was a good kid and smart student. He had friends, played racquet sports and loved running in track. He had just turned 16 a couple months ago and was thinking about asking out this girl Serena from school.

All this aside there was something always bothering him...His mother. Her job was a total mystery to him. She worked long hours, sometimes all night. He hardly ever saw her and when he did she would hardly pay attention to him.

Multiple times of the years he tried to understand her work and why it had to be secret. For years he thought she was CIA or some secret government. However that seemed unlikely because his mom always hated the law and would do nothing but complain every tax season or election.

This morning however had been the straw that broke the camels back. He was tasked with writing an essay for an English class about one of his parents careers. When she refused again to give him anything Andy blew up and a huge argument ensued.

“One day you will understand...Not until you are older!” Lauren screamed as she took her keys and slammed the door behind her.

Andy had enough...He took the stairs using his stamina to raise the elevator and beat his mom to the parking garage. Using his emergency key he let himself in the SUV and hid away in the trunk concealed by the spare clothes his mom left in her car.

As his mom drove away Andy had his smart phone with him and planned on taking pictures to finally get his answers. He was tired of all the lies and deception.

About 30 minutes passed in the car before it finally stopped. He heard his mom exit the Car, her heels clicking on the concrete as she left.

Andy waited for another 15 minutes to pass before he got out of the trunk.

He saw he was in another parking garage. Unfamiliar with the building he looked around for a logo but found nothing. In fact the only thing he could find was a single elevator.

Going to the elevator he opened it and saw no floor buttons...Just a single button that was a down arrow. There wasn’t even an emergency system or anything else.

A bit nervous Andy pressed the button. The elevator closed as he felt the elevator going down.

“The garage he was in seemed like it was already ground level. Was this place underground?” He thought to himself.

About a minute passed before elevator opened.

Immediately Andy’s eyes were assaulted by a deep heavy red light and loud music. It took him a second to adjust as he realized he was the entrance to some kind of club...

He followed the loud techno style music and bright red lights that lit up the place. This reminded him of movies where the hero must infiltrate the evil club owned by the main villain.

He finally saw a name of something when he came around the corner. Above him was a name.

“The Devil’s Den.”

Andy could hear footsteps behind him as Andy hid in a dark corner out of the lights to stay hidden.

Approaching him from behind were two wealthy men probably mid to early 30’s. They were wearing nice suits and obviously had money.

“Trust me, the girls here are out of this world...They aren’t your typical hookers, these are classy and seriously worth it.” One of the guys said to his partner.

“If you say so. For the price and reputation this place has it better be worth it.” The other said a bit skeptical.

Andy followed the two men down the hall until they reached a podium with a young woman standing behind it. She was very pretty, probably early 20’s and dressed in all black. Her skin was milky white and her hair jet black along with her fingernails and toes which were pointed, and even her lipstick was black.

“Welcome gentlemen, I am Shade. Servant to the Madame. I see your appointment here. Would you like to head to our club and bar first? Or would you like to be brought straight to the girls?” She asked them.

“Wow...they are serious here?” One of the guys said.

“Like I said...all professional...” His friend said.

“Let’s skip the party, show us the ladies.” One of the guys said.

Shade gestured the gentleman to her left, to her right Andy could tell led to the source of the loud music and lights, which seemed to be a dance club of sorts.

To her left however was a spiral staircase that headed down. Shade led the gentlemen down and down. Not realizing Andy was right behind them tagging along. He had to see this.

The music grew quiet as they came to a large and very former looking room. It had large couches, a large fireplace behind glass. A very elegant and nice looking room replaced the high tech bar above.

Andy almost froze however when he saw who was greeting them...It was his mom....only...he barely recognized her.

She was dressed not in her typical suit but an elegant black dress. Her hair and makeup were all done. She looked like she belonged at a fancy party. She was even holding a glass of red wine.

“Welcome gentlemen...I am the Madame of the Devil’s Den. I protect my girls and this establishment. I know your time is valuable so I will be quick. Here we have three rules...Plain and simple....

Rule one. No violence, spanking, bondage, and rough play are all welcome but no closed fists. Any bruises left on girls will lead to your exile from here.

Rule two. No Freebies. This is a place of business. You pay for your visits and time EVERY TIME, no exceptions. We have no loyalty program or discounts here.

Finally Rule three....No love...This is a brothel, not a dating website. I don’t care how much you like a particular girl this is her job and you are her client. If I catch any hint of asking one of them to leave with you that’s it for you...

Any questions?” Andy’s mom said to the gentlemen.

Neither of the men had questions as Madam Lauren snapped her fingers as the door behind her opened up.

Coming out of the door were several woman that had to be the sexiest Andy had ever seen. They were each unique in their appearance but each one more beautiful than the last.

It was here that Andy really began to see this place for what it was. Some kind of high end and probably illegal club and brothel.

Very slowly Andy raised his phone up to take a picture of the girls as he hid at top of the stairs when suddenly...
15433222222222222321.title: Sounds good

15433223.content:
Ever since you were a kid, you wanted to follow in the footsteps of your family. Your parents had met at the same university that your father's father, and his father had attended, all being part of the same fraternity, Kappa Alpha Delta. You were now attending the same university, even carrying on the legacy of the name, that you shared with your great grandfather, grandfather and father, Sidney Hadley IV. Though you usually went by Sid, because it was easier. Your first and to you, only mission on campus was to pledge KAΔ, everything else be damned. So that's why you were so crushed when you were given the letter that you had been cut. You immediately went to go confront the fraternity president.

"Sorry, man. We had a lot of people make it through this year, and we had to make cuts." the President said. "Try again next time, kay?"

"But I'm a legacy!" you pleaded.

"That's sort of the problem. Greek life's been getting a bad rap lately, so we sorta want to distance ourselves from the past of the frat. So..." he shrugged.

You stormed out of the frat house. You were beyond mad. This was your one goal for college and it was dashed because other frats were doing stupid hazing stuff? It's not fair!

The next morning you woke up and found that a pink envelope had been passed underneath your door the night before.

"What's that?" your roommate, Evan asked.

"Not sure." you said.

The envelope only had your name on the front in cursive. You opened it up and read it.

"Sid,

I heard what happened at KAΔ. We still think legacies are important. Please see Melanie Simmons at Tau Beta Gamma."

"So...?" Evan asked. "Don't keep me in suspense!"

"I'm not sure. It says that Melanie Simmons wants to see me." you said.

"Melanie Simmons? The president of the Tau Beta Gamma sorority? Wonder what she wants..." Evan said.

"Me too." you said.

You approached the sorority house hesitantly and knocked on the door. When it opened, you were confronted by a bubbly-looking blonde girl.

"...Yes?" she asked.

You held out the envelope.

"Oh! Right this way." she motioned her manicured hand into the house.

You followed her down a hallway, before coming to an office, which she led you into.

"You can take a seat right there." she said.

"Thanks." you said.

After a few moments, another girl, with medium length brown hair walked into the room.

"Hi, Sidney. I'm Melanie." she held out her hand, which you shook. "I'll cut to the chase, since you're probably confused."

"You could say that." you laughed.

"Right, so you're a legacy. Not only on your father's side, though. This sorority hasn't been around nearly as long as the others on campus. This chapter was only founded in the last twenty years. One of it's founding members was Erica Madison." Melanie held out a vintage photo showing several women holding a Tau Beta Gamma banner. And you recognized one of them. "But you probably know her better as Erica Hadley."

"Mom?" you asked, looking at the photo. "I never knew."

"Why would you? It's not like sororities matter to the next heir of Kappa Alpha Delta, right?" Melanie asked. "They made a mistake. Misguided attempt at fixing problems that are beyond their control. I disagree."

"What do you want from me?" you asked.

"I want you, Sidney." Melanie said. "I want you to rush Tau Beta Gamma."

"What?" you asked. You were shocked to hear that. "I'm not a girl! And I don't want to be!"

"That doesn't matter. Gender roles are looser now, and having a legacy would be good for us, and you'd get to keep your title." Melanie said.

"Even if I agreed... no one else would." you said.

"I'll handle that. Now, there is the one small issue that because we've already started pledge season, you'll have to undergo the exact same circumstances as the other girls, for fairness sake, but once you're in, you can dress however you like and we'll figure out how to fit you in for participation in events." Melanie said.

You thought of how much torment it might cause when others got wind. The guy rushing a sorority? You'd be ridiculed...

"I know it's a risk, but this is a moment that can cause change. You can open it up for sororities and frats to be gender neutral, and of course, carry on family tradition." Melanie said.

"I... I'm not sure." you said.

"Think about it. I'll reach out to you tomorrow." Melanie said, handing you a sheet to write down your phone number onto. Which you did.

You went back to your dorm room and explained the problem to Evan.

"This is a tough one." Evan said. "On the one hand, it shouldn't matter, but on the other hand... yeesh."

"Yeah..." you sighed.

That night, you came to your decision.
15433223.title: Greek Legacy

choices: Melanie comes down to instruct you
154332231.content:
You decided to accept the offer. Melanie had given you her phone number to text her if you were in or out.

“Hey this Sid. I’m in.” You texted her as you waited for a reply.

It only took less than a minute before you for your answer.

“Midnight Tonight. Be at the Sorority house. DO NOT be late!” The message said.

The idea of rushing of a Sorority still didn’t sit well with you. However you had to take this chance to live up to your parents Legacy. Besides what other guy could say he lives with a bunch of hot girls? Part of you was excited at what this could lead to.

“Are you sure about this man? Once you do this you can’t back out.” Evan said as you got ready.

“Listen...I know it’s weird but I have to do this. I have a legacy to uphold and the doors this will open to my future could be limitless.” You said as you got dressed.

You walked down to the Sorority house located on the other side of campus. You were trying to act confident as you walked but really deep down you were still very nervous.

When you arrived you saw a sign that said. “Pledges head to the back door.” Along with arrows showing you the way.

There were several girls arriving with you. Around a dozen or so. As you walked to the pledge area most of them looked to you were an odd stare.

“Umm...What are you doing?” One girl asked as she looked to you. She was a very cute redhead with a nice athletic build and figure.

“Umm...I’m pledging. I’m actually a legacy. It’s part of the whole gender equality thing this year.” You said still a bit embarrassed.

“Oh....uh.... I didn’t know that was a thing. If you don’t mind why aren’t you pledging a frat?” She asked again.

“It’s....uh...complicated. This was my only option.” You replied.

“Well I have to admit. It takes guts for a guy to do this. Unless you are a creep or something...” She said with a sarcastic laugh.

You laughed back at her teasing. “No...no. Yeah I am nervous. I think this could be a great adventure though.” You replied.

“Well I guess we will see...I’m Sarah.” She said extending her hand.

“I’m Sidney.” You replied shaking her hand.

You followed the signed which lead to the backyard then to the basement of the frat house. There you and the dozen or so other girls were standing waiting for the next step.
154332231.title: Accept the offer

1543322311.content:
Melanie walked into the room, which was quite large and had a table on the far side of the room that held bundles of something, followed by eleven other girls, presumably other members of the sorority. You were at the end of the line on the left of the room. The girls continued walking until Melanie was face to face with you and the other sisters were face to face with the other pledges.

"Welcome everyone. The next few weeks will decide if you are Tau Beta Gamma material. You've all been assigned a sister who will handle your individual rushing, and will relay messages about the group activities." Melanie said. "Your assigned sister will inform you of the rules and what is to happen during the next few weeks."

All the girls walked to the other side of the room, and picked up a bundle. They returned to their pledges and handed the bundles to them. Melanie handed her's to you.

"This is your assigned apparel. You are to wear this every day for the next few weeks. To class, even if you leave campus." Melanie said. "Barring circumstances of damage beyond your control, you must wear every item in this bundle until you are made a full member. Do you understand?"

"Yes." a chorus of feminine voices and your own rang out in the room.

"All right, now your assigned sisters will fill you in on the rest." Melanie said.

She pulled you aside and into a room off to the side.

"I'm sorry about this Sidney, but it's in the by-laws." Melanie said.

"About what?" you asked.

"Open the bundle." she replied.

You did so, and your face dropped. You were expecting a t-shirt or something like that, maybe it was hot pink. The clothes turned out to be something resembling a school uniform. A white blouse, a blazer with the sorority's crest emblazoned on the right breast, and a pleated skirt.

"You can't be serious." you said.

"I am." Melanie said. "And I'd totally understand if you wanted to drop out now... it's sort of why I didn't tell you. It's a relic from when the sorority was started. A lot of the sororities back then were looser with dress codes, and Tau Beta Gamma wanted to keep a very tight definition of femininity. Back then it was just skirts but it eventually became a whole outfit."

"Can't there be an exception made?" you asked.

"I looked. It says specifically that exceptions are not to be made in the case of legacies. I can propose a change, but it wouldn't be changed until after pledging is over." Melanie replied.

You tossed the idea around in your head. It was only a few weeks, and it's not like it's forever.

"All right." you said.

"Great!" Melanie exclaimed. "We're going to be re-meeting in there in a few minutes after I explain the rules, and the other girls... the girls are dressed in their outfits, you can get dressed in here and I'll wait outside."

You nodded and Melanie walked out. You looked at the clothes and sighed.
1543322311.title: Melanie comes down to instruct you

15433223111.content:
You stripped and put on the outfit. You couldn't see yourself, but you knew you looked ridiculous. The skirt was bunched up, your legs were hairy and You left the room and rejoined the girls, who were all dressed identically to you. A few of the girls snickered when they saw you, but a few looks from their prospective sisters and they quieted down.

Melanie stood before everyone as you and the girls looked at her.

"You are now all officially this year's first group of pledges. And I hope all of you will become full sisters when this is over." Melanie said. "Tomorrow, we will start the pledging activities. We have a certain style here, and you all need to fit it. Tomorrow morning at 9am you will all report here for makeovers, so you'll all look like the Gamma Girls you want to be. See you all tomorrow."

The girls dispersed and you started to leave, before approaching Melanie.

"Does that include me?" you asked.

"Yeah... unfortunately that's another femininity thing, and we're gonna have to treat you like any other girl. The rules are clear on it, but I'll try to see if we can make it easier." Melanie replied.

"Thanks for everything." you said. "I'll try not to let you down."

"Don't worry, just for doing this, you've already exceeded my expectations." Melanie said. "Get some rest, and be ready to be primped and polished."

"Got it..." you sighed and left the basement, heading back to your dorm.

Evan took no time to start ribbing you.

"You've gotta be kidding me!" Evan laughed. "You have to wear that?"

"Until they accept me, yeah." you replied.

"Sid... this might be going too far." Evan said.

"I'm gonna see where this goes." you said. "I'm having doubts but the legacy is important to me."

"Maybe too important..." Evan sighed. "Goodnight."

Evan shut off the light and you changed into your pajamas. (You were only required to wear the uniform during the day) After you hung it up properly, you went off to sleep, dreading the coming morning.
15433223111.title: Get dressed

154332231111.content:
You woke up the next morning to find Evan gone, and a package left on your end-table, from Tau Beta Gamma. You opened it to find a package of panties, and a note from Melanie.

"Thought this might make the skirt fit better. It's not a rule, but it might be more comfortable." the note read.

You thought of how uncomfortable the skirt was all bunched up the previous night and then back to the package...

As you walked over to the Tau Beta Gamma house, you had to admit that the panties were a lot more comfortable with the skirt. After all, it's just a different style of underwear, right? As you approached, you saw Sarah walking down the path and went up to her.

"Hey!" Sarah exclaimed. "I figured you'd have bowed out after the skirt!"

"I'm dedicated to this legacy thing. Being a legacy is all I've ever wanted." you replied.

"I can see that. Think you'll be able to get through the entire week?" Sarah asked

"I hope so." you replied.

You walked up to the door and headed inside, being led to separate areas of the house, Sarah no doubt being led to her "sister", and you being brought to Melanie. You entered the bedroom and the door was closed. In the room was a salon style chair, complete with basin and everything.

"Welcome to the first step on your way to becoming a TBG Girl." Melanie said as you walked in.

You smiled and nodded as you looked over all the stuff lying around the room.

"As you know, the by-laws have specific requirements for what a Gamma girl should look like. Every member must comply with those by-laws. Do you accept?"

You looked at Melanie with her perfectly manicured nails, styled hair and immaculate makeup. It was going to be hard, but it would be worth it when it was over.

"Yes." you said.

"Take these and go into bathroom." Melanie handed you a pink razor and a bottle of shaving cream, before pointing to the bathroom in the corner.

"Is this really necessary?" you asked.

"All Tau Beta Gamma Girls must be hairless below the neck." Melanie said. "At least during rush week."

You sighed and went into the bathroom, stripping and sitting on the edge of the tub as you not only shave your legs, but your arm-pits, chest, back and face. You emerged from the bathroom in just your panties.... the panties.

"I see you took my advice." Melanie said.

You nodded and Melanie pointed at the chair, motioning for you to sit down.

"Let's Gamma girlify you up!" Melanie exclaimed as she got to work.
154332231111.title: The next morning, makeover time!

1543322311111.content:
As you sat down, you went through your thought process once more, trying to figure out if you'd made the right decision. After all, if this was just temporary, then it was a small price to pay, and part of you really wanted to stick it to the frat guys who denied you entry. But was a petty squabble worth it?

As you mused upon your current situation, Melanie was quickly working to transform you into the picture of femininity. She filed and buffed your previously ragged and dirty nails, before placing fake nails on top and painting them in what you recognized as french tips, but instead of white, it was the sorority color on the tip, a glittery blue. Your toenails were also shaped and polished, which you spoke up about.

"Isn't that overkill? I mean, who's gonna see my feet?" you asked, wiggling your separated toes.

"By-laws." Melanie shrugged. "At the very least you're learning how to properly take care of your nails."

Following that, Melanie turned her attention to your face, plucking your eyebrows, before using a combination of several cosmetics that you recognized as foundation, concealer, eyeliner, eye shadow, mascara, lipstick (thankfully in a neutral color), and several other things that you didn't recognize, before she walked across the room to get a long blonde wig, which she secured to your head.

"Consider yourself lucky, usually we have to go through a whole hair washing and styling portion, but it's just easier to do a wig with you." Melanie said.

After fussing over the wig for a few moments, Melanie allowed you to re-dress in the full outfit, before producing a shoebox. Inside were a pair of white women's sneakers.

"Phew..." you muttered. "No heels?"

"Not yet..." Melanie started. "Can't tell you what's in store but... be prepared."

"Great..." you sighed. "Is it too late to back out?"

"I'd think so." Melanie pulled a sheet off of a full-length mirror and waved her hands towards it. "Voila!"

Looking yourself up and down, you were shocked by the transformation. You were still you, obviously, and still had your flat chest and bulge, but you didn't look too out of place in the outfit otherwise. This was definitely far more than you'd bargained for.

"Let's get downstairs, they're probably setting up for..." Melanie started.
1543322311111.title: The makeover begins

1543323.content:
It all started during that fateful walk home from school. You were never very popular, but once you got to high school, everything got worse. Being in the gifted classes didn't help things either. No girls were interested in you, and the boys wanted nothing more than to torment you.

After a day of being teased and bullied, you were walking alone, when you heard a thud behind you, and in the corner of your eye, you saw something land on the ground. You rushed over to see what it was, seeing a pink notebook, about the size of a composition notebook. It was facedown.

You picked it up, flipping it over to see emblazoned on the cover in white ink, in a strange font were the words, "Fem Note"

You were intrigued, but you also knew anyone seeing you with a pink notebook would just be extra icing on the bullying cake, so you tossed it into your bag and hurried towards home.

As you walked down the street, you spotted him. Ken Ortiz and Tyler Sullivan, your two lead tormenters, and two of the most popular guys in school. Ken was the head quarterback and Tyler was his best friend.

"Where you going, Turner?" Ken asked. "Forgot about our agreement?"

"Home." you replied. "I don't want any trouble."

"Well, you've got it Louie, boy." Tyler said.

"It's Louis!" you replied.

"It's whatever we say it is!" Ken said as he pushed you down.

"Make sure you've got our homework tomorrow!" Tyler laughed as they walked away.

You rushed home, running straight up to your room. Neither of your parents were home yet. You put down your bag and opened it up, taking out the pink notebook. You looked it over, it had like... a strange aura to it. You opened the book, finding a regular notebook, lined pages and all. But on the inside cover were a list.

Fem Note

How To Use It

         - The man whose name is written in this note shall be transformed into a woman.
         - This note will not take effect unless the writer has the man's face in their mind when writing his name. Therefore, people sharing the same name will not be affected.
         - If the specifics of transformation (hair style, breast size, female name, personality, etc.) is written within the next 40 seconds of writing the person's name, it will happen.
         - If the specifics of transformation are not specified, the person will simply be transformed into their female counterpart. (Who they'd be if they were born a woman.)
         - After writing the type of transformation, details of the transformation should be written in the next 6 minutes and 40 seconds.

"This can't be real!" you remarked.

You thought for a moment...

"But what if..." you pondered.

You picked up a pen off of your desk and uncapped it, moving it towards the paper. If it does work... who should it be?
1543323.title: Fem Note

choices: Louis takes the note to school tomorrow
Louis goes out with the note tonight
15433231.content:
In a moment of anger and frustration you took the pen and wrote in the notebook “Ken Ortiz”

You weren’t really sure what to expect. Would he change? What would you do even if he did? Would he be aware of the changes when they happened, or would the world somehow adapt to their change?

You laughed for a second after thinking about all these ideas. You were a rational person you knew this notebook was just a practical joke written by someone very bored.

After almost ten minutes you sat there wondering if the book had any effect. You were about to throw away the book. When you decided to pick up your phone and call Ken.

“Hi this is Kendra.” A female voice said picking up Ken’s number.

“Kendra?” You said a bit surprised to here a female voice.

“Yeah.....wait...Louis is this you? Who gave you my number? I told you no Prom already quit bothering me.” Kendra said before the line when dead.

You sat there frozen.....What....What just happened?

(-Exactly Six Minutes and 40 seconds ago-)

Ken was sitting around with his family eating dinner. He was a bit worried as he had been letting his grades slip this semester and been relying on nerds like that Louie kid to get him through class. However he worried if that Louie kid ever grew the balls to turn him to the teachers things could go badly for him.

Out of no where Ken’s heart began to pound....At first he thought it might be a heart attack...

“You okay son?” Ken’s Dad said after Ken dropped his fork suddenly.

“I....Uhh....be right back!” Ken said racing off up towards his room.

Rushing up to his room Ken felt like his whole body was pounding and burning. He raced to his room locking the door as he turned around and gasped. Right before his eyes everything was changing....

His entire room was shifting. His posters, clothes, sheets, everything was becoming feminine....

“What the hell is going on?” Ken shouted before the pain in his body rose again.

Ken doubled over as his whole body began to shift and pop as it changed size and shape. Long nails grew from his hands while his black hair began to grow and cascade down his shoulders. His hips began to widen as his butt began to swell. His skin became smoother as his features became softer. Two mounds began to pulse and grow from his chest forming into decent C-cup breasts. A tightness grew in his crotch as he felt his manhood slip away. Lastly his face reformed into a cute feminine equivalent.

Standing up Kendra saw her clothes had changed too. She was now wearing short shorts and a tank top. Her mind began to feel fuzzy as new memories began to swarm her mind as old ones began to fade away. Within minutes Kendra didn’t even remember what had happened as she checked herself out in the mirror.

“Hey Kendra your dinner is getting cold!” Her father called from downstairs.

“Sorry daddy!” Kendra called out. She had to look good for her date with Tyler tonight.
15433231.title: Ken Ortiz

154332311.content:
You woke up excitedly the next day. You wanted to see "Kendra" in the flesh for yourself. You packed the book in your bag and rushed out of the house. As you got to school, you started walking to your locker, when you spotted Tyler walking towards you. You flinched as you saw him raise his arm as he locked eyes with you and you started to turn away.

"Louis!" he exclaimed. "What have I told you? Kendra's my girl, so keep away, huh?"

He patted you on the shoulder and started to walk away. Without Ken around, maybe he wasn't such a bad guy... You saw a girl approach him, and as she got closer, you realized that it was Ken! Or Kendra, now, you guess. The book was absolutely right, he became his exact female counterpart. It's a shame really, if you had known it was real, you'd have added some extras to the transformation.

Not that it meant that your torment was over. There were others to pick up the slack, and you were already forming a shortlist in your head for who was next.

You debated transforming Tyler but... he wasn't so bad now that he had Kendra. Who was next? During lunch, you sat away from everyone else, with the notebook tucked into a binder. As one of your classmates, Marco Yates walked by, he smacked the binder to the floor, revealing the pink notebook.

"Nice book, homo!" Marco laughed. "Betcha it's where you keep the lists of the dudes you like!"

Marco walked off to the table his friends were at as you picked up your books. You uncapped your pen and prepared to write.
154332311.title: Louis takes the note to school tomorrow

choices: You don’t write any name yet
1543323111.content:
Your anger began to rise again as you needed to teach Marco a lesson. Grabbing the notebook you began to write Marco’s name as you paused. What kind of girl should he be? A normal girl was too good for him. Marco was such a dumb jock. Always picking on anyone he saw as nerdy, shy, gay, or weird. That’s when you got the idea...

“Marco Yates-Shy nerdy bookworm.” You wrote down as you looked to the clock.

Exactly 6 minutes 40 seconds later you saw it....Something you would never forget.

Marco was eating lunch with his jock friends when all of a sudden he grabbed his chest. He began sweating and panting like he was having a heart attack....

The weird thing was no one else but you seemed to notice it. Marco was panicking as he watched his hands began to shrink right before his eyes. His clothing was changing into a long black skirt that went past his knees and his shirt became a button up button up blouse. His hair grew past his ears forming a very plain hairstyle. Glasses appeared on his face as black stocking appeared on his legs along with black female dress shoes. Marco while Brody changed getting much smaller as B-cup breasts grew from his chest. Within minutes Marco was gone and a new shy looking awkward girl was sitting where he was.

“Hey...Mary what did we say? We don’t care you help do our homework you can’t sit with us.” Josh, Marco’s former best friend said to Mary.

“Oh...sorry.” Mary said blushing and almost holding back tears as she left her lunch table.

You sat there frozen for a moment watching what you had done....Marco was gone. Vanished like he never existed. The whole world just seems to adjust around them.

The immediate satisfaction you felt was replaced with a sudden amount of guilt...:Should you be doing this? What gave you the right to change their lives? However....Both Kendra and Mary seemed to be better people now right? Doesn’t that mean you made the world a better place? What if.....What if you only targeted bad people? Made them into nicer girls?

Then again... You saw how the world changed around Mary. Why should you be stuck in your body if you didn’t have to? You had to admit the idea crossed your mind. You could become the sexiest and most popular girl in the school....Whatever your fantasy was it was possible...

“Long flowing hair, perfect round DD breasts, round bubble butt, hourglass figure, perfectly smooth tanned skin, incredibly sexy and popular, but also smart.”

You began to write down the transformation notes in the book but you didn’t write a name...
1543323111.title: Marco's transformation

15433231112.content:
You moved your pen, but stopped. You needed more than just these two to check, you had to make sure that there aren't any side effects that you haven't observed yet. Plus, you had no idea if the book would stop working if you transformed yourself. You can't give up this type of power this easily. You packed your things and walked out of the lunchroom, stopping in an empty classroom. You checked to make sure no one was coming around and took the book back out, looking over it.

"You seem to have taking quite a liking to my book..." a feminine voice said.

You jumped and turned around, seeing a tall woman with long white hair, down to her ankles standing... no... floating before you. She had pale white skin and was wearing a tight silver dress.

"Ahhh!" you screamed.

"No reason to act surprised. I'm the Joseigami, Rina." she said. Then pointed to the book. "That used to be my notebook. I take it you already know what it can do."

"Joseigami?" you asked.

"God of femininity. It's Japanese. Goddess really, but I prefer direct translation." Rina said. "Anyway, enough about me, let's talk about you."

She floated down and sat on top of a desk.

"I dropped this in your realm. Fell out of my hands while I was observing something." Rina said. "How do you like it?"

"It's... interesting." you said. "And strange. Why only men? And how does it work?"

"It's magic, and it's only men because it's imbued with feminine power. There's a Mas Note or whatever to do the opposite. I don't control that though."

"Have other people used it before?" you asked.

"Not that exact one. Once a human uses it, it becomes bonded to your realm. It's your's now... unless you decide to relinquish use to someone else."

"Why are you here, then? If you can't take it back..."

"Wanted to check in. I like what you did out there... but you're only scratching the surface with it's abilities. I can help you."

"Is there a catch?"

"No catch, I just like to mess around with the human world."

Suddenly, you heard the door to the classroom start to open. You dove behind a desk in the back of the room and hid, while Rina stayed put where she was.

"Get down!" you whispered, but she ignored you.

The door opened and Jennie Boland, a classmate of your's, walked in, followed by a teacher, Mr. Edwards. He was a relatively young teacher, in his mid-twenties. Neither of them seemed to notice Rina. Maybe only you can see her?

"What are we doing in here, Mr. Edwards?" Jennie asked.

"Please, call me Dane." Mr. Edwards replied. "And you said you wanted to know how you can pass this semester."

"What are you talking about?" Jennie asked, clearly apprehensive.

"Uh oh..." Rina giggled.

Mr. Edwards started to unbuckle his belt. Jennie rushed to the door, Mr. Edwards made it there first. You were speechless and horrified.

"Mr. Edwards stop!" Jennie screamed, but Mr. Edwards covered her mouth. She started to struggle.

"If only someone could save her..." Rina sighed. "Oh, and if you want the transformation to happen faster, you can write that in too."

You took a deep breath and pulled out the book, opening to a new page, and took out your pen. You started writing furiously. You wrote down Mr. Edwards and started putting in specifics. Once you were done, you wrote the word "Immediately", and looked up from behind the desk.
15433231112.title: You don’t write any name yet

choices: You decide to use it on yourself
You decide to seek out and dispense more justice
154332311121.content:
You quickly wrote in the book. “Dane Edwards-Kind old woman, instantly change.”

Within seconds Mr. Edwards vanished and an elderly woman was standing in his place. She looked like someone’s Grandma.

“So you wanted to know how to pass this semester? Here’s is a special report that I want you complete by Monday.” She said handing Jennie an assignment before she smiled and left.

“Thank you Mrs. Edwards.” Jennie said with a loud sigh. “I can’t believe I have to spend my whole weekend on this stupid paper now.” Jennie said to you.

“Hey....It’s better than failing.” You said with a reply that was a bit shocked and confused as to what you just saw.

“That was good thinking.” Rina said to you with a wicked smile.

“Why didn’t either of them react to you?” You asked confused.

“Only you, other fem note holders, or those who touch your fem note can see me or hear me.” Rina said with a small laugh.

“Why didn’t you tell me that earlier?” You asked a bit frustrated.

“Because I wanted to see how you would react! Humans are so much fun and fragile to play with. I’m here not to help you or hurt you, just keep that in mind. I’m not going to tell you anything you don’t need to know. Where would the fun be in that?” Rina said.

“Well can you at least answer some quick questions?”

“Oh I guess...” Rina said with a sigh.

“What happens if I use the fem note on myself?” You asked.

“The same thing that would happen to anyone else. You would become whatever type of woman you wrote, lose all your memories and become that person. Unless of course you wrote down that you keep your memories. Than only your body changes. The same applies to anyone else too” Rina said.

“Interesting....what happeneds if I lose the fem note or it is stolen or destroyed?” You asked next.

“If the note is stolen or lost it is still considered your property until you recover it so nothing would happen, except the thief will be able to see me and write into the note as well. If you willingly relinquish ownership than all your memories of it would disappear. If the note is ever totally destroyed then you still keep your memories but nothing else will change. Those changed by the note cannot be changed back....There are consequences to using that note ....” Rina said with a wicked laugh.


“Hey you said no strings!” You said in protest.

“I meant no strings for you! Outside of the choices you make. There are always consequences for the choices we make. Whether it be Spirit or Human, you cannot simply undo what you don’t like.” Rina said.
