“I guess that makes sense...” You said feeling guilty now. You had hoped to eventually turn some of the people back.

“The note is yours...you chose how to use it, just be prepared for the changes to your own world your choices bring.”
Rina said handing you the notebook.
154332311121.title: Mr. Edwards' transformation

1543323111212.content:
Honestly, you felt a strange mix of empowerment and apprehension of everything. Rina's words were hard to take in. You truly had all this power at your fingertips? It felt as close to divine intervention as humanly possible, though I guess that was the case all things considered.

You thought back to the changes you had made so far. Kendra was not a bully anymore and even made Tyler into a more level-headed individual. Mary was obviously smarter now and less confrontational, as well as more helpful towards others. Now, you had even made a teacher who would have committed rape into a kind elderly woman.

Just thinking about it and taking it all in....wow....

"Are you done thinking?" Rina giggled. "You've been standing there for a good few minutes."

Boy, did it really take that long? Guess the minutes roll by when you're in deep thought. In any case, there was an appeal to this. You looked back at the note, even looking at the unfinished entry you had made for yourself earlier. Honestly, perhaps it wasn't the time for that. If changes were permanent, perhaps you should hold off on that. No rush after all.

"Yeah....I think I'm good," you smiled. "Better to use this to finally deal some justice."

"Sounds rather corny, but if you insist," Rina giggled again before she began to fade. "Just be careful..."

She sounded as teasing as ever as she left, leaving you alone. Well, guess you should finish your classes for the day. After the craziness with the teacher, you could use a little break.

Some time later

The rest of school went by normally. You got to see more of your transformees in action. Kendra and Tyler making goo-goo eyes was a little nauseating at times, but still an improvement. Mary on the other hand was quite the improvement. You had a class with the old Marco, even sat next to him.

And boy...she was insanely helpful getting through the class assignment. You became all the more appreciative for your decision. Mary was like a total sweetheart now. Heck, perhaps you could talk with her more in the future.

In any case, you finished school and went back home, feeling more satisfied than ever now. You got home as usual, walking inside and walking by your little brother.

"Hi Louie!" Nick, your younger brother, said to you.

Sheesh, you really hated when Nick used that name for you, even if it wasn't as malicious as when bullies used it. Nick was 10 years old, and a huge anime fan on top of it. Heck, sometimes you had to cover for him just to make sure your parents didn't catch him with really mature anime. Still, it wasn't all bad. You liked the occasional Japanese stuff as well.

To be honest....a small thought went through your mind about using the note on Nick. With all that cool stuff on Japanese girls and such, perhaps you could give him the life of one....then again, that would be a considerable risk too. Was it best to just save this for the evil people in the world?

Oh, the choices.
1543323111212.title: You decide to seek out and dispense more justice

15433231112121.content:
Grabbing the notebook you flipped it open and wrote down. “Nicholas Turner-Really cute Japanese school girl and anime fan, instantly change.”

Turning around you saw your brother suddenly freeze in place. It only took a few seconds as his body and appearance completely changed. Standing in his place was now an incredibly cute ten year old Japanese girl.

She was wearing a white blouse and blue school skirt with stockings and school shoes. Her hair was a long and glowing and her black. However it also had streaks of blue in it that she added. Her backpack was now a pink hello kitty and in her hands was a Manga book.

As soon as the change happened your head began to hurt as new memories poured into your mind. Nick was now Suki, your adopted younger sister from Japan. You still remembered Nick but now you seemed to have all these new memories of growing up with Suki as well.

“Later big bro!” Suki said giving you the peace sign before heading out to meet up with her friends.

“Be back by Dinner!” You called out almost instinctively.

You seemed really happy with the change at first until it just hit you....Nick is gone....What have you done?

“So....not just a dispenser of justice are you?” Rina said appearing behind you.

“Shut up....I think his life is better now. Look how cute and happy she is.” You said trying to convince yourself.

“Really? I wonder about that? Maybe you should check again...” Rina said with a laugh.

Walking outside you saw Suki walking when all of a sudden a boy on a bike about her age rode past her.

“Hey nerd!” The boy yelled as he rode past Suki slapping her Manga book out of her hands and into a dirty puddle on the ground.

You felt the anger build up in you. You wanted to teach that boy a lesson but you just realized....You didn’t know his name....

“Is there a problem?” Rina said laughing.

“I don’t know his name. I was going to turn that boy into Suki’s new best friend.” You said angry.

“I might be able to help you with that. There is a special deal we Josigami can make with humans who have a fem note.” Rina said.

“What kind of deal....” You said sounding suspicious.

“We Josigami have a special gift. Our eyes, we see the names of everyone above them. Just looking at you now I see your birth name above your head. This means we never have to learn a humans name to change them. I can grant this gift to you...for a price.” Rina said with a smile.

You were surprised at how much this idea interested you. With those eyes you wouldn’t have to learn names anymore. Just look at their face and you would know their name.

“What’s the price?” You asked nervously.

“Oh it’s nothing....just a token really....50% of your masculinity is all.” Rina said.

“What does that mean? Are you gonna change me into some kind of femboi or herm?” You asked.

“Please....No you would give up your male life 50% of the time. Starting at midnight you will transform into a female and remain that way for 24 hours. You will retain your memories and eye powers but like the fem note your world will be adjusted during your female time.” Rina explained

“Why do I have to pay this price? What do you get out of this?” You asked wondering why. This sounded so strange to you.

“You humans are always so funny. You have no idea how we Josigami live do you? We sustain our bodies not with food and drink like You humans but with feminine energy. Every time a fem note is used and a male turns female we sustain ourselves a little more. This deal is almost like you buying me dinner every night....” Rina said with a smile.

“Is there any catch to the payment?” You asked wanting a bit more info.

“Just one...If you relinquish ownership of the fem note you will lose the eyes. You will also stop changing but whatever form you were in at the time will remain your new permanent form.” Rina said.

You stopped to think about the deal. Giving up your manhood didn’t sound great but it was only 50% of the time. With the eyes you could disburse justice even easier and shape your world how you wanted....
15433231112121.title: Consider changing Nick

154332311121211.content:
"Hmm....well it is interesting..." you mumbled.

"I figured you would find it interesting," Rina giggled. "So...think you're up for it?"

At that, she offered her hand, like any would for a simple handshake. However, just looking at it gave the impression that it was so much more than that, like you could just feel something was up. Granted, you did hesitate for a bit, wondering if this was truly a good idea. Then again, you supposed you could adjust to such a life.

So, with that in mind, you reached out and grasped Rina's hand with your own. At that, a huge shock went through your body, making you cry out a bit in slight pain. Thank goodness your parents weren't home yet otherwise they'd be rushing in to know what was going on.

"And there, all done," Rina giggled. "Needless to say, I'm quite looking forward to this."

"I'll bet....." you groaned as you slowly got up, smoking just a bit from the blast. "So....what will I even look like?"

"Who knows?" Rina shrugged, giggling again. "Perhaps you'll be Japanese. You can better relate to your new sibling that way!"

She just giggled more at her taunting, making you groan a bit.

"I don't know about that," you said, fully up now.

"Well, I'm Japanese as well, so who knows what could happen," Rina shrugged again. "It's a mystery we'll see together. Enjoy your new eyes!"

At that, she faded away. That actually reminded you about the whole eyes thing. Granted, nothing felt too different, even if you did have to rub your eyes a bit. Just out of curiosity, you flipped the TV on, turning it to a news station. Looking at a politician currently on screen, you blinked at what you saw. There is was! Their name right above their eyes! Oh my gosh, you could actually see them!

"Oh yeah!" you cheered. Boy this was going to make things so much easier.

To that end, you decided to rest for now. It had been a long day after all. You lounged around in your room, hearing your parents eventually come home and get dinner started. Eventually, you heard the door open again, and your parents really did address Suki the same way as they did Nick. It was kind of strange to see things so different yet similar.

Yet, as she passed by your room, you could see how sad she was. Her manga was partially ruined after all. It reminded you of how angry you felt at the boy. You were going to get him someday for this!

"Hey Suki!" you called her, getting her attention. "How about this weekend, you and I go shopping for a new book? My treat."

That instantly made her face light up. Boy, you had to admit she was quite cute. Kind of made you feel a little better about changing your former little brother. At that, she ran up and gave you a hug.

"Really? Thank you!" she smiled. "You're the best!"

Well, that certainly made you feel more satisfied. Yeah, you wouldn't those sorts of things happen again. You wouldn't tolerate injustice to you or to the people you really liked.
154332311121211.title: Take the deal

1543323111212111.content:
You decided to stay up until Midnight to wait for the changes, both nervous and curiously excited to see what kind of girl you would become. Would you transform into a hottie like Kendra turned out to be? Shy and sweet like Mary? Adorable like Suki? Somewhere in between all those? Either way, taking Rina's deal was perhaps the most impulsive decision you had ever made in your life, and you weren't sure if you were having buyer's remorse or just opening night jitters. Would you be able to get used to swapping genders every day for the rest of your foreseeable life? He\

After finishing your homework, you watched a little bit of TV and did a quick gaming session on Twitch to a small but loyal audience. During all of it your mind was focused elsewhere, eyeing your alarm clock with nervous impatience, and your concentration faltered. After only a half hour, you announced the live stream was over for tonight.

Finally, it was time. 12:00 A.M was about to hit in thirty seconds. You gulped as you stared at your wall clock ticking away. You counted down with it.

“5...4...3...2...1...”

Just on time, you immediately doubled over in a fit of pain. Your face was turning red, and you were sweating profusely, feeling like you were about to have a heart attack. Bending down to the floor from your chair, you felt your body painfully shimmering into a mass of flesh, muscle and bone. You shut your eyes, afraid of seeing this process take place, thinking that you might be witness to your body transforming into some Cronenberg like monstrosity.

Thankfully, this was not to be, and the ordeal was over as quickly as it came.

Slowly, you opened your eyes as they drifted up to look at the clock: 12:07 A.M.

Exactly 400 Seconds. Same as the Fem Note gave to its victims.

Looking around, you noticed some slight adjustments to your bedroom. Nothing major, just some cosmetic changes. Your bedspread now possessed slightly more vibrant colors to it, you noticed a bottle of teal nail polish sitting on your bed stand, and overall, something about the room seemed warmer. Maybe it was slightly neater too, but it was really nothing to speak of. But then you looked down...

Your body was now wearing pink pajamas. You groaned as you realized that you now had noticeable breasts, and that your cleavage could be seen poking through the top.

You groaned deeply, immediately recognizing that your voice had gone up a few octaves.

Suddenly a door opened. It was your Mom.

“Louise, what are you doing up so late?” she asked.

“Nothing!” you lied. “I...I just got lost in thought.”

Mom gave you an odd look.

“Well you can think while you're laying in bed. Please, sweetheart, you need to start keeping a schedule again. No more going to bed at 3:00 A.M in the moring. Do you think you'll be able to pull all nighters in college?”

“Uh...isn't that what a lot of students in college do?”

“Not the good ones” replied Mom. "It may be boring to go to bed at the same time every night, but at least you'll never have to worry about missing an important test because you overslept."

“I guess you have a point” you said, conceding to your mom.

Your mother smiled.

“Goodnight Louise. See you at breakfast.”

You turn off your bedroom light, just to make her happy, and eventually you decide that maybe she's right. Despite swapping teams and being in an entirely new body(And apparently a new reality), maybe you need to sleep on this.
1543323111212111.title: Payment

choices: You decide to go out for the day.
There is a knock on your door
15433231112121111.content:
When you woke up the next morning you had almost forgotten about the change. You yawned and rolled out of bed like normal until you felt the unfamiliar weight and bouncing sensation coming from your chest.

It only took you a moment as you blinked looking down seeing the two mounds coming from your chest. Your eyes quickly widened as your rushed over to the mirror as you took your clothes off and saw your new body.

https://orig00.deviantart.net/c9d9/f/201...

“Oh my god...” Was all you could say. You had turned into a Busty Asian girl! You couldn’t be more than 5’2 now as you noticed how short you now were. You were very skinny with a petite frame yet you had very large and perfectly rounded breasts. Your long dark hair cascading down your back like a water fall. Your nails were much longer and painted a bright pink along with your toes.

You went back to your room and saw all your outfits had turned into very sexy and revealing clothes. Short shorts, Mimi skirts, tight dresses, low cut tops, push up bras, high heels etc.

“So what do you think?” You heard a familiar voice saying as Rina appeared behind you.

“This isn’t what I had in mind! Did you do this?” You asked.

Rina laughed at that response. “Please....No YOU did this remember? I have no control over what body you will be given. This body is a reflection of your use of the fem note.” Rina explained.

“What do you mean?” You asked confused.

“You have used the Fem note in various ways. Most recently you have used it to turn an innocent boy into an Asian girl and several boys in to very feminine women. This body is a reflection of those traits in you.” Rina said.

“So you knew I would get a body like this?” You asked a bit mad now.

“Not exactly...but I could have guessed. Don’t get mad...It’s not like I would have told you anyway. I’m not your enemy remember but I’m also not your ally.” Rina said.

“Ugh....what’s wrong with me all of sudden?” You asked feeling a bit strange. Your body felt odd and you started noticing odd new desires in your mind. Very feminine desires....

“Remember in this reality you are Louise now. With that comes off all the perks and privileges of this new body. You will feel the way Louise would feel and know what should would want. That means all the feminine desires you experience as well.” Rina said.

Looking at yourself in the mirror you felt yourself staring more and more at your body. You felt...sexy. Like you wanted to dress up and show off to others. Perhaps you could even use the fem note to make some new friends?
15433231112121111.title: Wake up tomorrow morning

154332311121211113.content:
“Try to keep focus dearie,” a matronly voice spoke up in Louise’s head. “Try to keep on the mission now, don’t get distracted.” Louise clicked her teeth in frustration, but diligence easily won the argument.

With pencil and an ordinary notebook, she began to plan out her next steps.

“Oh my,” Rina scoffed. “It seems Mrs. Edwards rubbed off on you as well.” With hungry eyes, Rina loomed over Louise, trying to peek at her unfolding machinations. She couldn’t resist seeing the beautiful bounty Louise had planned for her.

Louise swiveled in her chair, not realizing Rina was right over her shoulder. There would have been an embarrassing thud, if Louise could physically interact with Rina. Instead, Louise saw the incomprehensible and quickly put it out of mind for the sake of her sanity. The droning “Uhhhhh” escaping Louise’s lips was the only remnant of this trauma.

“Did you have a question girly,” Rina said with a tone of snark, growing impatient waiting for her meal.

“Huh, what? Oh…oh right,” Louise said groggily, shaking her head clear of mist. “Like, how far can I stretch the Fem Note?”

“What do you mean ‘how far’?” Rina replied.

“When it talks about transformation specifics, it just ends with etc. What exactly can I do to them?”

“Uggh, whatever you want. I tried to spell it out for you, and you humans still couldn’t understand it,” Rina said in exasperation.

“So like, I could change someone’s career? Maybe even where they work?”


“Oh for the love of, yes. You can change a profession all you’d like. You really can’t understand ‘whatever’ can you.”
Louise, with this confirmation, returned to her plotting with new vigor. She began writing pages of plans and backup plans.

Rina cocked an eyebrow, “So…why does that have you so excited?”

“Because,” Louise said grinning ear to ear, “Now I’ll have somewhere to hang out with my new besties.”
154332311121211113.title: Something else

1543323111212111131.content:
Herbert Reskirk, Herbie to his friends, slumped against the back of his chair. Barbershops were always kind of slow on a weekday, but this level of inactivity was downright disheartening. Herbie thought people may appreciate an old style barbershop in their neighborhood, maybe think of the good olâ days when their barber was their greatest confidant. Instead, business was hoarded by the newfangled âhair stylistsâ. In Herbieâs mind, todayâs youth valued a flashy haircut over a true haircut experience.

         In the midst of his self-pity, Herbert failed to properly greet his first customer of the day, a petite and busty Asian girl.

         âUm, excuse me mister,â Louise interrupted, âcan you help me?â

         âOh,â Herbie finally noticed Louiseâs presence, âEr, sorry girly. Iâm not much with womanâs hair. If yer lookinâ for a cut, best find yourself a salon or somethinâ.â

         âThatâs fine,â Louise said stifling a giggle, âI was just looking for somewhere to sit down. Itâs awful hot today.â

         âSure, fine,â Herbie said turning to slump against his chair again. âOf course ya wouldnât be coming here for a cut, no one would. Cause Iâm apparently too old fashioned.â

         Herbie resumed his self-pity, further pushed by his new position as âlounge attendant for young bratsâ, while Louise pulled out her notebook. Herbie heard a bit of rumbling and looked in the mirror to see what was making the noise. To Herbie, she just seemed to be scribbling in her diary or something, but the smile on her face was a bit unsettling.

         Herbie gave the girl a grace period, but he could only stand loiterers for so long.

         âHey, girly, how long ya going to just sit there?â

         âStylish, confidant, youthful, friendly. Oh, just a small bit longer,â Louise said as she dotted her Iâs.

         âWell can ya give me an estimate?â


         âJust 3â¦2â¦1.â

         Herbie gripped his chest and leaned heavier against his chair to keep from falling over. Herbieâs whole body was burning up, and could feel odd popping all over. If Herbie could keep his eyes open, heâd see all the changes going on around him.

         Herbieâs barbershop began morphing and shifting. The bottles of aftershave were replaced with haircare products. Various cosmetics were popping up on the workstations. Reclining chairs in the back transformed into hairdryers. Herbieâs red leather seats shrunk, slimed, and turned white. Shiny black and white tiles replaced the wood flooring, and the wallpaper shited from green to pink. The mirrors stretched until they were full body. The large window facing the street, which acted as the store sign, changed as well. The sign no longer said âHerbieâs Barbershopâ in thick bold print but rather said âBarbieâs Salonâ in a light cursive font, and, to add insult to injury, the âiâsâ were now tubes of lispstick.

         Herbie suffered a similar fate to that of his prized barbershop. Herbieâs broad shoulders and thick arms slimed and shortened. His legs did the same. Herbieâs thick barrel chest, which stretched his shirt to its limit, reformed into D sized breasts which stretched out his new top in a similar manner. Curves began to grow in all the right places. Nails and eyelashes stretched out and were coated in cosmetics. Pink nail polish and light eyeliner appeared to cover their respective sections. His lips plumped and were coated a bright red. Herbieâs thick black hair fell off his body, and only the hair on his head grew back, except the new hair was a bright blonde and curls extended down his back. The final changed to Herbieâs body was a slight retraction which resounded with a pop.

         The final shifts to occur were to Herbieâs outfit. His jean legs combined and shortened and formed a pink skirt. His wife beater shrunk and became a tight tank top. Herbieâs sneakers morphed into to pink open toed heels. Hoop earrings materialized and dangled from Herbieâs earlobes. Random bracelets and other assorted accessories appeared to round out Herbieâs transformation.

         âBarbie, are you feeling alright,â Louise said as the touched the newly minted womanâs shoulder.

         âOh, what?â Barbie said as she slowly pushed herself off the back of a chair. âYes, yes Iâm fine sweetie. Mustâve just been a dizzy spell.â Barbie slowly balanced herself. âNow, what can I do for you Louise? Thinking you might want to take me up on the curlers offer?â

         âThat would be fabulous,â Louise said.


         Babrie sat Louise down in the rinse station and began to prep for the hair curlers.

         âBy the way,â Louise said as Barbie began washing her hair, âwhat would you say if I brought a few friends here some time?â

         âThat sounds like a marvelous idea honey,â Barbie said with a grin. âEvery girl needs a friendly hairstylist.â
1543323111212111131.title: Make a Base of Operations

15433231112121111311.content:
Louise strutted down the sidewalk, appreciating the new bounce from her curls. Everywhere she looked, the names of her potential targets hung above their heads.

         âNicholas Tealer, maybe youâd be better as a Nichola Tealer, debutant and extraordinary beauty,â Louise giggled to herself, her writing finger itching. Louise reached for the Fem-Note, but once again the matronly voice interrupted saying, âNot now dearie. Keep to the plan.â Louise retreated her hand and left Nicholas alone, for now.

         Louise continued down the path, her brow furrowed, and Rina floated close behind her.

         âUuurrp,â Rina belched as she liked her lips. âThanks for that girly. Feminizing a guy like thatâ¦mmmh mmmm, delicious. Got another one for me?â

         âNot right now, apparently,â Louise grumbled. âI just need a few minutes, thereâs a boy I need to find.â

         âWell, if heâs anything like the last one, I think I can wait a spell,â Rina said as she lazily floated a few paces behind.

         Louise scanned around. All she knew about this person was his last name and he lives in this neighborhood. Unfortunately, they didnât run the same circles, so she couldnât perform an easy distant transformation. Louise needed to find this guy and see his name for himself.

         Louise began to bound the corner into the local park when some guy sped by her on his bike. Louise fell back to avoid him, and landed on her rump. The guy just continued down the sidewalk, not even sparing a backward glance to see if Louise was ok.

         âOh, you think you can just knock over Louise and get away with it, donât youâ¦William Sirtus,â Louise squinted to see his name in the distance.

         The matronly voice tried to stop her, saying âNowâs not the timeâ and âWe might not be able to find the boy if we donât keep lookingâ, but Louiseâs impulses were fighting tooth and nail with her rationale.
15433231112121111311.title: Find a few friends

154333.content:
You are Brian, a skinny 18 year old man with rather long brown hair for a boy. You were sitting at home one night when your phone rang. You walked over to it and picked it up.

"Hello?" you asked.

"Brian?" the voice on the other end replied. It was Mrs. Reynolds, a friend of your mother's, that you had known for years.

"What's up Mrs. R?" you asked. "Is there an emergency?"

"Sort of." she sounded frantic. "Mr. Reynolds and I are supposed to be going to a special dinner, and we leave in a few hours... and our babysitter just cancelled. We need someone to take care of Bella while we're out."

Mrs. Reynolds had a twelve year old daughter, that you had met a few times, but not very often. Considering the age difference, you'd never had much to talk about.

"So Ben... are you busy tonight?" she asked.

"Not at all. What time do you want me to come over?" you replied.

"Around six is fine." she said.

You looked at the clock, it was just past five now.

"I'll be over as soon as I can." you said.

"Thank you, Brian, you're a lifesaver." Mrs. Reynolds gushed as you hung up the phone.
154333.title: Fill-In Babysitter

1543331.content:
Since Mrs. Reynolds lived across town, you had to take the bus, and since it was just a night, you didn't bother taking anything except your phone, wallet and keys with you. When you got to the Reynolds residence, you knocked on the door, and Mrs. Reynolds answered it, wearing a formal dress.

"Brian! There you are!" she exclaimed. "Okay, what do you need to know... emergency numbers on the fridge... dinner is in the fridge, ready to be heated up and... she had a bedtime, it's 9:30, but you can give her an extra half hour if she behaves."

"I think I've got it." you said.

"All right then." Mrs. Reynolds walked to the staircase and shouted towards the ceiling. "Bella! Come down, we're leaving!"

After a few moments, Bella descended the staircase. She looked nothing like you remembered, but then again, it had been a few years since you had actually seen her. She had blonde hair and was wearing a pink t-shirt and skinny jeans. She came down, looked at you and then rolled her eyes.

"Bella, you remember Brian, right?" she asked.

"Yeah... I guess." Bella sighed.

"Behave for him and don't cause any trouble, okay honey?"

"Got it, mom!" Bella said.

"All right, have fun tonight!" you said to Mrs. Reynolds as she walked out and closed the door.

You turned to Bella who was already walking towards the staircase.

"So... Bella..." you started. "What do you wanna do?"
1543331.title: Arriving at Mrs. Reynolds

15433311.content:
"I dunno." she said.

"Uh..." you started. "Your mom said dinner was in the fridge, want me to heat it up?"

"Sure." Bella said.

"Awesome." you said.

You walked into the kitchen and opened the fridge, seeing a foil covered tray sitting on the middle shelf. You pulled it out and opened the cover, revealing a lasagna inside.

You turned on the oven and placed the tray into it, before setting the timer and walking out to the living room.

After a while, the food was ready and you sat down to eat with Bella at the table. She was as talkative as she had been, and she mostly stared at her phone the entire time. When the meal was over, you went to go put back the rest of the lasagna into the fridge, carrying the tray, as Bella got up to throw her plate out, not looking up from her phone, so she proceeded to walk right into you, sending the lasagna all over your clothes, and knocking you to the floor.

"Aw shit!" you exclaimed. "I mean... crud."

Bella's eyes grew to saucer-like size.

"Oh my god, I am so sorry." Bella exclaimed, showing her first genuine emotion since you had arrived.

"It's okay I'm just a little messy and well... I hope you didn't want seconds." you said. "I'll clean this up."

"Let me go turn on the bath for you, so you can wash the sauce off." she said.

"Are you allowed to turn the bathtub on by yourself?" you asked.

"Dude, I'm twelve, not a five year old. I can handle water." she said.

"All right." you said.

She was right, the sauce soaked right through to your skin. The shirt, pants, and underwear needed to be cleaned, but you'd figure that out later, once your body was clean. You went upstairs to the bathroom as Bella was turning off the faucet.

"Stay out of trouble until I get out, okay?" you asked.

"Okay." Bella replied, as she skipped out of the room.

Now, onto that bath...
15433311.title: Have dinner

choices: A blue polka dot dress and a pair of blue panties
A pair of skinny capris, white panties, and a babydoll tee shirt
154333111.content:
You would have preferred a shower, but you decided not to let Bella's attempt at helping go to waste. You stripped your clothes and left them by the door, climbing into the warm bath, which was the perfect temperature. In fact, it was pretty relaxing.

"Ahhhh." you sighed as you laid back against the wall.

You closed your eyes for a few minutes to just soak in the water and relax. You noticed a slight tingling sensation, but you chalked that up to the heat. You grabbed some soap and started washing your body, getting the sauce stains off.

Once you were done, you stood up and reached for a towel, spotting a fluffy pink one hanging up near the shower. You grabbed it and started drying your body, which is when you realized it. All of your body hair was gone. You turned back to the tub and saw that floating on the top of the water was your body hair.

"Bella must have..." you thought.

Your thoughts were interrupted when you turned to the floor and saw that your clothes were no longer lying there. You wrapped the towel around your waist and opened the door.

"Bella!" you shouted.

"Yeah?" Bella replied as she rushed over to the door.

"Two things, first, did you put anything into the water in the bath?" you asked.

"Just the bath oil that my mom uses. Figured you could use it." she replied. "It's up on that shelf."

You walked back into the bathroom and checked the shelf, seeing two bottles of identical color and shape. You pulled one of the bottles down. It was labeled "Liquid Hair Remover".

"Bella... I think you used this. Liquid Hair Remover."

"Omigod, I'm so sorry. I was just trying to make the bath all nice and..." she started to tear up.

"It's okay. Just hair right? It'll grow back." you said.

"Y-yeah." Bella wiped her tears away.

"Now, where are my clothes?"

"I put them in the washing machine, to get rid of the stains." she replied.

"Everything?" you asked.

"Everything but your phone, wallet and keys. I took those out of your pockets." she said. "They're on the table in the kitchen."

"Thanks, I guess. But that means that I don't have anything to change into." you said. "And I can't babysit you in just a towel... does your dad maybe have something I can borrow?"

"He's like three sizes bigger than you... and mommy and daddy lock their room when they leave the house." she said.

"And it's not like I can go home and get something..." you muttered.

"Oh!" Bella exclaimed. "I have an idea! There's a few things that I've gotten as presents that I haven't grown into yet cause they're too big. Maybe they'll fit you!"

Bella rushed away before you could object. I mean, it was only for a few hours while your clothes were washed, so whatever she brought back, you could deal with. The poor kid's almost cried twice because of what she's done to you. Humor her a bit, right?

A few minutes later, Bella returned to you holding a bundle of clothes. She hands it to you and you walk back into the bathroom, shutting the door. Unfolding the bundle you find...
154333111.title: Your bath

1543331111.content:
You unfurled a baby blue dress adorned with polka dots. It was sleeveless, and the skirt was flowy and looked like it would go down to about your knees. Along with it was a pair of matching baby blue panties.

"This cannot be happening..." you muttered as you held the panties out in front of you.

You can't wear these! I mean... you didn't really have a choice but...

"Everything okay in there?" Bella asked. "I'm sorry that it's a dress..."

You could hear the sobs building up, so you bit the bullet and pulled on the panties and slipped the dress over your head.

You looked at yourself in the mirror. With your hairless, fairly skinny body, you could pass for a flat-chested girl if it wasn't for your face and short hair. You took a deep breath and opened the bathroom door, finding Bella standing in front of it eagerly.

"How do I look?" you asked.

"Silly." Bella laughed.

"How long is that wash going to take?" you asked.

"Probably another hour or so." she replied.

"Okay then. Back to babysitting." you said. "What do you want to do?"
1543331111.title: A blue polka dot dress and a pair of blue panties

choices: Bella makes a deal with you
There is a knock at the door
15433311111.content:
You ask what she wants to do and lights up.

“Can we watch a movie?” she asks.

“Sure, why don't you go pick something out?” you tell her with a smile.

She runs off into the living room leaving you standing there in your dress. You try to remind yourself that its just for a few hours and that you can deal with the embarrassment. You make your way to the living room, noting how cold the floor is on your bare feet. Bella already has a handful of dvd cases around her and you groan internally at the selection. You didn't recognize any of the titles but the bright colors and cutesy characters told you it was going to be a long night.

To get off the floor, you plop down on the couch and become very aware of the dress. It folds up in a weird fashion so you stand again. You make an effort to slide your hands along the back of the dress before attempting to sit again and then pull your feet up under yourself to keep them warm. Bella finally make a choice and pops a movie on.

“I'll get juice!” Bella says darting off.

In a short time she comes back with two glasses of red fruit juice and she hands you one, which you accept. You take a sip of the sugary drink realize that Bella is going to be bouncing off the walls from a sugar rush, but at least she will probably fall asleep after. You lick your lips and keep drinking and watch the movie with her. She occasionally looks over to talk about what just happened and you notice how the drink has stained her mouth red in a way that only kids know how to do.

The movie was pretty boring by your standards and you found yourself nodding off a few times. At one point you wake started after hearing a crash. You see that Bella isn't with you but the movie is still running. You get up and run in the direction of the sound which you think may have been the kitchen. Stepping in to the room you are relieved to see that Bella just broke a glass.

“Are you okay?” you ask.

She nods but doesn't say anything. It's clear she is upset and you've gathered by now that she is a very sensitive kid. Before the waterworks start you tell her its okay and that it was just an accident. You ask her to step out of the room and to get your shoes so you don't step on glass.

“They aren't done yet,” she says.

“Done?” you ask confused.

“They are still in the wash,” she tells you.

Of course she put them in the wash with your clothes, you think in frustration. She says she will get you something else for the moment and runs off. Soon she comes back with a pair of smooth looking black shoes and hands them to you. You stair blankly at a pair of her mother's heels and begin to wonder if she is doing this on purpose.

“My dad doesn't have anymore shoes, just the pair he wears,” she says sensing your concern.

With little choice, you figure you will just wear them until you clean up the mess and then take them off. You sit and slip both on your feet, feeling the heels arch your feet in an unfamiliar way. You also notice they both have a little strap with a tiny buckle which Bella leaps at the chance to help with. She buckles them both for you and you mince into the kitchen.

It's not a hard job but it is annoying with the heels. You squat down, knees together and hover over the the mess as to not get juice on the dress or glass in your knees. Soon enough the mess is clean and the floor is safe to walk on barefoot. You head back to the living room and sit on the couch to take the shoes off. Unfortunately for you, your can't get your fingers to manipulate the tiny buckles. For the moment, you are stuck wearing heels until Bella can undo them for you.
15433311111.title: Watch TV/a movie

154333111111.content:
Bella walks back into the living room, carrying something behind her back. She smiles when she sees you sitting on the couch.

"The floor's clean in the kitchen, no harm, no foul." you said, before motioning to the heels. "Say, can you help me unbuckle these?"

"Um... my regular babysitter usually lets me do her hair and stuff when we watch movies, so I was wondering if maybe you'll let me do that to you, and when I'm done, I'll unbuckle the shoes." Bella said.

She presented what was behind her back, a blonde wig.

"It's from when I went as Hannah Montana a few Halloweens ago." she said.

"No way. This is where I draw the line, Bella." you said, firmly.

"I promise I'll take it all off before you leave, please?" Bella begged.

Bella started to pout and looked at you with puppy dog eyes. You tried to resist but... it was only one night and it was a wig. What was the harm.

"Okay, fine." you said.

Bella smiled and climbed up onto the couch to fasten the wig over your hair. She adjusted it and then got to work.
154333111111.title: Bella makes a deal with you

choices: Bella is nowhere to be found
1543331111111.content:
Though you were annoyed, the brushing of the wig felt kind of soothing in a way you were not expecting. The calming motion helped you relax as you watched the stupid move. You closed your eyes and leaned back enjoying the feeling.

You opened your eyes and the first thing you noticed was that the movie had a different animation style...was it a new movie? You figure you must have fallen asleep by how drowsy you felt. You look down and see your hands had what you thought at first was some juice on them but quickly you realized you were wrong. Bella had painted your nails while you were asleep. It was then that you noticed a strange taste as you liked your lips.

“Oh no,” you said as you got up to check your reflection.

Sure enough, she had done your makeup and to your surprise, you looked pretty. The wig's hair framed your face perfectly in a way you hated to admit. If you had seen a girl that looked like you, you would have asked her out immediately.

“Okay Bella, you've had your fun,” you say as you pull at the wig.

The wig, however, doesn't budge. You pull again and feel pain on your scalp as you attempt to remove the girly hair but it still won't come off. Giving up on that for now, you go looking for Bella to get the heels off and hopefully your clothes are dry enough to finally wear.
1543331111111.title: Later

15433311111111.content:
As you look around for Bella, you can't find her. You've checked every room in the house.

"Oh no, did Bella go out?" You say to yourself.

You turn around to see a wide open door.

"Bella!" You start to run, but falter.

And this is the dilemma. As a babysitter, you want to see if Bella's okay. As a person, you don't want to go out dressed the way you were. You think over the options.
15433311111111.title: Bella is nowhere to be found

154333111111111.content:
You figured that Bella's well-being outweighed your own embarrassment, and ran out of the house through the open door. Well, not exactly running, but as fast as those heels could take you. You got outside into the driveway and looked around.

"Bella!" you shouted.

You heard nothing in response. You called out again. This time... you heard a rustling from behind the house. You around the house to the backyard just in time to see the back door being shut.

You rushed up to it and tried the knob... Locked. Realizing the implications, you ran back around to the front, to see that the front door was now shut. And locked. You pounded on the door.

"Bella!" you shouted for a third time.

You gave up and sat down on the porch, sighing. Suddenly, you heard a knock on the window. You immediately stood up and turned around to see Bella standing in the window. She pulled it open.

"Bella! You are not allowed to lock me out or be out here unsupervised!" you shouted.

"You're not my mom..." Bella muttered. "Though you could be my sister dressed like that..."

"Bella..." you tried to be reasonable. "Please let me back inside and give my my clothes back."

"Hm...." Bella mused. Her face suddenly lit up. "I think I can do that... but only if you do what I say first."

You wanted to tell her to just knock it off and let you inside or you'd tell her mother what she'd been up to but... you can't be seen by anyone like this.

"All right." you said.

"Okay, so first of all..." Bella started.
154333111111111.title: Outside.

choices: Take a cute selfie and send it to Bella
Take a walk around the block
Get someone to take your picture for you
1543331111111112.content:
“First of all, I have to say you are really pretty girl,” she said with a smirk.

You scowl at the kid but don't say anything. The longer you are out of the house, the more of a chance there is of you being spotted.

“Well?” she starts.

“Well what?” you asked confused.

“I just told you that you are a pretty girl. You should say thank you when someone says something nice,” she grins.

“Thank you,” you say through gritted teeth.

“Hmm...That didn't sound very real. If you aren't going to play nice then you can stay outside,” she tells you while closing the window.

“Wait, wait, wait!” you try to whisper yell.

She pauses and you can tell this is exactly what she wants. She looks at you and waits for you to say something. You reach down into yourself and try your best to sound sincere.

“Thank you,” you say forcing a smile on your face.

“For what?” she says trying not to smile.

“Thank you for telling me I'm pretty,” you say as sweet as you can muster.

She considers for a moment before closing the window and walks away. Your heart sinks when she disappears, your hopes going with her. You aren't sure what to do and are trying to figure out some way to get in when Bella returns again. She pulls up a phone with a pink cover and holds it up for a second before a light flashes. She took a picture of you! Before you can recover, she tosses something at you which you catch. It was your own phone!

“So, here is what is going to happen. It's clear that you have some self esteem problems so tonight we are going to work on that.”
1543331111111112.title: Bella has a better idea

15433311111111121.content:
"I want you to go take a cute selfie and send it to me." Bella said.

"And then you'll let me back inside?" you asked.

"Depends on how cute it is." Bella giggled and closed the window.

You were still in awe at how that girl had played you. You'd underestimated her for sure. You walked around the house to the backyard, where there was a wicker chaise-lounge, you had seen it when you were chasing Bella around. You needed to sit. You plopped down onto it and started to debate your options.

You can take the selfie... or you can use your phone to call for help, obviously it means letting someone else know how you're dressed but...

You opened your phone and started scrolling through the contact list. You were definitely not calling any of your male friends... And you couldn't call Mrs. Reynolds... But who to call?
15433311111111121.title: Take a cute selfie and send it to Bella

154333111111111211.content:
Jane is nice enough, and she probably won't blackmail you, so this is your best bet.

You think about how exactly you should go about this. Should you plan something big with Jane? Have her pick the lock? Have her talk to Bella? Have her take you home, potentially jeapordising your babysitting gig?

You dial the phone.

"...Brian?" She asks, confused.

"It's me." "You say in a hushed voice. "I need you to...."
154333111111111211.title: Jane, a friend from school

1543331111111112111.content:
"Help you out with what?" Jane asked.

You took a deep breath.

"Okay, I'm babysitting for this girl and she's been a total nightmare." you said.

"Since when do you babysit?" she asked.

"Family friend, doing it as a favor." you replied. "Anyway, I need you to promise not to tell anyone or to laugh."

"I can't guarantee that, but I'll try." Jane said. "Now spill it!"

"So, she knocked a lasagna into my shirt and to say sorry, she ran me a bath filled with hair remover. When I got out, I found out that she had put my clothes into the washing machine, or so she said, I think she really just stole them." you said.

"Devious... So... you're naked while babysitting a little girl?" Jane asked.

"Not exactly." you said.

"What does not exactly mean?"

"I'm wearing a dress. It was only supposed to be until my clothes were ready, but then it escalated into wearing heels, and she put this wig on me, and I fell asleep and she put makeup on my face and did my nails... Then she locked me out of the house." you said. "It's been a bit of a nightmare."

"Sounds like it." Jane suppressed a chuckle. "So what do you want me to do?"

"I don't know, find me spare clothes, come over and help me out with her..." you sighed.

You turned towards the house and saw the blinds of the back window were moving slightly.

You quickly gave Jane the address and hung up the phone, pretending to be taking the selfie that Bella wanted, before actually taking the selfie. You walked up to the window and Bella opened it.

"Gimme the phone." she said.

You handed over your phone and she quickly sent the photo to her phone. She passed your phone back and looked over the selfie. She turned back to you...
1543331111111112111.title: "Help me out."

choices: Bella tells you about what she found on your phone.
Bella saved the cute selfie you took.
15433311111111121111.content:
"I like it!" Bella says.

You bite your tongue when you're going to say something sarcastic, and play along, for now.

"Thank you!" You say in a "cutesy" voice. "Can I come in now, please?"

Bella thinks. "Well..."

"Bella, please."

"Fine, but only if you stay like this for the rest of the night, and be sure to act like a pretty girl while doing it."

Knowing you're safe when Jane comes, you agree to her terms. Bella finally lets you inside.

Bella tosses you your phone. You don't check your phone, but if you did, you'd know she has a screenshot of a conversation between you and Jane.

Bella looks at you...
15433311111111121111.title: Bella likes it

choices: Jane decides to go with it.
154333111111111211111.content:
You walked inside, conscious of how you moved in the dress. You sashayed a bit, attempting to appease Bella. You sat down on the couch again and crossed your legs femininely. "Thanks for letting me back inside, Bella," you attempted to say it as cutesy-like as possible, but it came out just a bit caustically. Bella looked at you crossly. "I know you called Jane. That's not a thing a nice, pretty girl like yourself would do!" You looked at her, surprised. "I--I..." you said breathlessly.

"You keep lying to me! I should send this all to your family and friends!" She started furiously typing on her phone, preparing to text her blackmail out to everyone you knew! "Wait... Wait... I'll-I'll..." Bella looked at you. "I'll make Jane go away," you said. Bella looked at you. "No no, you'll do something better. You'll convince her how much fun you're having."

You were about to say something snippy in response, but then you remembered Bella's hand over the send message button. You pushed through the awkwardness, and clasped your hands together. "Oh, how lovely, I can't wait to make a new friend!" you said. Then suddenly, the doorbell rang. Bella looked at you expectantly. You said, "Oooh, that must be Jane!" You jumped up from the couch and smoothed out your dress before walking over to the door, attempting to do it in the most girly way possible.

You opened the door, and it was Jane. When she saw you, her jaw dropped. "Br... Brian? Is that you?" Standing before her was a teenage girl in a cute dress and heels. Her face, maybe, was a bit androgynous, but she otherwise looked cute. "No!" you said, looking back at Bella. "My name is, Bri--...anna, uh, Brianna!"
154333111111111211111.title: Bella tells you about what she found on your ph...

1543331111111112111111.content:
"Brianna, huh?" Jane asks. "And I assume that you're the babysitter?"

"Sure am!" you smiled.

"Well, I was here to deliver something to a friend of mine, but it seems like he isn't here." Jane started.

"Whatcha got there?" Bella asked, pushing past you.

Jane knelt over to look face to face with Bella, still smiling.

"And who might you be?" Jane asked.

"Bella." Bella replied.

"Okay, Bella. It's a change of clothes. I heard that his got a lasagna dumped on them." Jane said.

"Well no one here needs a change of clothes, right Brianna?" Bella asked. "Especially not icky boy clothes, right?"

"Right." you sighed.

"No, I want you to say it." Bella's hand hovered over her phone.

"I don't need any icky boy clothes!" you exclaimed.

"Say, Brianna, do you like being Bella's babysitter?" Jane asked.

"Oh... uh..." you started.

Bella turned to you, holding the phone out.

"Oh, it's my most favorite thing in the world!" you said, in the most feminine way possible, clasping your hands together.

"And aren't we having so much fun?" Bella asked.

"We sure are!" you said, through a grin that wanted to be a grimace.

"So we don't need any help or any boy clothes, you can go now." Bella said.

"Are you really having fun, Brianna?" Jane asked you, locking eyes.

You gulped and then nodded. Jane...
1543331111111112111111.title: Jane decides to go with it.

15433311111111121111112.content:
Jane can see there's something weird going on, and decides to play along.

"Well, since you're having so much fun, I guess I'll go!" Jane says as she turns to leave; winking at you as she leaves.

You don't know how to respond to that, and Bella just smiles.

"You see, Brianna? Now she'll tell all your friends about today! But maybe I'll call and tell her to stop, if you do what I say." Bella said with a smirk.

You don't respond, cause you're busy thinking of what Jane'll do.
15433311111111121111112.title: Jane doesn't buy it

choices: For the next hour, Bella forces you to learn new mannerisms.
154333111111111211111121.content:
Bella closed the door after Jane left. "Here's how it's going to be, Brianna. You have to finish your transformation into a pretty girl! And for the rest of the night, you have to talk and be happy like you have been doing! Any slip-up, and I'll send the message, and not call Jane." You were still trying to figure out what Jane was planning, but Bella's words brought you back to the reality of your situation.

"So, Brianna, do you want to finish becoming a pretty girl now?" your young tormentor asked. You clenched your fists, almost ready to attack her, but then stopped. Even though she wasn't physically stronger than you, she held all the power here. You clasped your hands together and sputtered out, "I--I'd love to, Bella!" You almost choked on the words, bordering on tears. Bella was not satisfied with anything less than a perfect illusion, so she made you repeat your answer a few more times until your tone, smile, and posture were "proper for a cute girl like yourself!"

Fifteen minutes later, Bella had forced you to don the bra that matched the panties she gave you earlier, and also to wear a waist cincher her mother owned. The two new articles of clothing changed how the dress sat on your body. The stuffed bra and the cincher filled it out and caused it to cling tightly to your upper body. This lifted the skirt up and outwards. It now ended two or three inches above your knees. Still cute and appropriate, but a bit more daring.

You stared at yourself in the mirror, wondering how you got yourself into this situation. With your new "breasts" and figure, the last vestiges of your masculinity were gone. "Finally, Brianna, just to make sure you don't go back on our deal..." Bella approached you from behind, and touched something to the upper part of the back of the dress. You turned around to see her holding a bottle of quick-drying glue in her hands. "This will make sure your pretty dress stays on all night, Brianna. Don't worry, I have the solvent."

Earlier, you would have been furious, but now you were just defeated. You put on your best girly smile and said, "Thanks a lot, Bella! You're one of the nicest friends a girl could have! I wouldn't want my favorite dress to come loose!" Bella smiled, and said, "What else are you thankful for, Bri?" She gestured to your new assets. Sighing inwardly, you also also "enthusiastically" thanked her for her "help" with finishing your transformation.

When was Jane coming back?

- For the next hour, Bella forces you to learn new mannerisms.
- You can't handle it anymore.
154333111111111211111121.title: Jane's Plan

choices: Jane returns, her plan in action.
1543331111111112111111211.content:
For the next hour, Bella forced you to walk, talk, and interact more femininely. She dedicated about 20 minutes to each task. Her hand ever on the phone, you couldn't do anything but participate in her twisted game. With all the practice you'd had earlier in the evening, this hour of intensive focus went very smoothly. By the end of the hour, you were moving naturally in your new footwear, slightly swaying your hips, and talking in a soft and subservient voice that oozed pleasantness. Your vocabulary was also littered with ridiculous things teenage girls might say. Your jaw was starting to hurt from smiling so much, but Bella wouldn't have anything less than you acting like a "nice, pretty girl."

And then the phone rang. The caller ID showed Bella's parents. You sashayed over to the phone and put it on speakerphone at Bella's insistence. So as not to arouse suspicion, she let you talk in your normal voice.

"Hello, Brian! This is Mrs. Reynolds. Is everything going okay?"

"Yes, of course, Mrs. Reynolds! Bella is an absolute angel!" you replied.

"Wonderful, wonderful. I just wanted to let you know that something has come up and we'll be out much later than anticipated, and probably won't return until tomorrow morning. Would you be able to stay and watch Bella overnight? I've already cleared it with your parents."

Your heart skipped a beat. You gulped. Bella grinned mischievously at you.

You nodded. "Of course, Mrs. Reynolds. I'll see you tomorrow!"

After you hung up the phone, Bella looked at you expectantly, and you instantly slipped back into the role of Brianna. "O-M-G Bella, looks like we get to hang out for the rest of the night!" You clapped your hands together with false excitement. Bella was happy too. "I can't wait to stay up so late!" she squealed. She ran over and hugged you. "You're, like, the best babysitter ever, Brianna!" You muttered, "Yeah, I guess I am..."
1543331111111112111111211.title: For the next hour, Bella forces you to learn ne...

choices: Yes! Brianna is back for the night!
No. Liberate the solvent from the enemy!
15433311111111121111112111.content:
With Brianna hugging you, it was finally Jane's time to act. She had been at the back door for the last hour. She had watched everything Bella put you through. At first she didn't really believe your insane story, but after seeing you and also watching the continued psychological abuse from your young charge, she was determined to help you. The back door was unlocked--Bella's parents didn't think it needed to be locked with a babysitter present--so Jane's plan would work easily. She sneaked in through the kitchen, and burst into the living room, startling both of you. In the confusion, Bella dropped the phone! She and Jane scrambled for it, but the older girl easily overpowered Bella. Soon, Jane was holding the phone, and Bella had lost all her leveage! You were saved!

Jane said, "When I came to the front door, I didn't believe 'Brianna' here was actually having fun. And then I watched what you were doing for the past hour! Shame on you, Bella!" The young girl's eyes were starting to become clouded by tears. Genuine or not, soon Bella was bawling and blubbering. Through choked back tears and sniffles, she tried to explain how she was just playing a fun game, and it maybe went too far. You still stood there, not a hint of masculinity about you. Even you felt a pang of empathy for Bella. She was just a kid, after all.

Unsure of what to do, Jane sent Bella to her room. Her wailing could be heard all the way up the stairs and into her bedroom before she shut the door. After she left, the two of you sat down to talk. You instinctively smoothed out your dress and crossed your legs. "I have to admit, you definitely have the movements down! And you look very pretty!" Jane was the first to speak, breaking the awkward tension with a bad joke. You smiled and blurted out "Thanks!" in the ridiculous voice you'd been practicing for the past hour, before coughing and saying, "I, uhh... Yes. Thanks? Thank you for coming to help me."

Jane just nodded. "I have a change of clothes for you." Eagerly, you jumped off the couch and took the clothes. You tried to remove the dress ... only to remember that Bella had glued it shut. It was also too tight to just pull up over your head. With a sigh, you flopped back down on the couch with your legs spread out. "I forgot that she glued the dress shut," you explained. "I'm not sure where she put the solvent. It's probably in her bedroom."

Bella's wailing could still be heard upstairs. Jane asked, "What do we do about her anyway? She seemed to take this pretty hard. Maybe she was just having fun and got carried away?" You shrugged. "Honestly, I just want to get out of these clothes," you complained. Jane smiled and said, "Well, we can at least start by deleting the stuff on the phone." She started swiping through all the photos and texts, deleting them one by one. She laughed at a few where you had posed like a girl. "You're really convincing, you know!" You scowled at her.

Jane had thought of a plan about what to do with Bella. "So, I know you won't like this idea, but what if you stay like this for tonight? Show Bella that you're a good sport, but we also clearly explain the limits of personal space and games like this? She seems really traumatized by this experience, and I'm sure she didn't mean for it to go this far."

Your first instinct was to blurt out "Absolutely not," but you decided against it. Bella did seem traumatized, and maybe she was just having fun. Were you just a poor sport?
15433311111111121111112111.title: Jane returns, her plan in action.

154333111111111211111121111.content:
You thought about it long and hard, mulling over the night so far in your head. You eventually decided that Bella just got carried away, and while she needed a clear lesson on personal space, she was ultimately just having fun. You stood up and smoothed out your dress. You returned your voice to that of Brianna, and said, "Alright, let's go talk to her!" Jane smiled and put a hand on your shoulder. "That's the spirit."

The two of you went upstairs to Bella's room. It was completely silent now, so she must have stopped crying. Jane knocked softly on the door. "Bella? It's Jane." There was no answer. " ... And Briana," you said in your best girly voice. After a slight delay, you heard Bella roll off her bed and walk across the room to open up her door. Her face was red and puffy. She had clearly been crying a lot. You felt sorry for her.

"Can we come in, Bella?" you saked. She nodded, and the two of you entered. Jane took a seat on the computer chair, while you sat on the bed with Bella. Jane said, "Bella, I think you should apologize to Brianna for what you put him--err, her through. You should ask permission before doing these kind of things." You nodded. "I'm not mad at you any more Bella... but please, just ask next time." The girl muttered, "If I asked, you wouldn't have done it." You nodded in agreement, but said, "That's probably true, but now I'm here. And I'm willing to stay dressed up for tonight, provided you give me the solvent now."

When you said you planned to stay dressed up, Bella's eyes lit up. She hopped off the bed immediately and ran to her closet. She dug through it and pulled out a bottle of clear liquid. Placing it in your hands, she apologized. "I'm sorry, I've always... I've always just wanted a big sister." You hugged her and said, "Well you'll at least have one for tonight."

You took the solvent from Bella and handed it to Jane. A few minutes later, the glue was dissolved and the dress's zipper was working again! You had almost gotten used to the secure tightness of the dress, bra, and body shaper that you were encased in, and it felt weird to feel the fabric of the dress loosen. But soon, Jane zipped you back up, and it felt "normal" again. At the same time, you couldn't wait to get out of these clothes later.

Jane said, "I unfortunately have to leave. But I'm sure the two of you will have good fun! Bella, you can have your phone back in the morning." She handed the phone to you. Bella was clearly not happy, but she accepted Jane's decision. And then, Jane left! Once again, you were alone with Bella.

"Sooo," you said in your cutesy voice, "What should we do now?"
154333111111111211111121111.title: Yes! Brianna is back for the night!

1543331111111112111111211111.content:
"Board games!" Bella said, excitedly. She rushed past you, downstairs to the living room. You followed as quickly as you could in your dainty heels. Bella had already setting up the game when you arrived. You sat down on the ground next to the table, covering your bare legs with the skirt of your dress. Bella sat down across from you, and said, "The goal of the game is to collect as many points as possible as you move around the board!" You looked at the game box. It was some simple rolling dice and move game. There was very little, if any, strategy involved. Smiling, you said, "Alright, let's play!"

Bella defeated you quickly. She was halfway around the board with twice the number of points at the end. You lost handily. "I'll go get us some drinks and snacks, and we can keep playing, Bri!" You nodded to her, and re-read the rules of the game while Bella went to the kitchen. She brought back two sodas and some chips, and the game continued! After reading the rules again, you figured out that there was a trick to the game. You easily beat Bella in the second round.

She said, "We should up the stakes. If I win, you have to do whatever I say. If you win, you can take off the outfit!" That didn't sound fair, as you had no idea what Bella would ask you to do. "What would you ask me to do, exactly?" You eyed the girl suspiciously. Her smile was too happy. She said, "I'm not telling. But do you want out of the outfit or not?" You your eyes at her, jokingly. "It's on!" you exclaimed.

Believe it or not, you were actually having fun.
1543331111111112111111211111.title: Board games

choices: Confess you're actually starting to like the outfit
15433311111111121111112111112.content:
The next match is actually close.
It comes down to the wire in the last turn. You were neck and neck.

"Your move." Bella answers and hands you the dice. You roll and take a deep breath, looking the numbers in. It's enough.

So you move your piece to the end.

"I win." you answer and take a deep breath. On one hand, you can now freely take the outfit off. But, you remember what happened last time. So you...
15433311111111121111112111112.title: You win.

154333111111111211111121111122.content:
"Aren't you going to take the dress off?" Bella inquires.

You take a deep breath, resisting the urge to just sigh.

"I actually starting to like this outfit." you whisper and kneel down to be at Bella's level. "Would you mind if I stayed in this for now?"

Bella lit up and lightly jumped up and down.

"Of course, Brianna!" she answers. "Do you want to work more on your mannerisms or your physical appearance?"
154333111111111211111121111122.title: Confession

1543331111111112111111211111222.content:
"Physical Appearance." you answer and watch Bella run off to somewhere.

So you wait patiently in the room. While there's a temptation to just get up and leave, you stay put.

Eventually, Bella returns with what looks to be a makeup kit.

"How about we start with some makeup, Brianna?" she suggests and you nod, taking a moment to sit yourself down.
1543331111111112111111211111222.title: Physical Appearance

15433311111111121111112111112221.content:
What follows, is kind of a blur.

Not because you fell asleep. But more because you can't quite see what's going on at the moment.

When she finally finishes, you find yourself staring into a mirror. Somehow, Bella managed to do quite a good job on your face. Lipstick covered the right places and a little blush covered your cheeks.

"Thanks." you whisper, letting a smile form on your face. "Anything else?"
15433311111111121111112111112221.title: The makeup looks surprisingly good

choices: It's alright for girls to love girls
I guess you have a point
154333111111111211111121111122212.content:
"How about we work on your mannerisms, Brianna." Bella explains, looking to your phone. "You're really looking like a girl now."

"Is something wrong?"

Bella just chuckles.

"Well, you have a girlfriend. But you look like a girl, Brianna." Bella adds and you take a deep breath, While she has a point, this something you had quite thought about. You would have to talk to Jane over this.
154333111111111211111121111122212.title: Mannerisms...kinda

1543331111111112111111211111222121.content:
You grab your phone and take a photo. You send it in a d

One ring.

Two rings.

Three rings.

"This is Jane. I saw your photo."

You take a deep breath.

"I trust in your decision." she answers. A part of you wishes she was here. But for now, you can wait.
1543331111111112111111211111222121.title: It's alright for girls to love girls

15433311111111121111112111112221211.content:
With that now solved, you set your phone back down.

Your attention then turns to Bella.

"We're still a couple." you explain and watch her nod.

"Got it." she answers and turns her attention to your hair. "Would you mind if I brush it?"

You shake your head and watch her pull a brush out. She pulls it through your hair. It felts quite heavenly to an extent. You actually kind of like it. Not that you're quite ready to admit it yet.

"Now if this was just a bit longer." Bella remarks and you chuckle. She has a point. Kinda.

"I guess." you answer as an idea comes to you. "Let's..."
15433311111111121111112111112221211.title: Hair Care

154333111111111211111121111122212111.content:
"Play some girly games." you finish and watch Bella perk up.

You let out a girlish chuckle in return. While not intentional, it sounded right.

"What do you have in mind?" Bella starts and you do a quick search around the room. Eventually, you focus in one a couple dolls.

"How about dolls?"

"Works for me."

What follows, is a bunch of make-believe. There's no really set theme or story. It's really just whatever you and Bella want it to be.
154333111111111211111121111122212111.title: Make-believe

1543331111111112111111211111222121111.content:
Of course, all good things have to end eventually.

"It's time for bed, Bella." you explain and watch her sigh. "Hey. We can play some more in the morning, when your mom gets back."

That seems to put her in a better mood. But that also leaves you in a bit of a predicament. Which of course Bella picks up on.

"Would you like some pajamas, Brianna?" Bella inquired and held out what looked to be a night gown. While you had forgotten to bring your own set of pajamas, something about it seemed to call to you.

"Uh..." you answer. On one hand, it would mean you could stay in your current setup. But by that same token, it might be good to get out of this.
1543331111111112111111211111222121111.title: Bedtime

15433311111111121111112111112221211111.content:
"I'll take you up on that offer." you answer and Bella hands you the night gown.

What follows, is you slipping off the dress and heels. Then it's a matter of getting the night gown on in place of it. The garment actually felt quite nice against your skin. Kind of a surprise for you.

"Perfect." you whisper, noticing your attempt at a girly tone. After, you focused in on Bella.

Currently, she dressed in a similar outfit. The only real difference was the color. Not that you minded. Especially since you were taking a selfie to commemerate this moment. You make sure to send it to Jane.

"Ready for bed?" you whispered and watch Bella nod.

"Of course, Brianna!" she answers and heads for her room. For the moment, you take the couch. It would be rude to sleep in the master bedroom.
15433311111111121111112111112221211111.title: Take Bella's offer

154333111111111211111121111122212111111.content:
You fall asleep quite quickly.

A dream takes you in.

In it, you are a princess trapped in a tall tower. A fearsome beast guards you, preventing you from getting out.

"I'm here to save you!" a voice announces.

You peer out of the tower.

There, what looks to be a woman clad in armor approaches. You perk up.

"Begone monster!"

She charges her way up the tower, slashing the fearsome beast in two.

"Thank you." you whisper in a girly tone, getting a kiss in turn. After, the woman picks you up bridal-style. "You're quite cute, by the way."

The woman blushes.

"I would say the same of you, princess." she answers and jumps down to the ground below.
154333111111111211111121111122212111111.title: You have a girly dream

1543331111111112111111211111222121111111.content:
The moment the dream woman reaches the ground, your eyes open up.

"Ugh..." you whisper and sit yourself up. "That was some dream."

Bella wasn't up, so you take a look at your phone.

You have one new message from Jane. Giving it a quick check, you find a thumbs-up emoji.

"Aww..." you whisper to yourself.
1543331111111112111111211111222121111111.title: You wake up

1543331111111112111111211111222121111111.content:
For the moment, you decide to go and check on Bella.

The walk over to her room is surprisingly peaceful. Even if a set of slippers would've really helped right now.

When you reach her door, you carefully peak your head in. For the moment, Bella is asleep.

Now might be a good time to get yourself dressed. Or perhaps it would be best to peacefully watch.
1543331111111112111111211111222121111111.title: Go check on Bella

1543331111111112111111211111222121111111.content:
You decide to wait for her to wake up.

She's actually kind of cute - for the minute or two longer that she's asleep.

"Morning, Brianna." Bella greets and you crack a smile.

"Morning, Bella." you greet back in a bit of a girly tone. "Would you like breakfast now?"
1543331111111112111111211111222121111111.title: Wait on her

choices: You're actually a pretty good cook
1543331111111112111111211111222121111111.content:
"Yes please!" Bella answers and you nod.

With that, you both make your way out of Bella's room.

A short walk to the kitchen follows.

"What exactly would you like for breakfast?" you inquire and take a look into the fridge.

"Waffles, if you could manage that." Bella answers.
1543331111111112111111211111222121111111.title: Breakfast

1543331111111112111111211111222121111111.content:
While you don't consider yourself that much of a cook, you get to work.

You search the nearby cabinets, eventually finding what looks to be a cookbook.

Cracking it open, you find the recipe for waffles.

What follows, is the two of you getting to the actual cooking process.

Is surprisingly zen to an extent. Not quite what you were expecting.

"There we go!" you announce, all happy and giddy with your accomplishment. Kind of like a girl to some extent. You make sure to snap a pic, of course.

After, you dig on in. There quite tasty.
1543331111111112111111211111222121111111.title: You're actually a pretty good cook

1543331111111112111111211111222121111111.content:
With breakfast now solved, you set your sights on getting dressed.

"I guess I can wear the same outfit as yesterday." you think, finding the clothes you wore yesterday nearby.

Slipping out of the night gown, you make quick work in getting yesterday's outfit on.

"Dang. I look quite fabalous." you thought, chuckling right after. It's actually quite natural for you to speak like this. You could get used to this.
1543331111111112111111211111222121111111.title: Get dressed

choices: Mrs Reynolds understands, letting you keep everything you have on at the moment
Mrs Reynold is shocked, not even paying you for your services
1543331111111112111111211111222121111111.content:
You hear a car roll in.

Making a mad dash to a nearby window.

There, you can see Mrs Reynolds get out her car.

You don't really have enough to really change.

"Hi, Mrs Reynolds."
1543331111111112111111211111222121111111.title: Bella's mom shows up

1543331111111112111111211111222122.content:
You thought about Bella's point for a minute. You did like Jane, but if you looked like a girl, you definitely should act more like one. You put the thought of "a boyfriend" out of your head for the moment. The first step was to make more girl friends: that is, friends who are girls. You had Bella take a stunning picture of you, and then you sent a message to Jane: "Hey, we should be besties and hang out some time! XO -Brianna" Your manicured finger hesitated for a second over the send button, but finally, you hit it. It took under 30 seconds for the phone to ring. You answered it immediately.

Jane was on the other end, practically screaming, "Did she take the phone again?!" You assured her that, no, it was definitely your decision to send the message. You even told this to her in your normal voice, to reassure her. Bella also jumped in the background, shouting, "Hiii Janeee!" Although Jane found the whole situation very weird, given the earlier debacle, she said that she was open to hanging out with Brianna at least once.

After the awkward phone call ended, you returned your focus to Bella. You said, "Okay, now I'm ready to practice more acting like a girl!" Bella clapped with delight and the two of you spent a few more hours practicing everything. She started with the way you send text messages. Soon enough, she had you talking like a teenage girl both verbally and in writing. Then, it was time for the big test: how to flirt with a boy over text.

Bella said, "Just pick a celebrity you find attractive, and write a fake message to him!" It was very difficult in the beginning. First, you had to actually pick someone you could objectively judge as an attractive male. You didn't think you were wired for liking men, but you followed Bella's advice to the letter. You did manage to finally compose some cute, flirty fake text messages to your chosen celebrity, but you felt kind of disgusted afterwards. Bella asked, "What's wrong? You don't like creating the texts?" You slowly shook your head no. "Well, I'm sure you'll get used to it! You're doing great!" That made you feel good, oddly.

The next thing to go over was more practice of body language. This came much more naturally to you, as you had been practicing it all night. Now that you were not under a threat, you excelled. You sort of felt like you were in a land of make-believe. No one was judging you, and no one was going to expose you. It just felt fun. Maybe also natural, but you weren't sure about that yet.

The practice continued late into the night. Eventually, it was time for bed. Bella said, "My parents come back tomorrow. But you can keep the outfit. My mom has a lot of clothes, and she won't notice these go missing." She then ran upstairs, eventually coming back with super-casual pajamas that were clearly made with women in mind. They were blue short-shorts and a white tank top. If you wore them, you'd need to keep wearing the bra, panties, and waist cincher for them to fit properly. You also didn't have your own pajamas.

Bella held them out to you, "You have to sleep over! You might as well get the full experience, right?"
1543331111111112111111211111222122.title: I guess you have a point

choices: Spend most of the week as Brianna.
Spend most of the week as yourself.
15433311111111121111112111112221222.content:
You decided to go all the way, and just keep it up overnight. You took the outfit from Bella, and then went to a separate room to change. You shimmied out of the dress and shoes. The now-familiar tightness of the dress vanished when you removed it, but it was soon replaced by a similar tightness from the tank top and shorts. The shorts reached about 30 percent down to your thighs, and the tank top held you secure. With what you wore underneath, it looked like you had breasts.

When Bella saw you, she giggled and said, "You look great!" You shrugged, and tucked her into bed. You went to sleep yourself, very confused after such a strange day. You dreamed yourself as a woman, taken by an undefined man. You wore a beautiful dress, similar to the one Bella had trapped you in the day before. Except this time, the dress was long, a gown that swept the floor. You danced with the man, lost in his arms the whole night.

And then, you woke up. You had set the alarm quite early so that you could avoid Bella's parents. You changed out of the pajamas, the underwear, and then finally back into your own clothes. They felt scratchy and itchy. But you knew that it was required. You squirreled the clothes away into a bag, and woke up Bella. She was visibly dismayed by your appearance, but didn't say anything about it. The morning proceeded normally, and eventually Bella's parents showed up.
