You accepted their payment and left, taking a new set of clothes and a very confused mindset with you.

The next days were strange. You planned to hang out with Jane as Brianna, but otherwise you existed sort of in a limbo. You didn't feel at ease acting as yourself, nor as Brianna. You toyed with the idea of practicing your girly mannerisms by writing more fake flirty texts to celebrities, but also delving more into your normal hobbies. Hanging out with Jane was scheduled for the end of the week, but until then, you had free time.
15433311111111121111112111112221222.title: Use the ones Bella provided

choices: Go outside and bring Bella in
Keep an eye out from inside
15433311111112.content:
You look all over the house, but Bella is nowhere to be found. At first you were angry, but now you're getting worried.

Seeing a glimpse of movement out a window, you carefully pull the curtain back.

You sigh a breath of relief. Bella was outside in the yard, playing with a fairy doll.

However as you start to turn away from the window, you see someone walk up to her.

It looks like a boy around your age, maybe a little older. While it looks like he just said something friendly to her to make her laugh, you feel uneasy.

You look down at the dress you are wearing...
15433311111112.title: You see Bella playing outside

choices: Bella offers for you to go out with him after her mom gets home
154333111111121.content:
You gulp, but shake your head resolutely. Bella is your responsibility. You could just play the part of a girl babysitter.

You take a deep breath and open the door.

The feeling of the slight breeze ruffling the skirt of the dress is strange to your legs, but You carefully make your way towards Bella and try to stay in character.

"Bella." you say, trying to sound like a girl, "I need you to come inside, ok?"

"This is your babysitter?" the boy gives you a look over before giving Bella a smile, "She's cute. What's your name?"

You blush in embarrassment, so Bella answered before you could, smiling wide, "Her name's Brandi! And she doesn't have a boyfriend!"

"Bella!" you say quietly, your cheeks flushed red.

"Pretty girl like you? How could that be true?" the boy smiled, "I could change that if you want. My name's Cody, if you want to get together sometime..."
154333111111121.title: Go outside and bring Bella in

1543331111111211.content:
"I'm not interested." you said and grabbed Bella, dragging her back towards the house.

You shut the door behind you and angrily turned to Bella.

"Mom and Dad volunteered me to babysit the neighbor's kids, but I'm busy."

"Why?"

"Because you made my boyfriend angry at me, I had to make it up to him by planning to hang out with him this weekend, but I can't just bail on the Johnsons. So you have to do one, and I don't think you want to be around my boyfriend again."

"No. What do you usually do when you babysit them?"

"They're usually pretty well behaved. There's only two of them."

"That's not so bad."

"Nope. But now I have to drill you more before tomorrow."

"Ugh."

"Let's get cracking."
1551111111122112112111222112.title: Something else

1552.content:
This sucked. It really really blew. It's a long story, so let's start at the beginning. You tried out for the school play, since you wanted to have at least one extra-curricular on your record. So, the play was the easiest, you figured you'd be an extra or something. Unfortunately, not enough girls tried out, and you were made an understudy for the lead female role. The director assured you that it was just a formality, and would get you your credit for being in the play, all you had to do was learn the lines. You figured it was going to be painless.

How wrong you were. The lead actress, Katherine, got sick with the flu, the week right before the play was scheduled to open. You knew the lines, sure, but you can't go dressed as a girl in front of the entire school. Which is what you were attempting to explain to the director, Ms. Hanson.

"Listen, Ross, I am in a bind. We need someone who can act, and knows the lines. No one can do either of those things as well as you. Well, Katherine can, but you know why that won't work." Ms. Hanson said.

"Isn't there any other way? I'll never live it down! I still have a year left at this school!" you shouted.

"I'm sorry. There just isn't any other way." Ms. Hanson said. "I wish there was."

"Fine..." you pouted.

"Dress rehearsals start tomorrow, so come down to my office after school and we'll see about making you look like the character." Ms. Hanson said.

You sigh and leave the room, and take your script out. What play are you doing anyway?
1552.title: The Understudy

15521.content:
Of course, Romeo and Juliet is a staple of high school drama departments. You walk into Ms. Hanson's office after school and drop your bag behind her desk. She looks up from her computer.

"Ah, there you are. I know this is hard but you can get the billing as the lead, so that's gotta count for something." Ms. Hanson said. "And you're a true Shakespearean actor. Back in his day, men played the parts for women."

"I guess." you said. "But Shakespearean actors didn't have to deal with kids who make fun of them."

"Sit down, and let me go get something." she said, leaving the room.

You plopped down in a seat and sighed. This was going to be so embarrassing. A few minutes later, Ms. Hanson returned along with two other girls from the play. Suzy, who was playing Montague's wife, and Holly, who was in stage crew and was in charge of the props.

"Okay, Ross. I explained the predicament to them, and they've agreed to not make fun of you." Ms. Hanson said.

"I find it really admirable. Katherine wouldn't want anyone else but you in the role." Suzy said.

"And if anyone wants to make fun of you for doing it, we'll beat them up." Holly said.

"Thanks you guys." you said.

"Anyway, if you don't want to get made fun of, you need to be a passable girl." Suzy said.

"Which is why we're here, so we can help Ms. Hanson turn you into one!" Holly said.

"Oh boy..." you said.

"Where to start? Because it'll take a lot to make you look like a girl. We're lucky you're pretty thin." Suzy said.

"I think you should start with his..." Ms Hanson started.
15521.title: Romeo and Juliet

155211.content:
"His face and his hair." Ms. Hanson said. "We have some stage makeup that can help with making sure he can pass as a girl."

"Let's work on the face first." Suzy said.

"Good idea." Holly said.

The girls started to work on you, and it was a barrage of powders and cosmetics that you'd never seen before. You sat there, waiting for it to be finished and after what felt like an eternity, it was. Suzy and Holly looked your face up and down, and Ms. Hanson smiled.

"He looks great, we just have to fix the hair..." Ms. Hanson said. "But we can use a wig for that, cause his hair is much too short."

"I know just the one!" Suzy said. "You know which one, Ms. Hanson."

"Oh, that one! That would be perfect!" Ms. Hanson said. "Holly, go get that from the costume room."

"Will do, Ms. Hanson!" Holly said, running out of the room.

"Can I see what I look like?" you asked, since you could feel the makeup weighing down your face, especially your eyes and lips.

"Not until we're completely finished." Ms. Hanson said, as Holly walked in with a brown wig. It had a French Braid.

They placed the wig on your head and messed around with it for a bit, and then placed a mirror in front of your face. You looked at your face, and stared into the mirror.

"Is that... me?" you asked.

"Yep." Ms. Hanson said.

"You look like a girl!" Suzy said. "I think we did great!"

"You did." Ms. Hanson said.

What's next?
155211.title: Face/Hair

1552111.content:
You walk into the first dress rehearsal, still thinking of the previous day when you were dressed as a girl. They fit the costume afterwards and they washed everything off and sent you on your way. Ms. Hanson is busy talking to another teacher, so you put your stuff down and take the script down to look over it.

"Hey..." a voice said. You look up and see Dan, the guy playing Romeo.

"Hey." you replied.

"Listen, I know it's going to be awkward, but we're all thespians here, right?" he asked.

"But I'm not gay." you replied.

"Thespian means actor," he said.

"Oh..." you said.

"Anyway, if you can do it, I can put aside my sexuality and do this play." he said.

"I'll do that too. For the sake of acting."

"For acting."

"Okay, everyone time to get in costume." Ms. Hanson said. Holly and Suzy walked up to you, and led you to an area to change.

"Okay, so we have everything we need to make you appear as Juliet." Holly said.

"So, strip to your skivvies." Suzy said.

"Can you turn around?" you asked.

"Fine, but you have to get more comfortable around us. It's just us girls here." Holly laughed.

"Ha, ha" you said, taking your shirt and pants off.

"Put these on." Suzy said, handing you a bra and panties. The bra was padded, as were the panties.

You put them on and Suzy handed you the dress  . You put it on, plus the shoes, which had a two inch heel.

"Time for rehearsal to start!" Ms. Hanson said.

"Let's go." Holly said. "No need for makeup for a dress rehearsal, since we don't want to waste it."

"Okay..."

What next?
1552111.title: The first dress rehearsal

15521111.content:
Rehearsal started and it went off without a hitch. You read the lines and everything went great. When it was over, you took the dress off and Ms. Hanson, Holly and Suzy took you aside.

"That was great..." Ms. Hanson said.

"But you're acting too manly. You need to have female mannerisms!" Holly said.

"So we're going to teach you how to act like a girl." Suzy said.

"Okay, I guess..." you said.

"Great, we can get started tomorrow." Holly said.
15521111.title: Rehearsal starts.

155211111.content:
You walk into the auditorium and Holly and Suzy are waiting for you.

"Where's Ms. Hanson?" you ask.

"She had to leave early, so we're going to teach you how to act like a girl." Holly said.

"Okay." you said.

"First of all, take your shoes off." Holly said.

"Okay..." you took your shoes and socks off.

"Here, put these on." Suzy said, handing you a pair of 4 inch heels.

"Why?"

"To train you to walk like a girl!" Suzy said.

You put the shoes on, and started walking around, teetering on the heels when you stood still.

"Great! Just remember to take smaller steps. Now your arms. You can't let them swing, you have to hold them a certain way."

"Okay..." you tried to walk like a girl and kept your arms fixed.

"That reminds me, sitting like a girl. Put this on." Holly handed you a skirt.

What type of skirt is it?
155211111.title: After school

1552111111.content:
It was a knee length pleated skirt, the kind that a schoolgirl would wear. They turned around as you swapped your shorts for the skirt. You sat in a chair like you'd normally do.

"No, no no. Not like that. Cross your legs and put your hands in your lap." Suzy said, moving your arms and legs into the proper position. "See?"

"Yeah." you said.

"We should go over hygiene. Like your skin and nails. They have to be good for the show."

"Okay." you said.

"I think we should give you a facial and a manicure, but we don't have the stuff to do that here." Holly said.

"I have stuff for it at my house. It's only a few blocks away."

"Good! Let's go!" Suzy said grabbing her bag.

"What about me?" you asked.

"Come with us, duh!" Suzy said.

"No, the skirt and heels!"

"Oh right. Change out of them and put them in your bag. I want you to practice at home."

"Okay..." you said.
1552111111.title: Knee length

15521111111.content:
You get to Suzy's house and walk into her room, her parents are apparently not at home.

"Okay, go sit in that chair while we get the stuff ready." Suzy said.

"Got it." you said, and sat down in the chair.

Suzy picked up stuff off her vanity and handed some of it to Holly. They walked back over to you and put the stuff on a table.

"Just relax and let us do all the work." Suzy said in a calm relaxing voice.

Okay." you said, and lay back.

You began to feel drowsy, since the past few days had been tiring, and with Suzy and Holly rubbing the facial mask onto your face, it felt, really relaxing. You fell asleep as they finished up with your face.

"Oh, he fell asleep. How adorable." Suzy said.

"How about we give him a pedicure after the manicure, round it off." Holly said.

"Great idea." Suzy said as they got to work on your hands. They filed the nails and coated them with a very light pink nail polish that no one would notice, along with a clear coat. After, they moved to your feet and filed the toenails and painted them with a darker pink polish. As they dried, you continued to sleep and Suzy and Holly waited until the mask was dry.
15521111111.title: To Suzy's house

155211111111.content:
You woke up and saw Holly and Suzy sitting on Suzy's bed looking at their phones.

"Oh. you're awake!" Holly said. "We took the mask off while you were asleep. We figured you deserved a nap."

"Thanks..." you said, feeling your face. It was very soft. "Wow."

"Yeah, that's why us girls do it. It feels good."

"I guess so. Hey, my nails look weird."

"We used a clear coat. Don't worry, lots of guys get manicures."

"Whatever you say. Shouldn't we get to rehearsal?"

"Crap, you're right!" Suzy said.

"Grab your stuff!" Holly said as you all grabbed your stuff.
155211111111.title: Waking up

1552111111111.content:
You returned to the school and started rehearsal yet again. You were more adept at walking in the lower heels thanks to the practice, and you felt really refreshed by the facial and the manicure. The rehearsal went well and you finished up another successful day's work and started to pack your stuff, noticing the skirt and heels in your bag. You thought about what your parents would say if they saw them... You brushed away the thought and resolved to keep them hidden, since you doubt your parents would understand the reasoning of you having them.

Suddenly, Suzy walked up to you.

"Hey, I was wondering, do you want to hang out this weekend?" she asked, you remembered it was Friday.

"Oh, sure!" you said.

"Cool, here's my number." she said handing you a piece of paper. "Text me."

"Okay!" you said, and put the paper in your pocket. You grabbed your stuff and prepared to go home.
1552111111111.title: At rehearsal

15521111111111.content:
You sat in your room and remembered the piece of paper. You took it out of your pocket and put it into your phone, sending a text to Suzy, saying who you are. She replied back saying that she put your number in her phone.

"So, what do you want to do this weekend?" she asked through the text.

"I don't know." you said. "You decide."

"Well... Me and a few other girls were thinking about going to the mall and maybe seeing a movie."

"Eh,"

"Come on! You'll get more girl experience because you can observe them in their natural habitat, lol"

"Okay, fine. Where do you want to meet?"

"One of my friends has a car, we'll pick you up, text me your address."

"Got it."

You put down your phone and decided to turn in early. You went to sleep, excited about hanging out with Suzy.
15521111111111.title: Later that night

155211111111111.content:
You woke up, showered and got dressed. You sat around for a bit when your phone went off, and it was a text from Suzy.

"We're outside." she texted.

You grabbed your wallet and ran outside to the car at the curb, the door of the car opened and you climbed in, and looked around. You saw a few girls you recognized from school, and Holly and Suzy.

"Glad you could make it!" Holly said.

"So am I."

"Let me introduce you to everyone. The girl driving is Brooke, and the girl riding shotgun is Morgan." Suzy said.

"Nice to meet you." you said.

"Same to you." Brooke said.

"So, you're Suzy's friend?" Morgan asked. "Or Holly's"

"Little of both." you said.

"Cool."

"And we're here." Brooke said.

You looked out the window to see you had indeed arrived at the mall. You got out of the car and stretched your legs.
155211111111111.title: The next day...

1552111111111111.content:
You walk in with them and you follow them as they look around.

"What should we do?" Brooke asked.

"I dunno. When does the movie start?" Morgan asked.

"Not for like an hour." Brooke said.

"What do you want to do, Ross?" Suzy asked.

"Oh, uh..." you start.

"I've got an idea!" Holly said. "How about?"
1552111111111111.title: Into the mall

15521111111111111.content:
"Yeah!" Brooke said.

"Sounds great!" Morgan said.

"What do you think, Ross?" Suzy asked.

"Oh, that sounds fine." you said.

"Great! Let's go!" Holly said.

The girls and you walked into the nearest clothing store and you found a corner to sit in. Suzy walked over to you.

"You okay?" she asked.

"Yeah, this just isn't my thing. But you guys have fun!" you said.

"You know this place has guy's clothes too." Suzy said. "You know what, I'll make you a deal. I'll buy you an outfit but you have to let me pick it out. But you can try it on and decide if you like it."

"I guess that sounds good." you said.

"Okay, I'll be back." Suzy said, walking away. Suzy returns with a bundle of clothes. What are they?
15521111111111111.title: Shopping!

choices: hey you look great! but I think these would go great with that outfit
while you were in the changing room we all decided that
155211111111111111.content:
A giddy Suzy soon brought back a black denim pair of jeans with matching jacket she said it would go well with the t- shirt you were already wearing.

That would've been fine for you except as soon as you step into the changing room and try the new clothing on you realize the cut of the jeans is tight on you an obvious girls design cut.

You feel awful now as you can't even say no to this outfit for two reasons.

The first reason is because you're not paying, they're a gift.

The second reason to wear this outfit is because having been given a lift to the mall you realize you now have no way home by yourself so right now annoying these girls would be a bad idea, so whatever they say today goes.

You reluctantly belt up the tight jeans and walk out to face Suzy who says...
155211111111111111.title: Masculine looking girl's clothes

1552111111111111111.content:
"Wow! I knew they'd fit, I have an eye for sizing up people. Anyway you look great!" Suzy said.

"Thanks." you said.

"But I think that these would go great with that." Suzy said, handing you a pair of what was obviously women's flats.

"Uh..." you start.

"What's wrong with them?" Suzy asked.

"They're..." you started.

"Guys! We're leaving, come on!" Holly shouted.

"Go change back and I'll pay for everything." Suzy said.

You returned to the changing room and swapped back to your clothes, and left the store carrying a bag with your new outfit in it.

"Where to next?" Brooke asked.

"I'm kinda hungry." Morgan said.

"To the food court it is! We still have time before the movie." Brooke said.
1552111111111111111.title: hey you look great! but I think these would go ...

15521111111111111111.content:
You followed them to the food court and ordered some food and sat down in a booth. You noticed that they sat very properly, and with very good posture, which you'd have to remember up on stage whenever you sat down. You kept observing when a hand waved in front of your face.

"Earth to Ross!" Holly said. "Your food is here."

"Oh." you looked down and saw your food in front of you.

"What were you thinking about?" Morgan asked.

"Oh, nothing." you replied.

"You know I think what you're doing for the play is very brave." Brooke said.

"They know?" you asked.

"Well yeah, I told them that you had to observe us for studying for the role." Suzy said.

"It takes a real man to dress like a woman." Morgan said.

"I guess." you said.

"We're going to use the little girl's room." Brooke said as her and Morgan stood up and walked away.

"So, Ross." Suzy started. "Me, Holly and a few other girls in the play are thinking of having a slumber party the night before the show."

"Good for you, I guess." you said.

"We were wondering if you'd like to be invited." Holly said.

"But I can't go to a slumber party, I'm a guy!" you said. "Either way, neither of our parents will allow it!" you said.

"My parents won't be there. They're going out of the state for the night." Suzy said.

"And mine?" you asked.

"Let us talk to them, we can be very persuasive." Suzy said.

"Girls! The movie is about to start!" Brooke shouted.

"Well, let's go." Suzy said. "Think it over during the movie."

You walk into the theater and discover that the movie you're watching is a chick flick. You prepare to zone out for most of it, but you find yourself oddly intrigued by the film.

When the film ended you walked out of the theater.

"So what do you think?" Suzy asked.

"Uh..." you started.
15521111111111111111.title: To the food court!

155211111111111111111.content:
"You can ask them." you say and you leave the mall to drive home. Your parents are out on the porch, and the girls walk up to them. They tell you to wait inside and you stand by the door trying to listen to what they're saying, but you can't make it out. The conversation ends with your parents smiling and Suzy looking towards the door smiling.

"They actually did it..." you thought. "Wow."

Your parents walked into the room.

"Well, we were hesitant at first, but your friends convinced us. I'm happy you have a nice group of friends." your mom said.

"We know you won't do anything stupid, so don't let us down." your dad said.

"I won't." you said.

What's next?
155211111111111111111.title: You can ask my parents

choices: Pink pajama pants, a pink shirt, pink slippers.
1552111111111111111111.content:
After a few more days of rehearsal and of practicing sitting, walking and talking like a girl, the night before the play comes upon you. The final dress rehearsal ends for that day and you grab your bag, which had the stuff you'd need for the sleepover in it, and you meet Suzy and Holly by the entrance to the school.

"Well, let's go." Holly said, as you started to walk with them, as you got to the corner, you were joined by a larger group of girls, about 10 of them, all from the play, some were backstage hands, some were extras. You saw Brooke, and Morgan, along with Dana, who helped with props, Kelly, who helped with costumes and more of the crew of the play.

You arrived at Suzy's house and started to set up her room with sleeping bags. You put yours against a wall and put your bag down on top of it.

"What should we do first?" Holly asked.

"We should get changed into our pajamas." Brooke said.

"I'll go." you said and quickly walked out of the room. You sat in front of the door, waiting for it to open, wishing there was a keyhole you could peek through. A lot of guys would kill to be at this sleepover. The door opens and the girls are all in their pajamas and you walk in to go get your bag and open it.You rifle through it, and can't find your pajamas.

"What's wrong?" Suzy asked.

"I can't find my pajamas. I thought I put them in here." you replied, suddenly getting the image of the pajamas sitting on your bed, at home."Ugh."

"It's fine, you can borrow something from me." Suzy said.

"I can just sleep in my underwear." you said.

"Not in a room full of girls you will." Suzy said.

"Fine, what do you have?"

"I have..."
1552111111111111111111.title: The sleepover?

15521111111111111111112.content:
"This." Suzy said, holding out a light blue nightgown.

"Is that all you have?" you asked.

"It's all I have in your size. It's a size too big for me." Suzy said.

"Well, okay." you said. You went to the bathroom and put the nightgown on. It wasn't so bad, just really drafty for your legs.

You return to the room and the girls look you up and down.

"Not bad. Although with your legs looking like that, you might as well be a Wookie." Holly said, laughing.

"Yeah..." Suzy said. "She has a point. It might help you sit better if your legs felt different."

"No way! I was fine with the nightgown, but this is too far!" you said.

"Please?" Suzy asked. "It'll be funny!"

"...Fine." you sighed.

"Yay!" Suzy shouted. "To the bathroom!"
15521111111111111111112.title: A light blue babydoll nightgown.

choices: Playing a party game (Twister, Spin the Bottle, Truth or Dare)
155211111111111111111121.content:
You go to the bathroom and sit on the edge of the tub as Suzy lathers up your legs and starts to shave them.

"You are probably the coolest guy I've ever met." Holly said.

"Thanks." you said, blushing.

"No seriously, I've never seen a guy agree to go this far for a role in a play." Holly said. "It's really admirable."

"You guys are just so nice, I could never let you down." you said.

"And we're done." Suzy said, as you felt her rub her hand on your now hairless leg. It felt weird.

"Wow. These are smooth." you said.

"Anyway, let's get back to the room, now that you look proper." Suzy said.

You went back to the room to see the other girls had started...
155211111111111111111121.title: Shaving your legs.

1552111111111111111111211.content:
You walk back in and see the group was in the middle of an argument.

"We should play Twister!" one half of the group shouted.

"No! Spin the bottle!" the other half shouted.

"Twister!"

"Spin the bottle!"

"Let's ask an impartial party. Ross, what should we play?"

"Uh..." you started.
1552111111111111111111211.title: Playing a party game (Twister, Spin the Bottle,...

15521111111111111111112111.content:
"Spin the bottle?" you said.

"Fine." one half of the room said.

"We'll use it to decide who goes for Truth or Dare." Suzy said.

"Let's play!" Holly said.

You sat down in the circle and the bottle was spun. You tried to subconsciously make it land on someone else, to no avail. It lands on you.

"So, Ross. Truth or Dare?" Suzy asked.
15521111111111111111112111.title: Spin the Bottle

155211111111111111111121112.content:
"...Dare?" you said.

The girls all grinned and started laughing.

"I've got one!" Dana said.

"Me too!" Morgan said.

"No wait!" Brooke said. "I've got the perfect one."

The girls huddled for a few seconds, whispering, as you looked on, worried about what they had in mind.

"Okay, we dare you, to let us dress you up, using only the clothes that are in this room." Brooke said.

"Wait wait, I meant truth!" you said.

"Too late!" Brooke said.

"Don't worry, it'll be fun!" Suzy said. "Like dressing up for the play!"
155211111111111111111121112.title: Dare

1552111111111111111111211121.content:
"What should we pick?" Brooke asked.

"How about this?" Morgan asked, holding up a dress.

"No, this!" Dana said, holding a skirt.

"Maybe we should let him choose something..." Suzy said. "Ross, do you want to wear something formal, or causal?"

"Uh..." you started.
1552111111111111111111211121.title: Getting dressed

choices: You can use Dana's cheerleader outfit.
15521111111111111111112111212.content:
"Casual?" you picked, hoping it wouldn't be that bad.

"I have just the outfit!" Dana said. She went into her bag and pulled out her cheerleading outfit.

"Wait, that's not fair!" you shouted.

"Why not? It's in this room..." Dana said.

"But!" you pleaded.

"Wait... He might be right about that. We did imply that it would be clothing that came directly from this room..." Morgan said.

"What do you think, Holly?" Suzy asked.

"Hm...." Holly started.
15521111111111111111112111212.title: Casual?

155211111111111111111121112121.content:
"Give me a Y! Give me an E! Give me an S!" Holly laughed.

"You agreed." Dana said, handing you the uniform.

"...Fine." you said. You walked out of the room and changed from the nightgown into the cheerleading uniform. You walked back into the room.

"Aww." the girls sighed.

"Thanks." you said, sarcastically.

"You know... if we fixed his hair he'd make a pretty cheerleader." Kelly said.

"No way! That's too far!" you said.

"Come on, it's just us girls. No one has to know!" Kelly said.

"Plus, you're already in the uniform." Brooke said.

"Uh.." you started.
155211111111111111111121112121.title: You can use Dana's cheerleader outfit.

1552111111111111111111211121211.content:
"Fine..." you said.

They sat you down, as they giggled, and started to brush your hair. They brushed and pulled and teased your hair, which you'd let grow out since getting the role. They pulled back after a few minutes and you saw yourself in the mirror, with your hair having two ponytails on either side of your head.

"You look adorable. If we fixed the face a little, you'd look better than half the cheerleading team." Dana said.

"Ha, ha. Can I take it off now?" you asked.

"Not yet, I like Dana's suggestion." Suzy said.

"But!"

"No buts." Suzy said. "My sleepover, my rules."

"And this is important, knowing how girls think, for the play." Holly said.

"I guess you're right." you said.

"Glad you see it our way." Dana said.
1552111111111111111111211121211.title: Fine, I guess.

15521111111111111111112111212111.content:
They started to do your makeup as you thought about how you got into this mess. What if you didn't try out for the play? Sure, you wouldn't be friends with Suzy and Holly, but at least you'd be dressed as a boy...

"And done!" Suzy proclaimed.

"I was right, you look adorable." Dana said.

"Thanks." you said, looking in the mirror. You had to agree, you looked pretty. Your eyes seemed bigger and your lips were shiny and looked kissable. All the blemishes were gone and all that was left was smooth skin on your face.

"What next?" Holly asked.
15521111111111111111112111212111.title: Doing your makeup

155211111111111111111121112121112.content:
"Since he's all dressed up, why not teach him some cheers?" Dana asked.

"No! I draw the line there! I played along until now, but I am done!" you shouted. "I want to change into my clothes now!"

You seethed for a moment and then saw Dana, her eyes watering.

"..." you stood there watching her.

"I'm sorry. It's just, I thought it'd be funny. If you didn't want to do it you just had to say, you didn't have to yell." Dana sobbed.

"I... I didn't mean to. I'm just under a lot of stress." you said.

"I know, I shouldn't have suggested it." Dana said.

"No, it's fine. I'll do it. It's the least I can do to make up for exploding at you." you said.

"Great!" Dana said, chippering up immediately.

"Let's start!" Holly said.
155211111111111111111121112121112.title: Something else

1552111111111111111111211121211121.content: Dana and Holly walked you through the cheers, which were pretty simple, and by the end of it, you had it down enough that you could probably fill in for one of the cheerleaders if you needed to. After it was done you sat down, and sat the next few rounds of "Spin the Bottle" out. One dare was enough for you. Attention Problems- Thanks to the fact that your basement/room have flooded you've been sleeping on the family couch and as a result you've been so tired during the day that none of your thoughts are really processing. Noticing this, your sister decides to take advantage of you.

1553.title: More Choices

choices: Anna has a recommendation to help you sleep
15531.content:
Your name is Ashely, a 16 year old guy. You have terrible sleeping problems, being easily stirred awake by the slightest noise. That's why it was awesome when you found out the basement was essentially void of any sorta noise after 8 in the evening. Everything was great until a huge downpour came in and flooded your room and damaging all the furniture down there as well. Your parents called someone to drain the water, however many houses were affected and your house is at the bottom of the waiting list. For now, all your parents could do was offer the family couch for the time being, they even offered some of the nice sheets from their bed to make it easier. You are disgruntled, but not ungrateful to the gesture and accept the offer hoping you can return to your own room soon.

However, sleeping on the couch proved far more taxing on you then you could have imagined. The couch was old and hard to sleep on, since no really complained about it they hadn't bothered to replace it. What was worse was that every slight noise would stir you awake and the night would to go on forever until morning, leaving you with little to no sleep at all. As the nights went on, your grumpiness from the lack of sleep turned to relaxed and slow disinterest, with you just wanting it to end. No one but your 15 year old sister, Anna, notices this since you seem so cooperative and not that talkative about it.

"Hey Ash, what's up?" Anna asks cheerfully.

You jump at first due to the sudden sound, but meekly turn around with an embarrassed and tired look on your face. "Nothing much, just sitting around."

"Those tracks will surely get you to sleep." While the first couple track were indeed music recommended to people who needed sleep the were earworm-inducing girly pop music renamed so you wouldn't realize.

Your lack of sleep made you almost cry at your sister's kind gesture. You thanked her for the offer and took Ipod, hoping you might be able to drown out the white noise in the house and get some sleep tonight.

If you were awake, you would’ve questioned why any girl would listen to songs that made girls out to be so shallow, but you weren’t, so instead they just wormed their way inside your brain and laced themselves in your thoughts.

How much of an effect do the songs have when you wake up?

You don’t recognize that you’ve accidentally grabbed a pair of your sister’s jeans as you get dressed, or the way you primp in the hallway mirror as she passes only to double back and gawk. You certainly don’t realize you’re swaying your hips as you head downstairs.

But your sister does.

Anna watches in a sort of awe at the way you’re behaving, unsure what it could possibly be. It’s when she almost corrects you about your pants that she realizes: her music. Her music must have slunk into your head and messed with it while you were asleep.

And if it just a night of sleep could do this...what could more do, especially if she chose what songs to play to specifically mess with you?

Anna gives a wicked grin. “It’s good you have me as a big sister.” She then reach into her book bag and pulls out a blonde whig. “Quick put this on!”

You want to protest, but you decide that a whig is far better then being a laughing stock. So you put it on your head.

15532.title: The Thief

155321.content:
Actually it's a thrift shop that you enter unnoticed. As you slide to hide under some of the tables, you twist your ankle.
"Damn that hurt!", you thought.
Looking at the table next to the one you're under you see a grey wig. As you pull the wig down to your level, it comes attached with a whole outfit.
You look at everything you pulled down and realize that it's a Halloween costume of an old lady. It has a foam body suit which makes the body rounder, a blue over sized house dress. The grey wig, slippers and granny glasses.
"I could never get away with it.", you think to yourself.
Your thoughts are soon interupted by the swarm of cop cars gathering outside the front of the store.
You look again at the costume. "Why not"
You quickly dress under the table and have everything on including holding the purse that you had just swiped.
You stand up from under the table and limp over to the window
"My leg is killing me", You think again to yourself. "But maybe it'll add to this little charade.
A couple of store employees are watching out the front window as the cops swarm the streets.
In your best little old lady voice, you asked what was happening.
The women turn startled as they didn't realize anyone had entered the store, bt smile once they see a little old lady.
This costume is working.
"A purse snatcher, robbed a woman down the block. Surveilance cameras saw him run down this way and then he just disappered." The employee explained.
"Wow! All those cops for just a purse snatcher?", the theif in granny's clothing replied.
"Well it wouldn't be that important if the purse didn't belong to the owner of Taffany's jewlery store. The owner had the bank money in her purse that she was on her way to deposit, not to mention about $800,000 worth of diamonds that she was having shipped out. Yes sir, whoever stole that purse is set for life", the empolyee explained.
The theifs jaw opened wider as he clutched the purse tighter.
"Well, you ladies have a nice day", the theif said as he limped out in the street.
The foam bodysuit was hot and made him sweat along with the nervousness of all the cops around.
"I just have to go around the corner and I'll be a free man" He thought.
"HOLD IT RIGHT THERE!", yelled a cop at the "older women"

The theif turned and faced the police officer.
But the police officer isn't the one who yelled in the first place.
Sitting on a bus, was an older man, probably deaf and didn't know he was yelling. He was definately calling in the theifs direction but he was calling him, Agnes.
"Agnes, Agnes, hurry we're leaving." He screamed.
The thief laughed as he read the side of the small bus. "Meadows Retirement Home."
"This could be my way out of here.", he thought as he limped towards the bus.
One of the police officers saw him limpping and offered his shoulder to lean on to help the theif onto the bus.
"Thank you so much officer", the theif said alound continuing with the grandma voice.
Once inside the bus, the theif saw the seats full of other older people. The people were out for a day of shopping and now it was time to go back to the retirement home.
"Agnes, over here", said the older man who had yelled for him outside the bus. He patted the empty seat next to him.
The theif sat next to the old man.
The bus driver came on the bus, and started driving the bus.
"Whew! Free at last, I can't believe that worked" The theif thought.
The drive was about 30 minutes long and most of the older folk fell alseep including the guy next to you who wore a name tag that said, "Hello, my name is Morty"
Finally the bus pulled up to a large gated area. The guard at the gate opened the gate for the bus and the bus drove through.
As the bus approached the main door of a towered building. It looked like an apartment building but a large sign said MEADOWS HOME.
"Now to find my exit" The theif said.
As all old folks were each woken up, they stood in line and exited the bus.
As the line moved to the right, towards the building entrance, the theif went left.
"AGNES, where are you going?" Morty yelled.
The whole line stopped and the Retirement home employee approached you and said....
1553211.title: "You're not going anywhere!"

15532112.content:
"Good thing you were heading to the medical center, it's time for your shot!" Said the retirement home employee, who's name tag said "Steven" and was at least in his late thirties or early forties.

As he approached, you looked over Stevens shoulder at Morty who just smiled at you. "I'll see you in the dinning hall once your finished Agnes!" He yelled as he turned and followed the line of old people as they began to walk towards the retirement home entrance.

Steven gently, but firmly, guided you toward the doors medical center. 'A shot?! I hate needles!' You thought as you passed through the doors. 'How am I going to get out of this one?' You thought as they approached the receptionist and suddenly had an idea. "You know Steven, I think I could go without the shot today, I'm feeling pretty good today." You said trying to talk yourself out of the situation, but Steven wasn't having it. "In that case, we better see her and tell her the good news!" He smiled proudly.

Out of desperation, the thief tried to slow his walking to a full stop, but both because of his ankle and Steven firmly leading him, they reached the desk. "Oh hello Agnes! You're hair looks so nice today!" The girl who's name tag said "Amanda" and was only about five years older than you smiled.

The thief subconsciously smiled back at her and replied "Thank you very much." in his grandma voice. She gave Steven a list of names, and signed his name by Agnes's, then guided the thief to the waiting room and sat him down. As they sat, the thief suddenly had another idea. 'The bathroom! I bet they have a window I could crawl through!' You then told Steven that you needed to go to the restroom and was helped up and guided to it, thankfully Steven chose to stand outside and wait for you.

Once inside, the thief saw his exit, which was much higher than he expected, but you were determined to get out. You walked over to the wall just below the window, and couldn't reach it on your tip toes, even when you jumped for it you didn't even make it half way. 'Damn my body for being so small!' Just when he was about to grab the trash can, stack it on top of the sinks counter top and clim out to freedom, the door opened. "Oh good your finished, time to go see the doctor!" Steven held the door open for you and you limped out.

'I don't even know what the shot is for, other than for an old lady! Which I am most defiantly not! I'm a nineteen year old guy! But they don't know that.' You were lead into a room and was helped up into a medica table. He hoped for Steven to leave, but he stood by him as they waited for the doctor to enter.

Moments later, a female doctor with the name "Dr.Patton" stitched into her coat and looked about fifty entered with both medical charts and shot in hand. "Hello Agnes, how are we feeling today?" She asked as she placed the shot by the thief and put on gloves. "I feel perfectly healthy! As I told Steven earlier when we walked in, I don't think I even need the shot today." He tried one last time, but the doctor just chuckled and grabbed a alcohol wipe and started cleaning the suits arm, prepping it for the needle. "Oh we couldn't have that, especially if the treatment is working!" The thief slumped in defeat.

Dr.Patton instructed you to take a deep breath and to be ready for the bee sting, but it never came. Thankfully, she stuck the suits thick foam, injecting the suit with whatever drug was meant for 'Agnes' instead of you. She quickly put a bandage onto the spot. "Alright, we're good to go! Anything else you need before I let you go?" Dr.Patton asked.

The thief thought about his ankle. Should you tell her about it and get it fixed so you can be faster when you escape? Or let it fix it self, it's just a twisted ankle after all. Plus it helps with the disguise right?

15533.title: More Choices

155331.content:
As you get ready for bed and begin to turn off all of the lights in the apartment, you think over the past year. You think of all the anguish that you have gone through recently. When you received the call from the police about the car accident, your world just ended. Valerie was the love of your life, and when you two married you believed that you would be together forever. And then, suddenly, in a blink of an eye she was taken away from you.

Thank goodness for the support of friends and family to get you through this. Without their help you don't know what you would have done. They managed to get you out of your funk and convince you to move on with your life. That's what gave you the idea to move to another city. This way you and Susan could make a fresh start.

Susan...You sigh to yourself. It was terrible losing your wife, but you can only imagine what your daughter must be going through. Losing your mother at such a young tender age, it was truly heartbreaking. Not having that bond that all young girls have with their mother...it is truly a shame.

The only thing you can do for her is to let her know that you will always be there for her and that you will never go away. You hope that Susan can try to move forward like you are trying to. The move was a bit hard for her but she will be starting a new school in the fall and hopefully soon this will feel like home.

Susan is truly your world at this point. You would do anything for her.

You turn off the last light in the apartment, but not before reading the framed wedding announcement you kept of you and Valerie's wedding. "We invite you to the wedding of David and Valerie Leeves". You hold back a tear.

As you begin walking to your bedroom you walk past Susan's room. Expecting to her her snoring you hear something else.

The sound of her crying.
155331.title: From father to mother

choices: You try to get her to change her mind
1553311.content:
You open her door and see your daughter crying. You rush over to her bedside and give her a hug.

"Susan! Its okay honey, I'm here. Everything is going to be fine."

You release her and she pulls away and stops crying.

"Now sweetie" you say, "What is the matter? You can tell me."

"Oh Daddy" she says trying to hold back tears, "I just woke up right now and I was going to call for Mommy to get me a glass of water, and then I remember she was gone, and I...", she starts crying again.

"Now now" you say as you hug her again, "It's alright. I miss her too. I know its hard sweetie, but you know if she were here she wouldn't want you losing any sleep."

She stops crying again. "I'm sorry, Daddy. I just miss Mommy so much. I think about her all the time and I just miss her so much. I see other girls playing with their mommies and it hurts that I don't have a mommy to play with anymore."

"I know honey", you say, "I wish there was something I could do."

She looks up at you, with a glimmer of hope in her eyes.

"Daddy?"

"Yes sugar?"

"Can you be my mommy?"
1553311.title: Continue

15533111.content:
You suddenly sit back, flabbergasted.

"Be your mommy?"

"Yes daddy", she says, brightening up, "I know that my real mommy is gone, and I'll always miss her, but I was thinking that if you became a mommy you could take her place!"

"But sweetie" you counter, "Mommies are girls, and I'm a boy."

"I know daddy," she says, "But you could dress up in girls clothes, and wear makeup and act like a girl! Then you could be my mommy!"

"But if I were your mommy, then I couldn't be your daddy anymore", you say.

She looks down, "Well, I wan't to have you and mommy in my life right now. But if I had to choose, right now I want a mommy more than a daddy. I'm sorry daddy. but your a boy and I can have more fun playing with a mommy cause shes a girl."

"Plus" she adds, "if you become a mommy you'll be a girl, and that means you can start dating boys. And then you can marry a boy you fall in love with and I'll have a mommy AND daddy again!"

"Please daddy?" she looks at you pleadingly. "I really want a mommy again."

You realize that she is asking for a lot. She is asking you to give up your manhood. If you agree you will end up living as a woman.

Looking at her pleading eyes, you realize that there is only one choice to make. She is your entire world, and her happiness is of upmost importance to you. You will do anything for her.

"Okay sweetie" you say, "I'll do it"

"Oh thank you!" she says as she gives you a hug. "Thank you thank you thank you!"

"But just so you know, I can't become a mommy overnight. But I promise you that I will become your new mommy as fast as I possibly can. And now, lets get back to bed." You tell her as you tuck her in.

"Okay. Good night."

You turn to leave the room, but before you do, she says:

"I love you mommy."

155332212.content:
How did you get into this mess?

That's what you think to yourself as you hide behind the rack of dressed in the girl's dressing room of the beauty pageant your friend had dragged you to.

Cain had suggested that the two of you go and pick out a cute girl to ask out after the contest was over.

You knew his plan didn't have a chance of working, and yet, somehow he persuaded you to go with promises of treating you to dinner after if it ended up being a wash.

Upon arriving, you excused yourself to go to the restroom, and had entered a door next to a sign that said restrooms. You had failed to see that said restroom was the girl's.

You found the fact that the toilets were all stalls strange but shrugged it off and hurried to relieve your bladder.

It was when the door opened and you heard girl's voices that you realized your mistake.

Trying not to panic, you wait until you hear the stall doors close as they enter them. Seeing your opportunity, you hurriedly race out the door.

To your surprise, the door didn't lead back to the hallway, but into the dressing room for the pageant!

You look back and, sure enough, there is another door on the opposite side of the bathroom.

Said door began to open and, weighing your options, you quickly duck inside the dressing room and hide in a corner behind a clothes rack so you don't get caught.

"Hey, did someone come out of the bathroom?" a woman's voice suddenly asked.

You freeze up and hold your breath.

"I thought so...but where did they go...?

The voices are getting closer. You try not to panic looking for a way out. You could get in a lot of trouble if you got caught...
155332212.title: A beauty pageant

choices: The front, it is a shorter trip
1553322121.content:
Looking to your side, you see a shelf with several wigs on mannequin heads. You pull the one with long brown hair that reaches your lower back and quickly pull it into place. You pull a pale pink dress with black lace https://www.fancybridesmaid.com/content/... off the rack and hold it up, pretending to be considering it.

"Oh. It is just one of the girls...have you not picked out a dress yet?" the woman asked.

"Um...Almost..." you say softly, trying to speak femininely. You don't turn around.

"Ok, hurry up though. I'll get you ready once you decide."

The woman turned and walked away.

You sigh in relief. You fooled her but she is still expecting a girl to come out from back here.

You glance down and see a lacy pink bra on the floor. With it on, you could have a little chest and with the wig, you should be believable enough to try slipping out.

You lift your shirt and quickly work the bra into place, managing to get the back strapped together on the third try. You lower your shirt and two small, but believable bumps stick up out of your familiar shirt.

Ok. Time to do this. Do you go for the bathroom door or the main door?
1553322121.title: Take a wig off the wig rack and pretend to be i...

15533221211.content:
You could probably avoid that woman by going through the main door, but you also didn't know what might wait for you there. It might be harder to sneak out from there, and who knows? Maybe that woman got distracted and you can slip out unnoticed. You keep the pink dress with you, and cross through the bathroom. You hesitantly open the bathroom door and see... an empty hallway.

"Phew." you sighed.

All you had to do was make it back out where you came and you were home free. You started to rush out the direction you came from when you heard someone shouting from behind you.

"Miss!" the woman shouted. "There you are! Get over here!"

You turned around and hesitated. The woman, who was carrying a clipboard, started to get closer to you, you could hear her heels clicking as she got closer.

"Uh..." you started. "I... I need to..."

"Whatever you need, you can do after I get you ready. Let's see... Yep. One last girl unaccounted for." the woman said. "Let's get you ready."

She grabbed your wrist and started pulling you back towards the dressing room. You tried to resist, but her grip was tighter than a vice and you were nervous as it is. She dragged you back into the dressing room and pushed you behind a dressing screen.

"The other girls are all ready, so that leaves you. You have to change now, or you'll miss the opening!" she shouted.

You stared at the dress in your hand and felt sick. You could try to run... or you could do what the woman said and not raise suspicion. If you ran and she found out who you really were... you could get in big trouble, but on the other hand, do what she says and you'll never live it down...

You take a deep breath and gulp as you make your decision. You...
15533221211.title: Back through the bathroom

choices: Finding a pair of heels to match
155332212111.content:
Feeling trapped, you hold the dress up. You look it over, a pit forming in your stomach.

"Umm..."

"Hurry up, young lady! We're on a tight schedule."

You sigh in defeat. Seeing no other way out, you hook the dress over your arm and start to pull down your pants.

You freeze. Your underwear! In a dress this short, she would see that you were wearing boy underwear and you would get caught for sure!

You quickly scan the room and luckily there in a stack of panties on the bench behind the screen with you.

Pushing down your anxiety and pride, you pull your own underwear off and pull on a pair of lace black panties, since there was none pink like your bra and it at least matched the lace on the dress.

Standing there in feminine underwear, you gulp nervously and hold up the dress. Cautiously, you step into it and pull it up to your chest.

"Are you done yet- oh good." the woman pushed back the curtain suddenly to check on you, catching you by surprise. Luckily, you already had the dress on.

Before you could say a word, she quickly stepped behind you and pulled the zipper on the back all the way up. "Let me get this for you." You realize that it's sitting at a point in your back that you can't reach. You'll be wearing this dress until someone lets you out.

She turns you around and looks at you.

"Hmm. Come on young lady, we must hurry. We can start by..."
155332212111.title: Put on the dress

"We can start by shaving those stray leg hairs! Really, you should have done a better job at home." she remarked.

Another blow to your masculine pride... you weren't sure if you'd really call them "stray" hairs, but you weren't going to argue with this lady. She dragged you over to a mirror and took out a small electric razor.

"Okay, lift the skirt, sweetie." the woman said.

You complied and lifted it, and the woman immediately went to work, shaving off whatever there was of the hair on your legs.

"Right, now lift your arms into the air." she said.

You were confused, but followed the direction, and she quickly went to work on your armpits, shaving whatever hair was there as well.

"Good." the woman said. "Now we can get started on..."
1553322121111.title: Shaving those stray leg hairs

choices: Accessories ( a necklace, bracelets, and some earrings)
15533221211111.content:
"Here, sit at the vanity."

Not sure what else you even can do, you do as she says, careful not to let the skirt ride up.

"Hmm..." the woman mused to herself as different cosmetics were placed on the table. "We don't have a lot of time, but I think we'll get you ready just fine."

Great... you think to yourself as the woman starts applying foundations and creams to your face.

"Close your eyes, hun."

"Ok, now hold still."

It had taken about ten minutes, but you can't believe that the face looking back in the mirror at you is your own.

Soft and smooth, with subtle eyeliner and eyeshadow, thin plucked eyebrows, long eyelashes made bold with mascara...

Meanwhile, the false pink nails she had attached to both your finger and toe nails only reminded you how hard getting this dress off would be.

"Now the finishing touch." the woman turned your head and pinched the edges of your mouth, forcing your lips into a pout. The tube rounded your lips a few times, making them a charming red.

Seeing yourself in the mirror, you feel shocked at how different you look. There was no doubt you blended in with the girls here now!

"Ok...you're almost ready. You still need some accessories...and your heels...let's see...I'll start with..."
15533221211111.title: Makeup

"Let's see here..." the woman started. "What size are you?"

"Um..." you started. You only knew your size in Mens. You didn't even know what it might be in Womens. "...I don't know."

"Let me see..." she lifted up and looked at the bottom of your shoe, which was sitting by the chair with your socks inside. "That's not..."

She paused for a moment, then sighed and shook her head.

"You're in boy's shoes... Well, I'll just guess." she said.

She stepped away for a moment and you looked towards the door. Maybe while she wasn't looking you could run away...

Suddenly, she returned with a pair of open-toed pink heels, same shade as the dress, and placed one of your feet into it. It fit perfectly. With the press on nails that matched the shoes and dress, you couldn't help but notice how girly and dainty your feet looked. She looked down at your foot in the heel and smiled.

"Perfect." she said. "Okay, now it's time for..."

1553322121111111.content:
The woman moved 81st a brisk pace, quickly holding up necklaces and earrings up to your face.

She settled on a black choker with a gold heart and a matching necklace that hung right on your collarbone. Short gold hoops were attached to your ears and a gold bangle was put on your left wrist, making your hand seem small and dainty. A pink headband with a ribbon was added to your 'hair', making you look more and more feminine.

The woman glanced at her watch.

"Ok down to the wire... Last thing!" she lifted in your arm, pulling you up to your feet. You struggle with the heels but her grip keeps you steady.

She works a pink flower on a band around your other wrist and then pins a numbered badge on the sash of the dress.

"Alright, honey, what do you think?" she asks, whirling you around toward the mirror.

Your eyes grow huge looking at the full image in the mirror. A pretty brunette in a dress that showed off her stunning legs stared back.

"Umm.... You stammer.

"Oh! Showtime! Come on, get out there!"

The woman pulls at your arm, dragging you to the door at opening it.

You were behind a massive curtain, where all the other girls (wait you aren't one of them!) were lined up.

The woman pulls you to the back of the line and hurriedly pulls you into place. You barely manage to catch your balance in the heels.

"Ok...ok. That's all the girls. We're ready!" she fussed with your wrists, placing your left hand on your hip and nudging said hip to lean like the other girls. "Here we go! Three, two, one, curtain!"

You try to say something before the woman scurries away but before you can process what is even happening the crew pulls back the curtain.

Your cheeks flush as the crowd began to cheer. Oh no... You were supposed to come SEE a beauty pageant, not BE IN ONE.

Speaking of which, your embarrassment reaches a new high as you see Cain in the crowd!

Your eyes met. There is no way he recognized you, YOU didn't recognize you! And given what he had said he was here to do, that meant the up and down look he gave you was him checking you out!
1553322121111111.title: Accessories

15533221211111111.content:
You turned away, your face feeling hot with shame and your stomach feeling nauseous with anxiety. You took note that there were about fifteen to twenty other girls on stage with you. You were struck frozen by the fear of seeing Cain in the audience and the brightness of the lights, that you didn't notice that the host was calling out the names of the girls, and they were walking forward down the runway to show themselves off to the judges before returning backstage. That was until...

"Elizabeth Pemberton!" the host exclaimed.

The host paused, looking around.

"Elizabeth Pemberton!" the host said, more forcefully.

You felt a jab in your arm, you turned to see the girl to your right, blonde, and dressed in a teal dress, but otherwise exactly like you, looking forward smiling, before turning to you and nodding her head towards the runway.

"Come on!" she said through her grin. "You're up!"

"Oh!" you involuntarily exclaimed.

You started to walk towards the runway, the heels and dress forcing your hips to sway as you walked down. The host continued talking, and you got to learn a little bit about yourself, or rather, the girl that everyone thinks you are.

"Elizabeth Pemberton is a Freshman at Valley University, currently studying Journalism. And she's also a skilled..." the host read, though you missed the last part as you turned around, and stumbled slightly in your heels.

You kept walking towards the curtains, and once you got backstage, you were able to breathe for a moment, as you looked around for an escape route.

"Okay, ladies! Once the last girl comes in, we'll only have a few minutes each, so get ready for the next round in the competition. As a reminder, it's the ... round!" the woman who had given you your unwanted makeover shouted.
15533221211111111.title: Look away! It is too embarrassing!

155332212111111111.title: Swimsuit

1553322121111111111.content:
This time, you paid attention to what the other girls in the line did. No sense in causing any more undue attention on yourself. You just want to get out of here unnoticed. The other girls would strut down the runway, smiling, make their way to the front of the runway, just before the judge's table, pose, keep smiling, and happily strut away when the next girl's name was called. Easy enough, and the pareo was doing it's job splendidly. So when the host called out,

"Elizabeth Pemberton!"

You knew to start moving. You walked down the runway, looking at the judge's table, and scanning the audience to see if anyone was looking at you with anything other than spectating eyes. Your gaze came across Cain, who was not, as you feel he should be, wondering where you were, he was instead cheering and whooping as you walked down the runway. You couldn't hear him, over the music and the distance, but you knew he was cheering your name... or Elizabeth's name, rather.

You got to the end of the runway and stopped to pose, smiling at the judge's table and stood in place. You were thinking about Cain and how... since you knew what his intentions were at the end of this... how you were going to escape from here if he finds you dressed like this.

"Sally Ahlberg!" the host called out.

That was your cue to turn on your heel, causing the pareo to flap a bit as you turned, before walking straight back to the curtains. Hopefully this time, you'd have a moment to breathe, and hopefully you could put on proper clothes, if not walk out wearing your own.

15533221211111111113111.content:
You looked around at the other girls practicing their talents, some had musical instruments, some were preparing to sing, some were getting ready to dance, and some had more out of the box talents. Balancing plates, there was even one girl that was prepping herself for a stand up comedy routine. You weren't sure what to say... you didn't really have any talents, at least ones that were applicable here...

You started thinking of a talent... uh... What's something that you can kind of do...

"Juggling?" you thought out loud.

You opened it to reveal three balls inside. While you weren't a trained juggler, you had spent a summer trying to learn it when you were a kid, so maybe those skills were still there. You sure hoped so.

You tentatively started to toss the balls into the air, and catching them. After a few minutes, your muscle memory started to kick in and you were doing relatively decent. Decent enough that you were able to find a few more and throw them into the mix. You wondered why you were actually doing the talent, but then the woman walked past you again, and that's why. After the applause died down, you took a deep breath and started to juggle the balls. As you did, throwing them into the air and doing the few tricks you knew, you heard applause and you looked over at the judges, who seemed impressed. As did Cain, who was swooning from the audience. Yuck. Once you finished, you took a bow... actually, you curtsied, because of the way the skirt of the dress settled around your waist, and you walked back offstage, putting the balls down and exhaling out a sigh.

"That was pretty good, girl!" one of the other girls, you think her name is Sally or something, exclaimed.

"Yes!" Sally and Jessica exclaimed at the same time.

Your eyes widened. You were... WINNING? You were mortified.

"Okay girls, the rest of you sit tight, you'll still be coming out at the end for a final bow, but you three girls have to go pick out a new dress. Be ready to go out in five minutes!" the woman shouted.

You couldn't believe it. The other two girls went over to the dress rack and you idly followed them, still dazed by your performance actually winning. You looked over the dresses, still confused, but resigned to your fate. There's no way that woman was letting you vanish now. She was keeping a close eye on you three.

"Come on! Pick something!" she shouted.
