15533222221.content:
You are Marty, an eighteen year old in between the end of his senior year of high school and his first year of college. You decided to take a summer trip to a random place on the globe, and landed on Vathun, a small island nation in a secluded part of the world. You went with your sister, who is two years older than you, Karen. Your parents didn't trust you alone outside the country yet, and she wanted to go too. You had separated on the first day of your two week trip, and you were currently wandering around the city.You decided to go check out the castle, and when you approached it, you saw a girl hanging off the wall. You ran to the wall.

"Hey! Are you okay?" you shouted.

"Quiet! I'm fine." she said, as she scaled the wall down and landed in front of you. She stood up and you looked at eachother intently.

Her face was familiar to you, in fact, it was almost your own face, just softer, and on this girl's body. She was as intrigued as you.

"Oh my." she said. "You look like me."

"I guess so."

"Listen, the guards probably heard you scream, so I gotta get out of here. Take this." she handed you a piece of paper. "Gotta run!"

She ran off and you started to walk away from the castle, as you heard the guards run past where you were formerly standing.

"Princess Alexia!" they shouted. "Get back here!"

Later, back at your hotel, you looked at the piece of paper. What was it?
15533222221.title: The Princess and the Pauper

155332222211.content:
Back at your hotel, you look at the piece of paper, realizing that it's directions on how to get into the castle through a secret passage in a wall. You figure that she wants you to go into it, for whatever reason, and against your better judgement, you do it. You get to the wall and push in the special brick, and a door opens. You step inside and press another brick and it closes. You start to walk forward, following the hallway. It's dark and musty and damp.

"This may have been a bad idea." you think.

Suddenly, you see a small light and run toward it, you notice an area of the wall it ajar, just like the paper said, and you push into it, tumbling out into a room. A girl's room.

"You made it!" Alexia said. "I thought you weren't going to come!"

"Well, I did." you said. "Not getting any easier seeing your face, that looks like my face."

"Listen... there's a reason I wanted you to come here." she said.

"What is it?" you asked.

"Well, I want to explore outside the castle walls, and you can travel outside the walls."

"So?"

"We can swap places! We're like identical twins!"

"That could never work!"

"Sure it will!"

"But..."

"Please?" she gave you puppy dog eyes.

"Uh..." you started.

What do you say?
155332222211.title: Directions to getting into a secret passage in ...

1553322222111.content:
"Listen, I just... I never get to be just a normal person. I'm always Princess Alexia, I just want to be someone who isn't royalty for a bit. We'll switch back with enough time before you leave. I promise." Alexia said.

"...Fine." you acquiesced.

"Yay!" Alexia squealed. "First things first. Strip."

"In front of you?" you asked.

"No, behind the dressing screen." she said, pulling out the screen.

You walked behind it and stripped to your boxers. Alexia tossed over a bundle of clothes, which you quickly realized were a bra and panties. You put them on and walked out from behind the screen.

"Not perfect, but it'll work." Alexia said, as she took a pair of false breasts and slipped them into the bra. "Now, your body hair has gotta go. Go shave in the bathroom."

She pointed toward a door, and you walked into what you assumed was her private bathroom. It was beautiful. Clean, and pretty big considering she was the only one to use it. You spotted a razor and shaving cream on the edge of the tub and started to shave. You finished and exited the bathroom.

"What next?" you asked.

"Sit down in this chair and I'll give you the royal makeover." she said.

You sat down and Alexia started to work. She started to give you a manicure and put press on nails on your fingers and applied nail polish, and soon your fingers, all ten of them were tipped with inch long pink nails, and your toes soon followed suit. Then she worked on your face, applying enough make-up to soften your features and make you appear feminine. Your hair and her's were very similar in length so she just brushed it differently and cut it a bit to make your hair feminine, giving you her girly bangs. You looked in the mirror and saw Princess Alexia, with her brown pixie cut, and delicate features. You did still look like you so that was a plus.

"Okay, now it's my turn." she said, as she went behind the screen, emerging a few minutes later with her breasts binded and wearing your clothes. She had gotten rid of any trace of femininity and you two looked like each other now. Except that you weren't dressed.

"What do I wear?" you asked.

"Anything you'd like, except I should pick the outfit so no one suspects anything. Gimme a sec."

She went to the closet and pulled out a floral skirt, that was about mid-thigh length, a powder blue blouse, and a pair of brown leather boots that were thankfully flats. You put them on, and you stood facing each other.

"Time to give you the run down on my life. There's my mom, Queen Valanice. She's a bit overbearing, and she'll either try to get you in a poofy dress or bring suitors around. Tell her that you don't want to see suitors and you'll probably have to wear the dress. Sorry. Then there's my dad, King Graham. I have him wrapped around my finger. He won't be any issue for you." Alexia said.

"There's my sister at the hotel, but she's probably out at a club or sightseeing, so I haven't really seen her around."

"Well then, I guess I'll see you if I return."

"When you return."

"That's right. When."

"See you then?"

"See you then!" Alexia said, and exited through the secret passage.

Suddenly there was a knock on the door.

"Princess Alexia! Open this door this instant!" a voice shouted.

You walked over to the door and opened it. Who's behind the door?
1553322222111.title: Fine

choices: Go along with wearing the dress
15533222221111.content:
"Alexia! I've told you not to lock this door." Queen Valanice said.

"Sorry, mother." you said, waiting for her reaction.

"Anyway it's time to get you fitted for your new dress. Your birthday ball is fast approaching." she said.

"Huh... poofy dress it is." you thought.

"Come on!" she said and you followed her down the hall. You walked into a large room with a mannequin in the middle, wearing a pink dress with ruffles and lace.

"I know you hate wearing dresses, but that comes with the job of being a princess. So go behind the screen and pull that on!"

You don't want to wear that. Alexia probably wouldn't dare wear that. What do you do? Resist or go along with it? Which would be less suspicious.
15533222221111.title: Queen Valanice

choices: Checking up on Princess Alexia (change POV to Alexia)
155332222211111.content:
"Mother, I refuse to wear this dress!" you said.

"What did you just say?" Queen Valanice asked.

"I hate these dresses! I don't want to wear one."

"That's too bad, because you're going to wear it. I will have the Royal Guards restrain you like I did the last time."

"Hoo boy." you thought. "Looks like I'm going to have to go along with it."

"Fine..." you said.

"Glad we see eye to eye. Go get dressed." she said.

You walked behind the screen and started to undress and put on the dress, plus the shoes it came with, peep-toe pink heels.

What next?
155332222211111.title: Refuse to wear the dress

1553322222111112.content:
Princess Alexia walked throughout the town, with no one paying her any mind. She was ecstatic! She looked around, getting to see the stuff she normally couldn't see.

"Marty!" a voice shouted. Alexia turned around and saw a young woman, most likely Marty's sister. She thought about Marty, and how he's probably in a dress right now. She chuckled.

"Uh, hey." Alexia said, in her best impersonation of a male voice.

"Where have you been? I've been looking all over for you!" Marty's sister said.

"I was sightseeing." Alexia said.

"You seem different... Did you shave?" Karen asked.

"Yeah." Alexia said.

"Oh, okay. Come on! I want to go somewhere." she said.

"Where are we going?" Alexia asked.
1553322222111112.title: Checking up on Princess Alexia (change POV to A...

choices: The Bus Depo (Trip to another city)
Airport (Help from friend/Lover who flys your Private Plane)
15533222221111121.content: They go back to the hotel & pack there bags before heading to
15533222221111121.title: Brief stop @ Hotel

15533222221111122.content: Is she hungry or in the mood for shopping
15533222221111122.title: Some place normal kids go

15533222222.content: Compelled: One of the woman close to you gains the ability to control you with their words.
15533222222.title: More choices

155332222221.content:
You are Richard just an average plain fourteen year old. You live with your mother, little sister, and your big sister. Your mother Lisa works at an office to support the family. She wishes that you would help out more around the house. Your older sister Alexis is two years older and loves shopping. She also loves to mess with you since she wanted a teenage sister not a brother. Your 9 year old sister Amelia loves everything and anything girly or pink. She is full of energy and wants her siblings to play with her when her friends are busy.

Do any of these woman gain the power?
155332222221.title: Compelled

1553322222211.content: Your little or big sister?
1553322222211.title: One of your sisters

15533222222111.content:
You were talking a nice nap on the couch when you heard your little sister rushing in. You knew that your sister wanted something since she didn't have her friends over and was bored. "Hey Richard, I want to watch some tv" Amelia said as she got in your face. " No, I am taking a nap and I can't sleep if the television is on." you replied back. In response your sister childishly puffed her cheeks "I'm bored you should let me watch what I want". Surprisingly you found yourself telling her that she could watch tv. Even she was a bit shocked by this, you sometimes gave in if she whined a lot but never this quick. She shrugged it off and happily sat down to enjoy her victory. You figured that you would have to go take your nap on your stiff bed.

Not long after you got some sleep did Amelia come running back for something else. She got tired of watching television and wanted to do something else. "I want to play dollies, but its not as fun without someone else." she said clearly wanting you to play with her."Why don't you go bug Alexis to play dollies with you. I already let you interrupt my nap" you snapped back. Amelia started whining over this 'She said she's busy working on homework and doesn't want to play. Your not doing anything so you have to!" For some reason you felt that you really did have to play with your sisters dolls. The next hour was spent with your sister as you dressed up her dolls and made up stories. Amelia was really having fun, but she couldn't understand why you so easily agreed to play with her. You ended up doing anything she told you to that day. She decided to try and test it with something she knew you would never do.

What did she tell you to do?
15533222222111.title: Little sister

155332222221112.content:
Amelia had an idea and ran to her room so she could grab something. You brought over her favorite nail polish, a bright pink. She gave it to you and told you "You should use this to paint your toenails tonight. Its a really cute color, your toenails will be so pretty." After she gave it to you Amelia ran off eager to see later what would happen. You wanted to just put it down somewhere, but you found yourself bringing it to your room. You felt like you were in a trance as you applied the nail polish and waited for it dry. When it was done you felt embarrassed and put on some socks to hide it. You would have to sneak some nail polish remover in from your sister. The day was a really weird one with all that happened and you just needed to go to bed. Later in the night when you were asleep, Amelia snuck into your room to see if you used the nail polish. When she removed one of your socks and confirmed that you did,she gained a wide smile. She didn't know why, but you had to do anything she told you and she knew he could have a lot of fun with that.

When you went to get breakfast in the morning you were greeted by Amelia. She asked you if you used the nail polish and you unconvincingly told her no. She just giggled clearly not believing you and sat down to eat. As you were eating your sister realized that you might try to get rid of the nail polish. She thought of a plan that would fun and make things easier in the future. First Amelia told you "You never find it odd when I tell you should do something or what you never or usually do." With that she could give all the commands she wanted and you would never suspect anything. Next she could kill two birds with one stone regarding your nails " Your nails don't look so good. You should take great care of them, you should grow them out and shape them. You should also never chip at your nails or use nail polish remover without asking me, you might damage your nails." After Amelia was done talking, you looked down at your nails and felt like something was off. Later you found your sister on the couch watching a girly show. She saw you and asked if you wanted to watch it with her. You refused, but she said it was your favorite show and you loved to watch it with her. You decided to watch it just for a minute, although you ended up really getting into it and spent hours there. Your sister decided that she wanted to make another change she would change out something you use. She narrowed her options to getting you new undergarments, or new toys.
155332222221112.title: Paint your toenails

choices: Amelia helps you shop for toys
1553322222211122.content:
“You know, you really hate those video games. Especially violent ones. You ought to throw them all away.” Amelia points to the discs in front of your game consoles in front of the TV. “You only like to play very girly, kiddie ones anyways, like Dora and the Purple Planet. You should see about buying some of those.” She picked that one off the top of her head, thinking it’d be funny.

You blinked, staring at the stacks of discs. Amelia was right. Why did you have all those games? You didn’t want them. Getting to your feet a bit reluctantly - though you didn’t know why you were so reluctant - you picked up all the discs and tossed them in the trash can in the kitchen.

As you began to make your way to the computer to order Dora and the Purple Planet and other games like it, Amelia added, “You need to have more toys in your room too! You don’t have any doll houses or dolls or dolls clothes, or soft stuffed animals, or pretty pony toys. It makes you really sad to not have all your toys to play with in your room.”

As you sat down at the computer, thinking of all the toys you needed to buy and wondering why you didn’t have them already, Amelia reminded herself that she needed to figure out how little of a girl you were going to be.
1553322222211122.title: Toys

15533223.content:
The Boss' Niece: When starting a new job, a man is given only done direction, "Stay away from the boss' niece", who is doing an internship at the company. When he disregards the directive, he discovers a dark secret...

The Oldest Male Heir: One of a set of identical twins set to inherit half of a vast fortune from their father's death sets out to ensure that they retain the entire fortune... by getting rid of the competition.
15533223.title: More Options

choices: You are called into the CEO's office
You are knocked out from behind
155332231.content:
It was a simple warning given in the contract for your new office job. You were a data entry specialist, and had gotten the job right out of college. The rest of the contract was basically standard, nothing strange, except one small clause.

"Under no circumstances are any employees to begin any romantic or sexual relationship with any of the CEO's nieces, who do internships at the company during the summer. Those who do will suffer a severe penalty."

It was a weird clause to include, but it was probably something related to sexual harassment. You didn't think it was going to be a problem though... that was until the next summer came.

You had been working there nearly a year and had all but forgotten about the weird clause, until she walked in. Stephanie, the CEO's niece, who was doing an internship. It was love at first sight. The weird thing was, it wasn't like she was dressed provocatively or anything. In fact, she was very conservative. Smart suits, mainly black, navy and gray, probably at her aunt's insistence. You didn't know her age, but she was definitely in college, so you knew you had a shot.

And she noticed. You were always on hand to help with the computer, or if the copier jammed. She'd always thank you and the few times you had the opportunity to get to know her, you got the sense that she was a smart girl.

That was... until the day it happened. You had eaten lunch with her every day for the past few weeks, and after lunch, you decided to ask her to meet you in the supply closet. No one would ever have to know you broke the clause... though you weren't really thinking about that. You were thinking about the redheaded beauty you were about to rendezvous with.

She arrived and you could barely contain your excitement. After some making out, you graduated into something heavier, and a little while later, the two of you left the supply closet disheveled but satisfied.

The next morning, you arrived at work and walked over to your desk. You noticed that Stephanie was nowhere to be seen when...
155332231.title: The Boss' Niece

155332233.content:
The Pinch Hitter: When his sister's local youth softball team is in risk of shutting down due to low interest, a brother is forced to step up to ensure they have enough players to compete.

Salon the Run: Framed for a crime he didn't commit, a man hides out in a beauty salon, whose owner has a... unique solution to his predicament.
155332233.title: More options

choices: Miguel takes Cody to another room
1553322332.content:
Cody Turner had no idea the trouble he was going to find himself in...

Cody was a simple young 22 year old guy living in the city. Like many, he was looking for work trying to find anything to pay the bills.

When he was approached one afternoon by a mysterious person he had never met, Cody was told he could make $2,000 in one night. All he would have to do is stand somewhere and look around...

This sounded far too sketchy...However rent was due next week. What else could he do? Reluctantly Cody agreed. He told a time and place and just to show up...

That decision would come to haunt Cody forever. When he arrived at the desired place that night he found himself at the scene of bank robbery already in progress....

To make matters worse there was a dead security guard on the outside. No one else was anywhere to be scene. It seemed the gang had already made their getaway.

However Cody was still there. Set up as the fall guy with his face now on camera. He had been tricked...

As the police sirens got closer and closer panic set in for Cody. He ran down an alley as he heard the cops right on his tail.

It was late. So all the businesses were closed. He was desperate, terrified, looking for anywhere he could hide. Looking around he saw the lights were on at what looked like a salon.

Rushing over to it he found the back door unlocked as he ran inside quickly and hid himself in a supply closet.

The sounds of footsteps were near. The sounds of cops yelling to circle the alleyway could be heard.

That’s when Cody heard the door to the supply closet open. Looking up he saw a very effeminate Latino man looking down at him. He had very well styled hair and a very well styled curly mustache.

“Who the hell are you?” He asked with an angry tone.

“Please....I’m innocent! I was set up! Don’t tell the cops I’m here!” Cody pleaded with the man.

“Were you involved with that bank robbery? I should have you arrested!” The man said angrily.

“Please! I will do anything!” Cody begged on his hands and knees.

“Anything?” The man asked with a curious look and smile.

“Yes!” Cody said as he heard a pounding on the back door.

“Stay here and don’t say a word.” The man said.

“Police open up!” The cops said pounding on the salon.

The man opened up the back door and looked to the cops.

“Yes? What’s the problem officers?” He asked.

“There was a bank robbery around the block, we think a suspect in on the run around here. Have you seen anything?” They asked.

“No officers. I heard the noises but I am here doing inventory for my shop.” He saidz

“Fine...What is your name?” They asked.

“Miguel....Miguel Rodriguez. That’s why this Salon is called Miguel’s.” He said pointing to the sign.

“Well sorry to disturb you. If you hear anything please let us know.” The Police said before leaving.

After a few minutes Miguel let Cody out of the supply closet once the police had left.

“Thank you! Thank you so much! How can I repay you?” Cody asked.

“Well....I actually have something in mind....” Miguel said with a smile.
1553322332.title: Salon the Run

15533223321.content:
"Well, obviously you can't just leave here, since you have the cops after you and they'll be swarming around for hours." Miguel said. "So you need a disguise... and I need something as well."

"Whatever it is, I'll do it." Cody said.

"You'll need a makeover, that's a definite. I've been short-staffed lately. A few of the other local salons were poaching my stylists." Miguel said. "I need someone to help me out here. Why else would I be doing my own inventory at this time of night?"

"Fine. I mean, I don't know much about working at a salon, but I'm willing to learn." Cody said.

"Oh, you will be learning..." Miguel smiled, sticking out his hand. "Consider me getting your disguise together your training. I'll be doing a lot of things to you that you'll have to do for customers."

"Got it." Cody said, shaking Miguel's hand.

"Then let's get to work. Take a seat and we'll start on your disguise." Miguel said, motioning to one of the chairs.

Cody sat down and Miguel started to go to work.
15533223321.title: Miguel explains his plan

155332233211.content:
"First things first, we have to change your hair. That's the easiest thing to change, and trust me, some of my clients tell me that their families don't recognize them when they're done." Miguel said as he draped a cape over Cody's body.

"Change it how?" Cody asked.

"Change the color. You've got brown hair, so I think upping it a few shades to blonde should work and then I'll put in some extensions." Miguel replied.

"Extensions?"

"Trust me, the way hair frames a face is important. And if you do it right, you can look like a totally different person."

Cody nodded and laid back. Miguel started to soak his hair in the basin, before washing it, and getting to work with bleaching it. Cody's hair wasn't long, but it wasn't that short, so Miguel was able to get the foil to stick into the hair.

Miguel scrutinized Cody as he started to think about what he wanted to do next.
155332233211.title: The makeover begins

1553322332112.content:
As the hair dye set, Cody started to relax more. Miguel seemed like he knew what he was doing, and his heart was racing so much, that he laid back and closed his eyes. As he did, Miguel started to scrutinize Cody's face. He pulled out a makeup palette and started to brush something onto Cody's face. Cody stirred a bit.

"What are you doing?" Cody asked.

"Makeup. Easiest way to change a face. I can make you look ten years younger... or older if I wanted." Miguel replied.

Cody accepted that an answer because makeup did seem to be a typical way to disguise someone. Not like Miguel was gonna hand him a Halloween mask or something.

Miguel continued working, applying foundation and blush to the face, eye shadow, eyeliner and mascara to the eyes, and lipstick to the lips, and once he finished, Cody looked nothing like he did before.

Cody stirred again and licked his lips. He tasted... something strange, but he couldn't place it. He started to open his eyes, but Miguel quickly jerked the chair around.

"No peeking yet," Miguel said. "I want you to get the full experience."

"Just let me see," Cody started and began to stand up.

Miguel pushed him back down and placed two basins underneath his hands, dunking them in.

"Don't question my methods." Miguel ordered.

Cody sighed and lay back once again.

"Good, the dye should have just about set. Let's work on..." Miguel smiled.
1553322332112.title: Cody's face

15533223321121.content:
Cody noticed that his hands were in some sort of weird liquid that wasn't water. He wondered what it might be. Miguel started to weave the extensions into Cody's newly dyed hair. After several clips were attached under the hair, Miguel started to style the hair as he adjusted the length and trimmed some of Cody's natural hair. He pulled Cody's hands out of the basin placed his hands into plastic bags and put a cloth cover over both his hands.

"Don't try to move your hands until I take those off, okay?" Miguel said.

"What are my hands covered with?" Cody asked.

"Paraffin wax." Miguel replied. "Not necessary for the disguise, persay, but they stopped you from getting up."

Cody shrugged and lay back down. After a few minutes, Miguel pulled the bags off of Cody's hands. Cody started rubbing his hands together, marveling at how soft they were.

"Wow..." Cody said. "That's actually really nice."

"Indeed it is." Miguel said.

"Can I see myself now?" Cody asked.

Miguel thought for a moment before replying.
15533223321121.title: The extensions

155332233211211.content:
"Come on!" Cody urged.

Cody noticed that his face felt a tad strange, and he tasted something weird on his lips. He wondered what Miguel had done to them. Maybe he darkened his skin? And the hair was definitely much longer than he was used to, but he guessed that was preferable to shaving his head.

"Oh, all right. I suppose I can fix the particulars as they become important. Allow me to introduce you to..." Miguel started as he rotated the chair.

Cody was awestruck by what he saw. He was... a babe! His newly blonde hair was immaculately styled, his makeup flawless, with soft eyes, plucked eyebrows, and expertly colored lips. He could feel a mountain of makeup, but it looked like he wasn't wearing any at all.

"Meet Katy." Miguel said. "My newest salon assistant."

"Holy crap..." Cody stared in the mirror and moved around, watching the girl in the mirror follow his every movement. "Why a girl?"

"Because the cops are looking for a boy. Sure, I could have made you look like a different man, but this way, no one will suspect a pretty girl as a hardened bank robber."

"I was just the fall guy, I swear." Cody insisted.

"I don't really care. I need an assistant, and you're mine until your debt is paid." Miguel said.

"Whatever you say." Cody said.

"I had hoped to get your nails done, but we can do that in the morning before we open." Miguel said. "For now, there's a bed in the stockroom that I keep around for any friends who might need to do couchsurfing, but for the time being, that's your new room."

"Thank you." Cody said.

"Give me a list of your sizes, I'll pick up an outfit in the morning and then I'll get you settled at work." Miguel said.

Cody complied and wrote down a list of sizes on a sheet of paper. Miguel grabbed it and showed Cody into the stockroom.

"I'll be back in the morning. Goodnight, Katy." Miguel said.

"Goodnight." Cody said as Miguel locked the store and left.

Cody lay down onto the bed and wondered what tomorrow would bring.
155332233211211.title: The unveiling

choices: The police return to the salon
1553322332112111.content:
One would expect waking up in a strange place, with the sensation of long hair in one's face would be unsettling, but Cody wasn't allowed that luxury, as he was woken up by the dropping of a shopping bag onto the ground. Cody sat up and saw Miguel, carrying a drink tray with two cups of coffee in it.

"Rise and shine, my dear." Miguel grinned. "Time to finish up, and get you ready for your first day."

"What time is it?" Cody asked.

"A little after 7." Miguel replied. "Now get up, and put on what's in the bag."

"All right." Cody said, hesitantly grabbing the bag and looking inside. "You can't be serious."

"Deathly." Miguel glared. "Unless you'd rather turn yourself in... I imagine they'd probably like a pretty thing like you in lockup..."

"I'll do it, I'll do it!" Cody started pulling out what was inside the bag.

"Allow me." Miguel reached into the bag and grabbed a bottle of glue and a pair of false breasts. "Shirt off, please."

Cody sighed and removed his shirt.

"Hairless, by choice or coincidence?" Miguel chuckled as he prepped the breasts before sticking them to Cody's chest and holding them for several seconds.

"Is this really necessary?" Cody asked.

"Not entirely, but better safe than sorry. Plus, my clientele are mostly women, they can spot a fake from miles away." Miguel replied.

The same method was employed with a gaff, and soon, Cody was dressed in a matching bra and panty set, and a casual dress. Miguel re-applied the makeup, and 3/4 inch acrylic nails were attached to Cody's hands, painted pink, along with Cody's toenails being painted the same color.

"And now, these." Miguel took out a shoebox and handed it to Cody.

Cody, who by now had no intent of talking back to Miguel, opened the box, to find a pair of pink peep-toe heels.

"Heels?"

"Can't have you running off, now can I?" Miguel laughed again.

Looking at himself in a full-length mirror, Cody couldn't deny that he looked nothing like he had the night before. Whoever the cops were after, it wasn't "Katy".

"I can't believe I let you do this to me." Cody said.

"I can't believe you agreed." Miguel said. "Now, Katy, let's get you up to speed on your responsibilities..."
1553322332112111.title: The next morning

1553322333.content:
Clerical Error: Due to a clerical error, a young man is transferred to an all-girl's private school, and his new classmates are determined to ensure that he fits in.

One Day: When your sister comes down with laryngitis before a very important interview, she needs you to take her place, which spirals into something much more.
1553322333.title: More options

15533223331.content:
The car pulled up to the school gates. Greatwood Academy, apparently one of the best schools out there, you didn't actually know much about it. Your parents were rich industrialists, and had the means to spoil their only child as much as they wanted... which was nice when they were around, not so much when they weren't, which was often. This was one of those cases. They were going globetrotting and decided to send you away to school, because it was cheaper than giving you free reign of the mansion. At least that was your theory. You thanked the driver and climbed out of the car, before the driver grabbed your bags from the trunk and handed them to you, before getting back in the car and driving off.

You walked up to the security gate, carrying/wheeling your bags, and the guard took a look at you, seeming incredulous.

"Name?" the guard asked.

"Harper Erikson." you said.

The guard looked down at the sheet and their eyes widened.

"Here we are. Says here that you're to report to the main office. Once you're in the building, it's a left down the hall and it should be straight ahead." the guard replied.

"Thank you." you said.

The gate opened and you walked in, seeing some students milling about near the front doors. A few groups of girls sat around chatting, stopping when they saw you approaching. They didn't say anything, but you knew that this was a case of gawk at the new kid, with your family moving around a lot, this happened a lot. In fact, with this being your senior year, it marked the fourth straight new school you'd been in in high school. Not helped by the fact that this was sprung on you right before summer break ended.

You walked inside and immediately made your way to the main office. The secretary inside was busy typing when you cleared your throat.

"Uh, excuse me." you said.

She looked up and immediately, her eyes widened, just like the guard's. She shifted uncomfortably, and so you took that as meaning that you should introduce yourself.

"I'm Harper Eriksen. I'm a new student, I was told to come here..." you said.

The secretary continued staring.

"Is there a problem?" you asked.

"Uh... maybe I'd better let the headmistress explain." she said.

After a few minutes of muffled arguing between the headmistress, Mrs. Graheme and her secretary, you were now sitting in the headmistress's office, as she attempted to explain the situation.

"And so you see, Mr. Eriksen, this is an all-girl's school, but because of your unisex name... there was some sort of computer error." she said. "You were assigned here by mistake, but because your parents are currently unreachable, we have a legal obligation to house you until the error can be rectified."

"So..." you started.

"So, despite the fact that we don't normally accept boys... you will be enrolled here for the time being, at least until an appropriate co-ed or all-boy's school can be found." she said.

"All right." you said. "It's not ideal, but sharing a campus with a bunch of girls doesn't sound too bad."

You chuckled, though Mrs. Graheme didn't seem amused.

"I do apologize, but we will have to inform the entire campus about your presence, so you won't just be another student. Everyone will know who you are." she said.

"I guess that's okay." you said.

"Now, there's just the matter of living arrangements. We have suites, so you'll only be sharing communal spaces and not a bedroom with the other girls... Your class schedule is right here..." she handed you a sheet of paper. "I think the first thing we should do is..."
15533223331.title: Clerical Error

15533223333.content:
Lost and Found: When his clothes are damaged, a young man has no choice but to wear whatever he can find in the Lost and Found.

In The Dollhouse: When you somehow get shrunken down to six inches tall, your clothes don't shrink with you. Fortunately, your sister collects dolls that are just your new size... except the only clothes that will fit belong to the girl dolls.
15533223333.title: More options

155332233333.content:
Wrong Side of the Bed: When you wake up on your girlfriend's side of the bed, you're compelled to follow her routine.

Henshin!: You find a transformation device lying on the ground and use it to become a superhero, the only problem being that the superhero it was designed for is a woman.
155332233333.title: Something else

choices: A pink dress with heeled boots and a helmet with a visor
A pink leather jumpsuit with matching heeled boots and a full face helmet
1553322333332.content:
As you walked home from the store one day, you stumbled upon an item that appeared to be a cell phone, a flip phone in fact.

"Sort of outdated, isn't it?" you wondered as you picked it up, deciding to open it to find hints as to the owner's identity.

When you opened it, it didn't look like a normal phone. The numeric keypad had buttons, but they were strange characters that you didn't recognize, and the screen wasn't displaying a background or a clock or anything, it was displaying a logo, and that was it. You started to tap buttons to try to find a menu, but after pressing a few buttons, there was a flash of light.

Your vision was enveloped by a bright, pink light and you were frozen in place. For what felt like half a minute, you felt your body being encased in... something. When the 30 seconds were just about up, you felt yourself being able to move once again, and the light faded, leaving you back where you started... but something was different.

You looked down to see that you were now wearing...
1553322333332.title: Henshin!

1553322333333.content: Life Finds a Way: In an age of designer babies, you were an anomaly. Your mother had the genes engineered to get a girl, but instead got a boy. Now 18 years later, your body appears to be trying to fix the mistake.
1553322333333.title: Something else

15533223333331.content:
Up until now, you thought you were just a normal guy. Just graduated high school, and about to start the last summer before college on a road trip with your girlfriend. Unfortunately, those plans got derailed. The why is a bit hard to explain. About 25 years ago, geneticists discovered how to engineer babies to be what the parents wanted. While attempts to bolster intelligence and skills weren't entirely up to snuff, the question of gender was no longer an issue. Parents no longer had to play the lottery and could request what gender they wanted their baby to be. Your mother was one of those people, a fact that had been kept hidden from you until now.

"How could you have never told me?" you demanded.

"When they told me that you were a boy, and that the process failed, I just... I accepted it. Sure, I wanted a daughter at the time, but I knew I'd love you no matter what. It didn't seem relevant." she responded, sadly.

This argument was sparked after you spent a week with a supposed cold, before you started feeling pain in every part of your body. A trip to the doctor confirmed it.

"It's a reaction to the prenatal procedure done." the doctor had stated. "Somehow, the genetic engineering laid dormant for eighteen years, and is now finishing the job it started in the womb. Which will rewrite your body."

"Is there a way to reverse it? Stop it?" you asked.

"Unfortunately, the science is still pretty new. We can't stop it, the most we can do is make the transition easier."

"Transition? But I'm not transgender! I don't want to be a girl! I have a girlfriend, for crying out loud!" you shouted.

"Personalities don't usually shift in situations like this, but I may prescribe that you meet with a counselor to work through the emotional baggage." the doctor said.

"What will I even look like?" you asked.

"Presumably, a female version of who you are now, that's the only part of the fetus that was altered." the doctor replied.

You just wanted to go home and curl up into a ball. While you were laying in bed, the pain having been alleviated by some medication, you heard a knock at the door.

"Go away!" you shouted.

"Please let me in!" a voice shouted, a voice belonging to...
15533223333331.title: Life Finds a Way

155332233333311.content:
Your girlfriend, Danielle. Oh god, how were you going to explain this to her.

"Come in..." you sighed.

She slowly opened the door and stepped inside. She saw you on your bed and walked over, sitting down next to you. You sat up next to her.

"What's wrong, Elliot?" Danni asked.

You explained the entire story to her. Naturally, she already knew the basics of the gene manipulation, it was part of sex-ed in school, but the rest of it... she was in as much shock as you were.

"So you're going to..." she motioned to her chest and then down to her waist.

"Yeah. They don't know when but they think it'll happen within the next few weeks. Some of it might be sudden, some of it might be slow. It's only happened a handful of times, so there's no set course." you said. "Listen, I'd understand if you wanted to..."

She interrupted you.

"No! We're going to make it through together. We might have to postpone the road trip until next summer, but I won't leave your side." Danni insisted.

"Even when I change?" you asked.

"I don't know if I'll be able to love you sexually... but regardless of gender, of what you look like, I love your soul." Danni grabbed you and kissed you deeply. "And that will never change." Danni replied.

You spent the rest of the afternoon going over your plans for the road trip, picking out places to stop, when you felt something twisting inside of you. You hunched over onto the bed.

"What's wrong?" Danni asked. "Is this it?"

"I don't know!" you replied, wincing.

As you lay there...
155332233333311.title: Your girlfriend

15533223333332.content:
#MeToo'd: When a lead actor of a TV show is accused of sexual harassment, his co-stars and accusers have a plan for letting him keep working on the show in spite of the accusations.

Booth Babe: Thanks to a unisex name and slightly androgynous headshot, you're hired to work a nearby convention, dressed as a sexy cosplay girl.
15533223333332.title: Something else

155332233333322.content:
As an aspiring actor, sometimes you got shit roles. Comes with the territory. Sometimes, you even veered into non-acting territory to pay the bills. Some companies even advertised on Craigslist for people to do grunt work at local businesses or events. Hold a sign here, put on a stupid mask and hand out flyers. Usually it was smaller companies that didn't have huge staffs to exploit into doing it, and it was an honest day's work. Plus, sometimes it let you use your acting talents if you were required to be "in-character".

You had posted your own listing on Craigslist to expedite the process, listing your name, head-shot, (https://i.pinimg.com/236x/34/12/14/34121...) and a list of roles you had played or events that you had worked. Sometimes they sucked, but the newest one you got seemed to be promising. The message read as follows:

Hello Elliot Wilson,

We are an entertainment company that is going to be exhibiting at the local pop culture convention and would like to hire you to work our booth. All that's required is that you wear a costume that will be provided. Payment is:

And it was a good amount of pay too! You quickly responded to the email and they sent over some legal contract, some liability waiver or something, you didn't really pay attention because you were too excited about the opportunity. This company was pretty well known and might need actors in the future, so you wanted to make a good impression.

Eventually, the day of the event arrived. You were given instructions to meet them at their offices, about two blocks from the convention center.
155332233333322.title: Booth Babe

1553322333333221.content:
There were a few signs that things were slightly amiss. The first of which being that the only people you took the elevator with were stunningly attractive women. When you got to the offices of the company, Amazing Entertainment, you walked up to their front desk, behind several of the women you had taken the elevator with. They were pointed to a sitting area. When you walked up, dressed in a casual outfit, the woman looked at you, puzzled.

"And you are?" she asked.

"Elliot Wilson... I'm here for the gig. My ad was answered..." you replied.

"I see..." she looked at a list on her clipboard. "I'll be right back."

She walked away, and after a minute or so, returned, with a thirty-something hipstery looking guy following her.

"Elliot! If you'll come with me to my office real quick..." the man beckoned. "I'm Jeff, the head of our convention prep team here."

You followed him into the office and sat down. Once you did, Jeff took a deep breath.

"It would seem that there's been some sort of misunderstanding." he said.

"Misunderstanding?" you asked.

"You see... because of the name... and the head shot.. we thought that you were a girl." Jeff admitted.

"Wait... so when you said you needed someone in costume to work booths you meant..." you started.

"Booth Babes... yeah." Jeff sighed.

"I guess I'm out, then?" you asked, standing up.

"Not quite..." Jeff said. "We needed all the girls for the con, and your costume was tailor-made for your size. If you're willing to do it, we'd give you a bonus..."

You were completely taken aback by the offer. It was a lot of money... but to dress like a girl...? Decisions, decisions...
1553322333333221.title: Arriving at the office

155332233333323.content:
Forced Diversity: Your Major League Gaming team is up for a huge sponsorship, but the sponsor refuses unless your team recruits some female gamers. When your team can't find any willing/skilled enough, they take matters into their own hands.

A Unique Punishment: A beleaguered girlfriend is at her wit's end with her boyfriend being an aggressive slacker. That is, until her best friend tells her about a method her mother used to stop her younger brother from being an aggressive slacker.
155332233333323.title: Something else

choices: To take the pill willingly, for the sake of the team
You refuse, so they force you to take it
1553322333333231.content:
In the near future Professional Video Gaming has taken over as the world’s premier professional sporting event. It brings together teams from all over the world to compete and play for huge cash prizes. Most of these teams are groups of friends who live together practicing every day for their next big competition. The current most popular game in the world is called Legend. A team based battle royal game where squads of four fight to be the last group standing.

You are part of one of these teams. A small group of friends from high school who have been living together for the past year. You guys were newcomers on the Major League Gaming Circuit until you won Back to Back Championships two years running. That put your team on the map. This was followed by online streaming, podcasts, video chats, etc.

Your Team- Nerd Revolution

You- Tyler Mathews: Age 21: Race: White: 6’1 180lbs

Position- Team Leader: You are the team Captain. You organize and the lead the team in co-op games. You strategize and come up with ways to defeat your enemies. You also handle disputes between team members. In combat you take more supportive of defensive approach. Making sure your team stays alive.

Marcus Lancer- Age 21: Race: Black: 6’3 220lbs

Position- Rusher. Marcus is your front line man. He specializes in short range, high speed combat situations. He is first to the battle every time and plays the fastest and quickest of all of you. He trades accuracy for speed and is a terror for enemies to try and hit.

Simon Yamoto- Age: 21 Race: Asian: 5’8 150lbs

Position- Assault. Simon is your main DPS and has the highest kill count of the team. He focuses on midrange damage and suppression. His hair trigger reflexes allow him to quickly react lay down highly punishing amounts of damage to the enemy.

Juan Gonzalez- Age 21: Race: Hispanic: 5’9 160lbs

Position- Sniper: Juan is your long range specialist. He is incredibly accurate and rarely misses a shot. He stays in the back as much as possible. Finding the high ground and taking the enemies apart one shot at a time.

Now a few years later your team is nationally recognized. You are only a few steps behind the best teams in the world. Now a huge opportunity has come into your team’s lap. Atlas Gaming. The world largest professional gaming sponsor has come to your team with an offer. They want to sponsor your team and help you get world wide recognition. This would be merchandise deals, touring, etc. This was the big break your team was waiting for! There was just little snag...

Atlas Gaming felt your team is too...Masculine. Nowadays Professional Gaming has done everything it can to shed off the bad reputation that video games are just for boys. In order for them to take you on as clients they insist you add a girl to the team.

At first your team did everything you could to recruit a female member. You held open auditions and try outs for any female gamer to try and join you.

However one after the other none of them could come close to the skill levels your team requires. While many of the ladies who auditioned were skilled gamers, none of them were on the professional level...

When you reported this to Atlas Gaming they came back to you with another option. One of you could undergo DNA Resequencing...

DNA Resequence Therapy or DRT or short was a new scientific breakthrough. It allowed a person to physically change their gender from the DNA. This meant the person became a true member of the opposite gender without surgery.

It was a landmark for anyone Transgender or anyone who wasn’t comfortable in their own body. However it was still a new procedure and there were issues with it...

The process was irreversible, it was also very controversial. It was only legal in a few states and the laws regarding those who underwent the process were still murky at best.

At first your entire team refused this option. You and your team were all normal straight guys. Marcus and Juan even have girlfriends that hang out with you sometimes.

Atlas tried to spin it in a new light. If one of you took the procedure you could sell yourselfs as a champion of female gamers and for DRT as a whole.

Your team still refused. It was asking one of you to give up your life and change it forever. It was too high of a price for anyone of you to pay.

However as the weeks went by and your teams numbers and popularity began to slip talks began to surface again. Marcus and Juan began to argue that you or Simon should take the DRT since we were the single ones. Simon argued you should take it as their leader. It would sent a positive message being led by a female gamer.

You still refused. No sponsorship was worth giving up your life as a man.

This caused a fracture in the group. Teamwork and communication was starting to break down. Your team was beginning to lose matches it should have won.

Your team pleaded with you again to reconsider taking the DRT. It was a simple pill. It would cause a “mostly painless” transformation. The four of you were sitting at a table currently discussing options as you decided...
1553322333333231.title: Forced Diversity

1553322333333232.content:
Grace Stevens was at her wit's end. After bailing out her boyfriend for the fifth bar fight in as many weeks, she was just about ready to kick him to the curb, but was having doubts, which she expressed to her best friend.

"I'm telling you, Shelly. I just don't know what to do with him! He keeps saying he'll change, but he never does! But every time I want to kick him out, I just keep letting him stay. He can't keep a job, keeps getting into barfights... I don't know..." Grace sighed.

"Sounds like my brother..." Shelly remarked. "Not barfights, but school fights, back when he was a kid. Slacked off, hung out with a bunch of delinquents... my mom's last straw was when he shoplifted."

"What did she do?" Grace asked.

"It's sort of embarrassing, really. But if you promise not to tell anyone, cause he'll never forgive me if anyone finds out." Shelly said.

"I promise." Grace assured her. "What is it?"

"She put him in dresses. My brother Danny spent an entire summer as my sister Danielle. I was in college when it happened, so I was there for the whole thing." Shelly said.

"Oh my god..." Grace was shocked. "Is he okay?"

"Oh yeah, it was just a summer and to be honest... my mom realized how messed up it was when she was threatening to send him to an all-girls school in the fall. But he's well adjusted and everything. About to graduate college himself, emphasis on the himself. Got a good girlfriend too," Shelly said. "But it worked though."

"It did?"

"Oh yeah, he never misbehaved again. Stopped hanging out with the losers he was with. He's got a great job lined up after graduation. I doubt he'd want to re-live that summer, but I guess it worked! Come to think of it... might work for you, too."

"I couldn't..." Grace said. "It's not right."

"Well not like my mom did, but you know, maybe pretend it's some freaky bedroom stuff, maybe he'll act nicer if he spends some time in your shoes." Shelly said.

"Hmmm...." Grace started to turn the idea over in her head. It was crazy... right? But maybe...
1553322333333232.title: A Unique Punishment

1553322333333233.content:
Rival Revenge: On the day of the big game, Northtown's rivals, Southtown, kidnap their lead quarterback and transform him into one of their cheerleaders.

Corporate Espionage: A male office worker is sent to work at a rival company as a secretary to learn their trade secrets.
1553322333333233.title: Something else

choices: They use a bodysuit to transform Brendan
They use a magic spell to transform Brendan
15533223333332331.content:
It was game day, and the entirety of Northtown High was eagerly awaiting the game that would be played later that afternoon. Football was an institution for Northtown, and the game was an event. It was also an event for the rival school, Southtown High. Northtown had been the winner of the game for the last decade, and they knew something had to change. This year, Northtown had been relying heavily on their star quarterback, Brendan Asterman and Southtown knew it. If they could somehow remove him from the game, they might stand a chance. And that's what they decided to do.

After a quick workout, Brendan Asterman returned to the locker room to towel off and head to the last minute practice, to make sure that the team was ship-shape for the big game. When he arrived in the locker room, it was strangely empty, but Brendan didn't think much of it. He quickly opened his locker and grabbed his clothes from it. He pulled on his underwear before he heard a strange sound behind him. Before he could react, he was quickly grabbed from behind and a soaked rag thrust into his face. After a few seconds of resisting, his eyes shut and he fell unconscious.

Chet Nash smiled as the rival quarterback lay unconscious in front of him. Three other Southtown players quickly ran into the room and grabbed Brendan's other limbs. They lifted him up and put him into a wheeled equipment basket and rolled him out of the school and into the trunk of Chet's car. They drove straight to Southtown and dragged him into their locker room.

"So, how are we gonna do this, Chet?" the running back asked. "How do we keep him out of the game?"

"Simple my friends, we're going to..." Chet started.
15533223333332331.title: Rival Revenge

155332233333323312.content:
“...use a spell my sister taught me.”

The running back gawked at him. “That’s your plan? Are you crazy? We’re relying on spells!”

The quarterback, however, seemed relatively unphased. “Is this the same sister that-“

Chet nodded before he even finished. “I know what you’re about to say. Yes, the very same.”

“Then let’s do it.”

The running back continued to stare, obviously floored by what was going on, as Chet announced.

“This spell is going to change...”
155332233333323312.title: They use a magic spell to transform Brendan

1553322333333233121.content:
"The spell is going to change his appearance. Can't very well play if he's not in peak physical condition, right?" Chet asked.

"So you're gonna make him fat? Or shrink him?" the quarterback asked.

"Not quite. Spells like that are complex and require years of training, however my sister was able to teach me one spell really quickly." Chet replied.

Brendan started to stir and open his eyes slightly.

"We're running out of time. Hold him down." Chet ordered.

His teammates complied and grabbed Brendan's arms and legs. Brendan, who had realized who was standing over him, started to thrash around.

"Let me go, Chet! Whatever you've got planned, I am making it to that game!" Brendan spat.

"Of course you are. Playing in it, that's another story." Chet laughed.

Chet grabbed a book out from his locker and started reading the yellowed and tattered pages aloud. It was in some sort of language that Brendan couldn't understand, but that didn't exactly matter, as he suddenly felt intense pain. He tried to scream, but nothing came out.

Chet's lackeys looked slightly concerned, save for the quarterback, while Chet simply watched as Brendan began to transform.
1553322333333233121.title: His appearance

15533223333332332.content:
“I’m...I’m not so sure about this...” David Wilson said as he sat in the board meeting.

Marshall Evans the head CFO of the company stood up looking to him.

“You are not in a position to complain...After your latest trade deal failed our stock prices dropped 7%. Now our rival InnoTech has surprassed us in the global economy.” He said.

“I know I’m sorry but...this? Is there no other way?” David asked.

Travis Yun, one of the head genetic engineers stood up.

“Our engineers have worked out the DNA resequence gaps. They assure us the transformation will be seemless. Our other mole at InnoTech will get your hired on as one of the secretaries of a board member. You just have to watch, Listen, and report back to us your findings.” He explained.

Charles Mathews, the CEO and head of GeneTech industrial stood up.

“We need this advantage. DNA restructuring technologies like ours and InnoTech’s is the future. We need to be the one to lead the world in this. We cannot fall behind. Consider this an act of redemption. You succeed and a board position becomes available, you fail or refuse and no company will ever hire you again.” He said.

“You are the ideal candidate, your young, single, and have worked here the least. Consider this an opportunity.” Travis Yun said.

David sat there bewildered by his options. He would have to go undercover as a female secretary at a rival company. Learn their secrets from the inside. He would have to learn to live as woman, be given a new apartment, identity, and everything. If he succeeded, he was promised I high paying board member position. If he refused or failed, he would be throwing his career into the garbage...
15533223333332332.title: Corporate Espionage

155332233333323321.content:
"You aren't really giving me much of a choice, here." David said. "I'll do it."

"I figured you'd see this our way." Marshall smiled.

"And it's reversible, right?" David asked.

"As long as we still have your base DNA sample on file, yes." Travis said. "Just as the procedure will rewrite your DNA and change it, it can also be changed back, or changed into any sample we use."

"And I'll get to go back at the end?" David asked.

"If you succeed. If you get caught, we have to distance ourselves from you and denounce anything you do." Charles said.

"So, don't get caught." Marshall said.

"Duly noted." David sighed.

"Our mole has given us a comprehensive list of characteristics that the best, and more importantly, most well-trusted secretaries at InnoTech have had in the past, which should help in getting you in. We've already created a DNA profile out of hundreds of samples, to ensure that you won't look too similar to anyone else. Once you can act the part, we'll implant you into InnoTech and the mission will begin." Marshall said.

"When do we start?" David asked.

"As soon as we put your old life on ice for the time-being." Marshall said. "David will be taking a leave of absence, following that trade deal debacle. That way, no one will come looking for you while you're at InnoTech."

"Let's get it over with." David said.
155332233333323321.title: David reluctantly agrees

1553322333333233211.content:
Several days passed as David awaited the day of the procedure. His company GeneTech spent the time setting things up for his new identity and life. He would be given a new apartment to live in, new clothes, ID, and even a new car to drive.

When the day finally came David drove to work more terrified than any day before in his life. He wanted to back out, he wanted to leave, quit, make up an excuse why he couldn’t do it, anything to get out of this...

However he found himself realizing the truth, if he bailed his career was over. If he did this mission, swallowed his pride, he would be set up for life.

Taking a deep breath he stepped out of his car and went into his work place heading into the elevator and up into the research labs.

Up there he was greeted by a female doctor he didn’t recognize. She was remarkably attractive for a doctor he thought. She had a great figure, long brunette hair, and wore a tight and rather revealing dress and heels.

“Hi there you must David, I’m Dr. Lori Langley. You can just call me Lori.” She said shaking his hand.

“Umm...yes. Umm...where is everyone else?” David asked seeing thay the lab was empty except for them.

“Do to the nature of the procedure and secrecy of your mission no one else inside GeneTech will be allowed here for this procedure. I will act as your point of contact within here as well as a guide for anything you need regarding the female body you will be given. Any other questions before we begin?” She asked.

“Umm...what kind of woman am I becoming?” David asked nervously.

Dr. Lori laughed a bit at the question. In her mind this was a delicate medical procedure but of a course a typical guy like David was more concerned with his looks...

“You don’t have to worry. We have put together a DNA profile that we feel will best help you fit in over at InnoTech.” Dr. Lori said.

“Okay...it hurt...the change?” David asked.

“There will be some discomfort. Nothing life-threatening but it won’t be jusy a simple transition. The process of reshaping bone-structure, organs, and genetics does take its toll on the body.” Dr. Lori said.

David nodded as Dr. Lori instructed to remove his clothes and to lay down on prepped medical table nearby. Dr. Lori than proceeded to strap down his hands and feet preventing him from leaving.

“I’m going to inject you with a pre-programmed nannite formula mixture. The nanomachines inside will reprogram your DNA and restructure you into the design we have laid out. Once the transformation is complete we will take you for identity processing to introduce you...well...the knew you.” She said taking a needle out that was filled with an odd looking pink fluid.

Before David could utter a word Dr. Lori stuck the needle in his arm and injected the formula into his body.
1553322333333233211.title: The day of the procedure

15533223333332332111.content:
Dr. Lori stepped away as David felt the nanomachines spreading through his system.

The first thing he felt was his body becoming extremely warm.

Suddenly, his skin felt like it was burning. He screamed as he felt his limbs bubbling. He shut his eyes tightly as the transformation truly began.

Dr. Lori watched on as the fat in David's body began to redistribute. His legs and arms started to slim as the fat pooled in the chest area. The skin on his face was shifting considerably, as the bones shrank and redistributed. David's hair started to fall out, and almost immediately, was replaced with long blonde hair that began to flow from his scalp. The hair on his arms and legs however, remained gone.

David clenched his fists, but recoiled when the nails in his hands grew and started stabbing his palms. He screamed again, but was silenced as his vocal chords shifted.

His groin began to tingle as his member shrank in and was replaced with the feminine equivalent. At the same time, the fat pooling in his chest began to form into rounded masses that began to sprout forth.

Things began to settle down as David heard a few pops and cracks as everything moved into place. All discomfort was starting to subside, and the pains were going away. David wiggled the toes of his now-dainty feet to test that he still had everything he was supposed to.

Once everything calmed down, David sighed in relief, but in a different voice.

"Congratulations." Dr. Lori said, walking over and releasing the restraints.

David immediately sat up and brushed the blonde hair from his face.

"Can I see?" David asked.

"Sure." Dr. Lori handed David a hand-mirror.

David gazed into the mirror, seeing a face entirely unlike his own. Extremely feminine, small nose, big blue eyes with long eyelashes, lips that were kissable, but not overly plump, overall, the word to describe it would be...

"Plain." David held a hand to his face. "I look... plain."

"Typical male response." Dr. Lori scoffed. "The tech is good, but if you want to look good, you'll have to use makeup, like women have been doing forever."

"I guess I just expected it to be a one and done thing." David replied as he angled the mirror down to his well-endowed chest.

"If only." Dr. Lori sighed. "But this works in our favor. There's no better way to make you feel like a woman than to make you learn all the intricacies of cosmetics."

"I guess." David said, hopping off the table, and shivering when his feet his the cold metal floor.

"Come on, we've got to get you some proper clothes. Then we can assign your new identity and then get to your training." Dr. Lori handed David a white robe, which he quickly pulled over his body.

"Or we could do assignment first, then wardrobe. Your choice." Dr. Lori said.
15533223333332332111.title: The transformation

It was beautiful star filled night...

You are Jesse Evans. Age 21. You were laying on a park bench staring up into the sky on a warm summer’s night. You were currently staying at an RV park getting ready to hit the road tomorrow morning with your two best friends Aaron and Julia.

The three of you had always been friends going back since grade school. You had planned this road trip for a year now. The plan was to spend all summer traveling the country and seeing everything you could. It took months and months of planning and saving, plus borrowing your parents RV but you finally managed to make it happen. You guys were now a week into your trip and several states away from home.

Julia was a tomboy. Tougher than most of the guys you know, she could fix an engine, throw a ball, and defend herself better than most guys. However this year she has been trying to act way more girly. She grew her hair out, started wearing skirts and dresses. Even though every time she even does everything feminine she is the first to make a sarcastic remark about it. You had to admit she was rather pretty when she actually made the effort.

Aaron was a nerd. You saved from a bully years ago and sense then he has been your best friend. He knows computers better than anyone you have ever met. Movies, comics, video games, he knows it all. Skinny as a poll but with a good heart. His only real fault is he is a hopeless romantic. He has always had a secret crush on Julia but that’s always been a one sided affection.

You were always a middle of the road guy. You played some sports but nothing competitive. You liked movies and video games but you weren’t obsessed. You had dated in the past but nothing serious. You never really knew what defined you. The best thing you could say about yourself was your ability to keep your friends together and always find a way ahead no matter the problem.

You were finishing up a beer enjoying the warm summer night as you sat up and looked around for the bathroom. Since you were so far outdoors most guys just found a quiet space somewhere out in the desert. You were in the Southwest now heading west to California coast before heading north.

Wandering off a bit to take care of business you yawned as you looked up to the stars wondering if this was going to be the last adventure you and your friends would go on? Life was drifting you guys farther apart now and who knows when another opportunity like this will come up?

As you finished you saw something odd in the night sky...it looked like a shooting star almost...As it got closer and closer your eyes widened as what looked like a small comet cane falling out of the sky and landed several hundred yards in front of you...

You quickly began to rush over as quick as you could giving the darkness and surroundings as you saw smoke rising from a small creator ahead of you...

As you made your way to the creator you saw what had fallen from the sky.

At first you thought it was a downed satellite or small UFO...

It looked like metal box of some kind. It was cube shaped and about the size of a refrigerator. There didn’t seem to be any opening anywhere but there was one large blinking light on it. Upon looking closer it seemed to be some kind of button...

Curiousness was always one of your weaknesses. You could resist as you reached over and pushed the large yellow button on the weird space box you found.

“The clothes are mine...Jesse just wanted something loose fitting. She normally wears such tight and girly clothes. She can be kinda slutty sometimes.” Julia said back giving you a death glare.

“Yep...that’s me...You know I like to show off my uh...tits...and stuff. Sure do like that a lot...” You said gritting through your teeth hating Julia right now for saying that.

“Dude...bitches be crazy right?” Aaron said trying to fake a total bro attitude as you and Julia both nudged him hard for saying that.

The agent began rolling his eyes as the three of you arguing and acting like fools as he held up his hand.

“Okay okay I get it...that’s enough....just...get out of here and be careful.” He said letting the three of you go.

A wave of relief fell over the three of you as you were released. You walked as normally as you could away from the site and back to your RV.

-Back at the site-

Another agent came by. He was younger with dark skin and a well groomed appearance.

“You get anything out of those three?” He asked the older agent.

“No...why are young people so dumb nowadays?” He asked.

“Beats me....However you might wanna look at this.” The younger black agent said handing him a digital tablet.

The older white agent looked it over as his eyes widened a bit....

-Back at the RV-

“Yo I’m driving let’s GTFO!” Aaron said as you finished packing up your stuff.

“Where are we even going?” Julia asked.

“Anywhere that isn’t here! We are stuck in some ET or Men in Black level bullshit right now!” Aaron replied.

“West...head west. To the California coast. I think whatever was in that container is heading for water...” You replied.

“What makes sure?” Julia asked.

You called them back to the bathroom where your old clothes were still covered in pink slime. It was all hard and sticky now ruining your old clothes. You tried washing them with water from the sink and then...

You showed them the pink slime seemed to react with water. It began to glow brighter giving off bright shine.

“West it is....We need to stop at the first town we can though. You need a new wardrobe.” Julia added.

Aaron started up the RV as you left the RV park. You were in New Mexico now so El Paso was the closest town.
1553322333333233311111111.title: Acting the part

15533223333332333111111111.content:
Before too much longer, you all were on the road again, leaving you all to digest what just happened.

"Well, so much for acting natural," Julia groaned. "Was that really the best you could come up with?"

"Well excuse me for not rehearsing my script beforehand. I wasn't under the impression I'd be tested," you retorted back. "Look you know I wouldn't mean that right?"

"No of course not. Doesn't mean it didn't sting though," Julia sighed. "Fat phase really...."

"Can we just say we're even thanks to the "slutty" remark," you sighed, leaning back into your own seat. "I think we can say we got each other embarrassed."

"On the bright side, I kind of got to play the role of wingman," Aaron smirked a little. Hey, as strange as this was, for a nerd like him, being surrounded by two girls....two girls that were really cute in all honesty......was a little fun.

"Yeah yeah enjoy it while you can," you smirked a little, probably the closet to smiling you had gotten since this mess began. "Let's just hope that's the last we see of those suits."

"One can hope," Aaron replied.

With that, you all settled into a little silence, listening to typical music as you drove along the desert road. You tried to get as comfortable as possible, but the mismatched clothes didn't help. God these boobs were so strange, and without a bra they just swayed with each movement. Guess you could imagine why bras were helpful.

"You know....I wonder why that slime was shining with the water," Aaron mentioned.

"Neither do I," you sighed. "Guess we'll find out whenever we come across it again."

"Whatever it is, I just want to make it regret causing this mess," Julia said a little threateningly. "It totally messed up our trip."

"Well....I wouldn't say that," Aaron said. "I mean....sure it's a little strange now but.....we can still enjoy ourselves...right?"

He laughed a little sheepishly at that, but you and Julia actually did smile a little. Hey, if this had to happen, at least it was around your childhood friends. You could never explain this to your parents.

In any case, after a little while longer, El Paso came into view.
15533223333332333111111111.title: On the road

choices: Go for it...go for the sexy clothes and salon
155332233333323331111111111.content:
Coming into El Paso you pulled the RV into a local strip mall. The summer heat was blazing as it was pushing 100 degrees out today.

“Oh my god it’s like standing on the sun.!” Aaron said stepping out.

“Yeah it’s summer time dude...Julia why are you still wearing that?” You asked looking back.

Julia was wearing baggy sweatpants and a baggy sweat shirt. During this whole road trip in fact she had been wearing loose and baggy clothes covering as much of herself as possible.

It’s not like either of you cared much. Julia was always the tomboy. She barely had any boobs all through high school and she was so tall and big many confused her for a boy. She even had short hair for most of it, it was actually a surprise she had grown it out recently.

“Don’t worry about it...” Julia said trying to deflect that question.

“Hey I see a clothing store up ahead. What should I get?” You asked.

“Let’s see here, you are like a solid 7/10 now so we better get you some skimpy outfits, that would at least take you up to like an 8....Ow!” Aaron said sarcastically as Julia punched him in the arm.

“Whatever is comfortable for you. We are in the Southwest during summer so just keep that in mind.” Julia said.

The three of you went inside as Julia took you to the ladies section while you banished Aaron to another part of the store for now.

There seemed to be countless choices but you decided to keep it simple. Shorts, shirts, underwear, and flip flops. You took the clothes to the dressing room as Julia followed to give you a hand.

“36C not bad...” Julia said measuring your bust for your new bra size.

Julia showed you how to put it on and after a bit you figured it out. You continued to try on some more clothes as you could tell something was bothering Julia.
