She took her hair out of its bun as it fell past her butt showing it was much longer then she let on before. Her former boyish frame was now a perfect hourglass figure. Her butt was rounder, hips were wider, she had turned from a tall tomboy to a tall sexy woman!

“The doctors said it was a late term hormone development....Basically my body didn’t release the proper amount of hormones and estrogen when I was growing up. That’s why I looked so much like a boy. Then last year my body began dumping all those stores up hormones all at once. I went up three cup sizes in a year, developed curves, everything...I went through massive mood swings it was horrible...” Julia said.

“Julia...I had no idea I’m so sorry.” You said trying to comfort her.

“Look I know I’m no position to complain about their body but...” Julia said tearing up a bit.

“Hey hey, it’s okay.” You said giving her a big hug. Right now you just wanted to focus on being a good friend.

“I spent months learning how to adapt to this body. I wore dresses, skirts, and heels. It just always felt so weird but after awhile I...I actually started to like it. You wanna hear something stupid? I was actually planning to surprise you with my stash of sexy clothes I brought on our trip...I wanted..I wanted you to be my first...” Julia said embarrassed.

You weren’t sure how to take that. Julia was always your friend. You never had thought about her in a sexual way. Mostly because you never had to. She looked like a boy most of her life which made it easy to ignore. If you were still a guy however you had to admit she looked pretty sexy now you aren’t sure how you would have reacted.

“Hey...I have a crazy idea...What if we both got dolled up here? Instead of just boring clothes we go for the full thing. Skirts, dresses, heels, and everything. If I’m all dressed up wouldn’t that make it easier for you to be comfortable?” You asked.

“I...guess...I’m not sure though...I don’t know if I’m ready for all that...” Julia said.

“There is even a hair and nail salon next door...We could just go for it. Get all feminized and everything?” You said.

You weren’t exactly sure why you were doing this but you knew it would help out your friend and that’s what mattered most.

After thinking for a bit Julia decided to...
155332233333323331111111111.title: Shopping

1553322333333233311111111111.content:
Julia thought on it for a good minute, making you wonder just what she was going to do. To be frank, even you were surprised at your words, but you did want to make your friend feel better, even if you were dealing with your own problems.

And then, she gave a genuine smile.

"All right....if girling it up is what you want, then it's what you'll get," she said, leading into a little giggle. "Just remember that we have a budget to keep in mind. We're not rich."

"Yeah I know," you smiled a little too. This sounded totally ridiculous, yet you felt kind of happy. Julia seemed to be a little better, and that mattered most. "So, why don't you lead the way then?"

With a bigger smile, Julia lead you back into the clothing aisles, once she was re-dressed herself. You both spent quite a bit of time looking over various feminine items, from blouses to skirts to tops to dresses to everything in between. You got the feeling you both would be spending quite a bit of time traveling back and forth between the aisles and the dressings rooms. Heck, after just one cycle, you had arms full of items.

"So, basically just really late puberty?" you asked as you were stripping out of your current clothes.

"Yeah. It's pretty uncommon according to the doctor, which is no surprise," Julia said as she unhooked her bra, going to try on a lacier one for kicks. "It was like getting hit with a ton of bricks. I felt overwhelmed a lot of time. Experimenting with some different clothes and what not actually helped to alleviate it somewhat. That's why I even grew my hair out this long, just to get a feel for it."

"I see," you nodded. "Gotta say, you hid it well. I never would have guessed you had that much hair in that bun."

"A trick of the trade," Julia smiled. "Really works when you want to hide something."

You laughed a little with her, finding the atmosphere really welcoming now despite the oddity of it all. On your end, the overly feminine items were certainly....something. Skirts felt oddly liberating, yet you felt kind of naked with them too. The tops were tighter than anything you had before, yet not constricting or anything. Julia even admitted she felt similarly to stuff like that at first.

At one point, while Julia was trying on a lacy pair of underwear and was bending over to get a dress off the bench, you got a full look at your rear. My god, she was truly stacked, both in the front and in the back. You hadn't thought much about sex in regards to girls often, but that didn't mean you weren't attracted. Granted, you weren't sure how much that transferred over to this new body.

On that though, you felt a little odd when looking at Julia half-naked. Your nipples were suddenly feeling harder, and you felt a tiny wet feeling down below, making you blush a little at the sensations. Was....that how arousal was like as a woman? It was.....bizarre...

And sadly for you, Julia noticed it, giggling a little.

"So, I take it you still like girls?" she smiled. "Admittedly, it's hard to tell sometimes."

"Hey, I like girls plenty," you defended. "Just....never thought about it much. Other priorities."

"I wasn't trying to accuse you," Julia smiled, pulling over a yellow dress that actually matched very well. "Just sometimes wondered where you stood there."

Your face had to be red at the sudden talk of that stuff. Leave it to Julia to see right through you in that regard.

"A-Anyway....that aside..." you said, wanting to divert the conversation. "Um....your chest....so they really get that big naturally?"

You could ask that, right? You were a girl at the moment so you couldn't be accused of being a pervert right?

"Apparently they do. That shocked me too," Julia smiled a little bashfully at that. "The increase in cup size came super quick as I said before. I don't think anyone in my family got breasts this big."

You nodded in affirmation at that. Guess everyone's different. At that though, you got back to trying on your own stuff. For a little fun, you had gotten a dress in the same style as Julia's, though blue as opposed to her yellow. It was a bright blue though, which you liked. You tried it on, feeling the strange sensation of silk on you.

"Damn....you really pull that off well," Julia smiled, coming over to gently adjust it where it needed to be. "Just the right length and everything."

For a little fun, she dragged you over to the mirror, just to see you both in your dresses. It was quite a surreal sight, and both of you were a little shy about it, which was evident on your faces. Seeing that though ended up making both of you laugh a little bit. It was so silly and stupid and yet kind of fun to be doing it together.

"Okay, I think this is worthy of a few pictures." Julia said.

"Might as well use mine. I have like no pictures on mine," you smiled.

"Fair enough." Julia replied.

The two of you had a little fun with some pictures, before deciding to proceed on. You both tried some heels, which Julia was obviously better in. You buckled over quite a bit when trying them, needing the wall and Julia to help stay up. That would certainly take some getting used to, the sensation of being up on your feet like that.

Then again, you had time to practice, especially as the two of you tried a couple more cycles of shopping. In the end, it felt like you had tried on almost everything in the aisle, even though you hadn't really. You and Julia figured out which ones you wanted to keep, since you at least needed some necessities in addition to the girlier stuff. For a little bit of fun, after making the purchases, you both decided to keep the dresses and heels on. Might as well see how far it could go.

"So, feeling any better about it?" Julia smiled and blushed a little.

"Well...if it was anyone else, probably not," you said, laughing sheepishly. "But.....I'll admit it wasn't bad with you...."

"Aw, why thank you," Julia said playfully, even giving you a little kiss on the cheek.

Now that wasn't out of the ordinary. Even Julia did that at times, most often as a way to mess around. Aaron especially was really easy to mess with. Speaking of which, you couldn't see him.

"Probably saw that game store that was on the way," Julia said when you pointed it out. "He'll catch up."

With that, the salon was next. Granted, you both didn't want to burn through your money, so Julia tried to keep it relatively simple. Nothing too fancy. Just a little clean up with your hair and nails and you'd be good.

Thankfully it wasn't too busy either, so it was easy to get in and the prices were good. It wasn't the first time you had been in a salon, as your mom had taken you to one once for your high school graduation picture. You got your hair all cleaned up and your nails done a little, keeping yours clear since you weren't in to coloring them.

Then again, Julia wasn't either, so no problem there. You both spent a little time inside before being done.

"Phew......glad to actually have someone around for that," Julia said. "I've gone to a salon perhaps once or twice, but only when I was definitely alone and if I could hide it in time."

"Makes sense to me," you said.

Boy, this was turning into quite the whirlwind. How long had you even spent in here now....?
1553322333333233311111111111.title: Go for it...go for the sexy clothes and salon

15533223333332333111111111112.content:
After shopping and makeovers the two of you went and took a rest. There was a juice bar nearby so you decided to get some smoothies and relax.

“This is so weird...We have been getting looks all day.” Julia said.

“I know...is this how girls feel all the time?” You asked.

Julia laughed. “How am I supposed to know? I looked like a boy until a year ago. I basically never left the house once I started developing. I was far too embarrassed.” Julia replied.

“Hey at least you were born a girl...Mother nature just took her sweet time making you pretty. I’m the one who got blasted with alien slime remember?” You said joking.

“Yeah I know I’m sorry. I can imagine having your manhood ripped away like that.” Julia said.

“It’s weird...At first it freaked me out. Now it feels like I’m in kind of adventure. New body, weird alien slime, shifty government agents. I’m kinda just going with it.” You said with a chuckle.

Julia laughed at the response as she pointed behind you. Aaron was walking around looking for you two as he seemed a bit lost and confused. It took him a few minutes to come by as he didn’t even recognize either of you at first.

“Yo...” You said waving at him.

Aaron paused for second confused. From his perspective two cute girls were just waving at him. His eyes then widened as he realized who you were.

“Whoa! Jesse and Julia! I...uhh...whoa...Julia when did you become a girl? I mean Jesse you became a girl yesterday but like serious when did you....ow...” Aaron said as Julia hit his shoulder.

“You were hiding the fact you were secretly hot this whole time?!” Aaron said as you caught him up.

“I didn’t want you freaking out over my massive tits...You know how you get...” Julia said looking him over.

“What? I don’t....Well I don’t always...wait...Yes I do...okay fair point but what? I feel like everyone here is changing except me...” Aaron said.

“You got anymore of that pink slime?” Julia asked jokingly.

You laughed. “Sorry fresh out. I would mind seeing Aaron grow boobs.” You said cupping your own in a joking manner.

“Hahaha....yeah you two are hilarious...well if you two are done getting all dolled up we should hit the road. You said we need to hit the coat right? We still have to find whatever did this to you don’t we?” Aaron asked.

“I guess your right. Go get the RV we will meet you there.” You said tossing him the keys.

Aaron rolled his eyes before leaving to get the RV as you two finished up your drinks. Male or female, messing with Aaron was still fun.

As you two left the Juice bar you both suddenly froze...Standing outside was the same two government agents you saw before. The older white one and the younger black one. They were holding up scanners of some kind looking around the area.

“Maybe they won’t notice us with the makeovers...” Julia whispered as you tried to walk back to the RV
15533223333332333111111111112.title: Taking a break

155332233333323331111111111121.content:
Well, that seemed like the best idea, or the only idea really.

"Hopefully," you whispered back.

You and Julia tried to act exactly the same as you just were, as two young women just having a good day, all while keeping an eye on the agents. It was a little amusing in the sense that they were getting some odd looks as well, like seeing a movie or something. Still, it didn't make you feel better about it.

As you and Julia walked, about halfway through, the younger black agent paused for a second. Your blood froze for a few seconds, before the man eventually started walking again, though he did appear to glance in your direction. There was another slight pause, but he eventually followed the other agent.

Once they were a little bit away, you released a breath you didn't know you were holding.

"Okay.....that might have taken off a few years..." you shivered a bit.

"Me too," Julia sighed. "Let's just get out of here. Less we stick around the better."

"Right. Lead the way," you said.

With that, you both picked up the pace just a little bit, not going too fast to bring any sort of suspicion to you. Another minute and you both were outside the building, and you could already see the RV being wheeled around. You didn't even wait for Aaron to greet you both as you got in.

"Woah, where's the fire?" Aaron asked.

"The fire is the fact that those agents were back," Julia said, getting buckled in. "So, in other words, we need to scram."

"No need to tell me twice," Aaron replied.

With that, he wheeled the RV around and through the cars, getting back to the main roads as you were once again headed westward. Getting seated yourself, it was kind of too bad. That was a pretty enjoyable little shopping trip you had with Julia. Made you wish you had more time to fool around in there. Hopefully next time.
155332233333323331111111111121.title: They don’t immediately recognize you

1553322333333233311111111111211.content:
Back on the road your heart was beating rapidly as it took everything you had to calm down.

“How did they find us?” Julia asked her own nerves rattled.

“I dunno...they must have some kind of tracker on that pink slime. Maybe since I was exposed to it they can follow the trail?” You suggested.

“It’s lucky you decided to get all dolled up but you realize you are stuck this way now right?” Aaron said.

“What are you talking about?” You said.

“Think about it. If they remember your faces from before the only way we can get around safety now is if you two make yourselves as girly as possible so they don’t recognize you.” Aaron explained.

The reality of your situation began to sink in for a moment...

“I...think he’s right. We have to make sure we don’t get spotted again.” Julia said agreeing with Aaron which in of itself was a miracle.

“I’m sorry but did you just agree with me?” Aaron asked.

“Yeah well don’t get used to it.” Julia relpied back with a middle finger.

“Enough...They obviously are following us so we can’t take the main way to the coast. We have to take an alternative route.” You said.

“What are you thinking?” Aaron asked.

“We can’t go through Arizona as planned. We should head northwest through Utah and then cut across Nevada. We approach California from that angle.” You said.

“You realize you are adding days to our trip then right?” Aaron replied.

“I know...but I think it’s the safest option.” You said back.

“Alright...Utah it is. Buckle up, I will hit the first rest area I can once it gets dark...” Aaron said as you guys hit the highway.

After about six hours in the road it was getting dark as Aaron pulled into an RV park to rest for the night.
1553322333333233311111111111211.title: Back on the road

15533223333332333111111111112111.content:
"And....there we go," Aaron said as he parked the car.

It was funny how fast everything seemed to go. You all were so focused on what just happened that time just went by in a flash. It truly felt like something out of a sci-fi movie. Alien slime, government agents, being on the run, etc. That last part felt truly unsettling. Aaron kept mumbling about not wanting being a fugitive on his record, to which Julia just hit his arm again. You really had little to add to it. You weren't sure what sounded worse between jail and being seen as some experiment due to your exposure already.

Julia seemed to notice your discomfort over the course of your trip, occasionally putting her hand on your shoulder as a silent gesture of support. It was small, but appreciated.

"Guess we should probably just hit the hey right now," Julia said. "We'll need all our strength for the next few days."

"True," Aaron said, leaning back in his chair. "Think one of us should stay up as a lookout?"

"I don't think we need to be that paranoid about it. We all need rest," you said, getting out of your seat. "Let's just trust we can all sleep well for now."

"Fair enough," said Aaron.

"Of course, this all means Jesse and I both need our privacy," said Julia, casting a knowing look at Aaron.

"You think I don't know that? What kind of guy do you think I am?" he grumbled the last part.

"The kind who already had a penchant for peeking," Julia smirked a little, which actually made you smile a little. It's true. Aaron really was too easy to tease. Some parts were exaggerated of course but it was still fun.

"Fine fine, I get it," he sighed.

Over the next little bit, you three all got ready for sleep. The only real difference being you had to get ready with Julia instead of Aaron. As you might have guessed, Aaron got straight to the point, asking all about the shopping trip. You replied as casually about it as you could, as it actually felt kind of nice. As you thought earlier, it was kind of like an adventure, and having supportive friends was helping it feel a lot easier to cope with. Of course, Aaron was happy to hear you were doing well, although he couldn't help himself by asking how big Julia's chest really was. You decided to not divulge that information. That was a secret, much to his chagrin.

"I get the feeling this is the start of you keeping a lot of things from me," he sighed.

"It's not all that different from the usual honestly. Only difference being I may have a couple more things about Julia to hide from you," you smiled.

Some casual ribbing aside, it seemed like things were relatively normal as you all got ready for bed. Though, against your notice, Julia seemed to be a little antsy. Aaron actually caught on to this, walking over to her while you were just getting into the nice sleep clothes you got at the mall.

"What is it?" she asked.

"You still want to do the "thing" with him?" he asked casually.

To say Julia was caught off-guard by what he said was an understatement, as her face went beat-red.

"W-What? What are you....?" she stammered a bit.

"Look I may have been in the dark about you being all hot and all....but even I could see that you liked Jesse," Aaron smirked, pointing to his head a little. "What was that you said? That my brain was the only thing I had going for me?"

"You know I meant that as a joke right?" Julia said, exasperated.

"True, but you probably weren't too far off the mark," Aaron shrugged, smile still evident. "But hey, go ahead. Jesse could probably use the comfort, and what guy doesn't dream of seeing two hot women do...."

That earned him another whack on the arm.

"Ouch! Sheesh, you know it was a joke right?" Aaron said, rubbing his arm a little.

"Your sense of humor needs work," Julia smirked. "You're a little too blunt sometimes."

"I think you mean all the time," Aaron smirked back before turning. "But....still I meant what I said. I know you want to. Probably should before things get too out of hand that we won't get any casual time."

Julia was honestly floored by all this. By Aaron having some idea to even being okay with it, even if the reason was slightly pervy. Still, the support was appreciated. Truth be told, he was on the money. She even had put on some of the sexy clothes she got underneath her top and pants just in case. It wasn't like she really planned it. It just kind of....happened...

"....Thanks Aaron..."

155332233333323333.title: Something else

1553322333333233331.content:
It all started with the doorbell. Harry pulled on his robe and walked up to the front door.

"I'm coming! I'm coming!" Harry shouted.

The doorbell rang again as he reached for the knob. Harry swung the door open, revealing that behind it was a tall woman and a short man.

"Yes?" Harry asked.

"My name is Andi Weathers, and this is my assistant Doug. May we come in?" the woman asked.

"What is this about?" Harry asked.

Andi's face quickly broke into a smile as Doug turned around and waved towards a van parked in the sidewalk in front of Harry's house.

"Congratulations! You're the lucky winner of our Extreme Makeover contest!" Andi exclaimed.

"I didn't enter any--" Harry was quickly cut off as Andi and Doug pushed their way into the house.

"Get ready for an unforgettable experience." Andi said, putting her arm around Harry, as Doug started peeking into the next room.

Doug nodded and touched his headset, whispering into it.

"I think you've made a mistake, I didn't enter any contest." Harry attempted to explain as a team of three people, two women and one man quickly rushed in the house and went into the living room, moving the coffee table to the side and putting down tarps.

Two large men carrying a salon chair quickly pushed past Harry and placed it in the center of the room.

"Listen to me! You've got the wrong--!" Harry was quickly pulled into the living room and sat into the chair. A bubbly blonde, one of the three, stood over him, holding a clipboard.

"Hi! I'm Cassie. I'll be overseeing the makeover. Let's see..." Cassie quickly grabbed Harry's hand and started to inspect it. "Ooh, you bite these, don't you? No worries, we can fix that."

Cassie waved as the other members of her team started to unpack boxes of various hair products and cosmetics. Harry tried to stand up from the chair but was pushed back down and his hands placed into two vats of wax placed on either side of him.

"What's going on?" Harry asked.

"Paraffin wax for smooth hands." Cassie said as she stared at Harry's face. "Coffee drinker too? This is definitely going to be extreme. Rhonda! You know what to do!"

A rotund woman with short black hair walked up, holding a small, white, foam-filled tray and shoved it into Harry's mouth.

"And don't speak or you could swallow the solution and we might have to call poison control." Rhonda curtly stated.

Harry was confused, but he also didn't want to poison himself, so he reluctantly sat still, looking around the room. Rhonda was unpacking items from a box and placing them on a small wheeled cart.

"All right, first things first, your..." Cassie started.

15533223333332333331.content:
Jethyea was a genie, or djinn, of the lamp, trapped and only able to interact with the outside world by granting the wishes of her many masters. Over her immortal lifespan, she had seen the very worst and best of humanity, some attempted to use their magic to help the world, while others attempted to gain power and glory for only themselves. The latter far outweighed the former, in Jethyea's case. However, it had been ages since she had a master, and being alone with your own thoughts for that long is bound to drive anyone mad, especially a genie. Hence, Jethyea promised herself that whenever she was released next, she'd do what so many other magical creatures did, trick her master by turning their own wish against them. And it just so happened that she was due to be released rather soon...

Thrift shops, garage sales, antique stores, they were all good places to find bargains on old stuff. Stanley Aldin was an amateur archaeologist, but without tombs to raid or temples to excavate, he was left to frequent stores and flea markets for his artifacts. He was building up quite a collection, a few old books here, a vase there, and he was learning a lot about history. At this particular thrift store however, he found himself gravitating towards a set of kitchenware items strewn about on a shelf.

"Old pots and pans, a rusty spatula... hey, look at that!" Stanley exclaimed, pushing the kitchenware aside to grab a gleaming gold oil lamp. He critiqued it with his eyes. "Probably from ancient Arabia... or a reconstruction... but it does look and feel like real gold..."

Stanley ruminated for another moment.

"Regardless, it's coming home with me." Stanley decided.

He paid for it and quickly took it home, finding the perfect place to put it on his shelf.

"I'll do some more research into you in the morning. Though I should be careful I don't accidentally rub it." Stanley joked as he went to adjust it slightly, moving his fingers across the handle.

The lamp began to shake and smoke began billowing from the spout as Jethyea emerged in a cloud of smoke from the lamp. Stanley wasn't really expecting a genie, but she looked about what he would have expected. Light red, almost pink skin, a traditional hairstyle with the long top knot ponytail, and a harem outfit. Her face was almost sculpted, and too perfect to be human. If she was, she'd be one of the most gorgeous women on the planet.

"Hello Master. I am Jethyea, the genie of this lamp, and by magical law, I am bound to grant you three wishes!" Jethyea exclaimed.

"Wha-who... this is remarkable!" Stanley exclaimed.

Jethyea was not impressed with her new master in the slighest. Despite being an amateur archaeologist, he hardly looked like Indiana Jones. Well, in fact, he looked like Indiana Jones, but only if he spent all his time at the college teaching classes instead of globetrotting. She couldn't wait to sabotage his wish.

"So, what is it that you desire? Money? Power? I can grant it all!" Jethyea giggled.

"What do I wish for..." Stanley asked himself. "I know that genies can be tricky, so it has to be good..."
15533223333332333331.title: Be Careful What You Wish For

choices: Stanley is now an exotic dancer
Stanley is now a hot female teacher
155332233333323333313.content:
Stanley looked at the Magically genie standing before him as his mind began to race with possibilities. However caution also warned him. He wasn’t sure exactly how this whole wish thing even worked.

“So...what kind of genie are you? The single wish kind? The three wish kind? Unlimited wishes? How does this whole thing work?” He asked.

“I’m glad you asked master. It’s quite simple you get ONE wish. That’s it, one, plain and simple. The only rule is simple. There is no take backs. Whatever you get you get. So keep that in mind.” Jethyea said as she looked to her nails.

“Alright...it’s got to be a life changing wish. However nothing too selfish. Wealth or power, greed can destroy people....Hmm..” Stanley thought to himself.

“I know...I want to be popular. I want everyone to love me for I do. When others see me they get excited. I want to love what I do, and for others to love me for it.” Stanley said thinking this was a great compromise wish. He could be happy but also make others happy as well.

“Is this your official wish master? I need to hear the magic words.” The genie said.

“Alright...I WISH...That I was popular, that people loved me for my work, which I am great at, and that I loved it too.” Stanley wished.

The genie gave him an almost delish smile...

“Your wish is my command master.” She said clapping her hands together as a cloud of dark purple smoke began to swirl around her as it enveloped Stanley and everything around him until the world suddenly faded to black...

How does the Genie mess up this wish?
155332233333323333313.title: A new Wish

choices: Stanley tried to adapt to this life
1553322333333233333131.content:
The darkness faded. Light crept into the windows as Stanley woke up slowly. He immediately felt something different. The bed he was in felt much nicer. Soft silk sheets, that were a deep red color.

Opening his eyes Stanley looked around and saw a very different apartment from the one he was used to. This one looked like it belonged to some one who could afford to have their place professionally decorated.

It was sleek modern look with brand new appliances, stylish furniture, and a really slick look.

Stepping out of bed Stanley almost tripped and fell over as a large and unfamiliar weight was tugging at his chest...

Catching himself Stanley rushed over to a large mirror on the wall and gasped at his...or rather...her reflection.

There was a woman staring back at him. Not just any woman either, but a total knock out!

She had fiery red hair was that perfectly straight and went down to her waist. Her skin was silky soft and light bronzed color showing she had a nice tan.

She had two very large breasts. 36DD from the look of them from the bras he found in the drawers. They were also very soft but perky with little to no sag.

She had amazing hourglass curves with a large bubble butt. Her legs were very long and she was rather tall for a woman standing around 5’9.

“Oh my god I’m a woman!” Stanley called out in his new feminine voice.

This didn’t make any sense to him. He didn’t wish for this, why is he a woman now?

Looking around for clues Stanley saw a large poster hanging up on the wall with his...or her picture on it.

Tales of Love and Romance. The exotic forbidden tale of love comes to life with the amazing Stephanie Scarlet playing Vivian Cinder. Maxwell Thompson stars opposite as Lawrence Richards. Come see now! Tickets online!

The poster was for some kind of live action play. The image on the front was of the woman he now was in a beautiful red dress dancing with a handsome man under a spotlight.

It was then that things started to make since. Popular...loved for what he does and loves doing it...The genie had twisted his wish and made him a beautiful stage actress...
1553322333333233333131.title: Stanley is now an exotic dancer

15533223333332333333.content: Pretty little lies- A thief finally makes his move on a home whose sole occupant is a lonely housewife with a husband constantly traveling on business, once she leaves for a vacation. He successfully sneaks in, but must disguise as her when someone comes to investigate.
15533223333332333333.title: Something else

choices: Let’s go! You know where she hid the front door key.
155332233333323333331.content:
Mary Thomas. Age 30. No children. Married to one George Thomas, age 32. Home address, 317 Maple Suites. Husband was a business consultant for several companies. As such, the wife didn’t have to work.

You’d scoped this place out for months. You knew Mary’s schedule front to back, and had waited for the opportunity to get into that two story suburb house and finally score a haul big enough to move on up in the world.

It finally happened. You heard her chatting with a friend at the mall.

“Oh, I don’t think I can do it. You know what? Maybe I should take a vacation. Go on a cruise or something...”

Bingo! This was it!

The day came and as you watched her fancy car drive away you couldn’t help grinning to yourself. Finally! No more crummy day job!

Just you and the break in that will change everything!
155332233333323333331.title: Pretty Little Lies

choices: Head to the bathroom before starting
1553322333333233333311.content:
You slink up to the house, using the hedges as cover. Moving quickly, you creep to the edge of the wall. You brush your blond hair that had fallen out of your ponytail back behind your ear and take a deep breath. You look back and forth but see nobody watching you.

Moving quickly, you dash to the porch, swiping the key from under the second step. You unlock the door in a matter of seconds and, suddenly, you did it! You’re inside!
1553322333333233333311.title: Let’s go! You know where she hid the front do...

choices: Before you can search anymore, a knock at the door
15533223333332333333112.content:
Mary had constantly taken off her jewelry in the upstairs restroom (no of course you couldn’t see in there but, if she wore a fancy necklace or earrings, they were on before she went in and off when she came out) so maybe that was where you’d find some expensive stuff!

Much to your dismay, it seemed she had taken most of her jewelry with her, as only a pair of golden hoop earrings sat on the sink as well as an admittedly nice bracelet.

“Hey gotta start somewhere...” you muse, slipping the bracelet onto your wrist (gotta keep your hands free after all) and put the earrings in your pocket.

Not much else was in the bathroom, save some spare cosmetics, lotions, and razors, but hey it wasn’t a total wash. You reminded yourself to grab the makeup when you left. Back when you had a girlfriend, you learned just how EXPENSIVE makeup could get.
15533223333332333333112.title: Head to the bathroom before starting

choices: At the front door is a young man around your actual age
Whoever it was seems to be gone...
155332233333323333331121.content:
You start rummaging around in the bedroom when a sound that chills you to your spine rings out.

A knock at the front door!

You panic, freezing in place. The knocking continues, a little more urgent.

Someone must have seen you! What could you do? If you didn’t answer the door, then the police would surely be called.

You keep panicking until you remember something. Mary had blonde hair, just like you. Maybe...they had thought you might be her? Her car WAS missing from the driveway...

You cautiously approached the door. Listening carefully, you can hear a voice just on the other side, a man’s voice. “-iss Thomas? Miss Thomas is that you?”

Miss Thomas? Well no time to worry about that, you had your window!

“Hold on, I’m not decent!” You shout in a feminine tone. The knocking stops.

Did...did they buy it?

Regardless, you have no time to waste! You hurry back upstairs and step in front of her bedroom mirror.

Your 24 year old body was rather slender and you were fairly close in height, although you were maybe two inches taller at most...maybe you could pull this off...

Thinking quickly, you untie your ponytail and trade out your stud earrings for the hoops. You quickly strip down and open up her closet.

You pull out a matching pale blue bra and panties, pulling them on and tucking away your member. Your legs don’t have hardly any hair and their being blond mad them practically invisible.

A dress was still completely unnecessary. You pull out a pair of her jeans and slide into them. They hug and shape your legs femininely and some padding at the top helps give the illusion of hips and a woman’s butt. A sleeveless blouse completed the look but it wasn’t until you had slipped into a pair of sandals that you realized it was just too short to tuck into the jeans so the tip of your midriff stayed exposed.

You looked into the mirror. Not bad...but would it fool whoever that was downstairs?

You decide to at least wear a little makeup to complete the ruse. You remember what you’ve seen girls do over the years and manage to put on foundation, eyeliner, mascara, and some glossy pink lipstick.

Mussing your hair into s feminine style over one eye, you take a deep breath and go downstairs.
155332233333323333331121.title: Before you can search anymore, a knock at the door

choices: He’s there to repair something of Mary’s
He’s there to be intimate, unaware you aren’t really Mary
1553322333333233333311211.content:
Adjusting the decent bust her bra had given you, you ready yourself before opening the door, smiling in a way you hoped seemed earnest.

The man seemed nervous, a young man with glasses and short hair who kept trying to smile through his nerves “O-oh! Miss...Thomas?”

Miss again? Oh well no problem here...

You smiled, nodding as you tucked some hair behind your ear. “Uh-huh...that’s me.” Your falsetto seemed to be convincing. “Can I...help you?”

The man blushed as you saw his gaze wash over you, utterly fooled by your disguise.

“I-I’m Finn and I’m-“
1553322333333233333311211.title: At the front door is a young man around your ac...

choices: Let Finn lead the conversation since you don’t know what he wants
15533223333332333333112112.content:
“I...um...I got your message. May I come in?”

You pause for a second. Why would Mary have been expecting company the day she was leaving for vacation?

What you could never have possibly known was that Mary...had been tempted to cheat on her always gone husband. She set up an online hookup but her conscience caught up to her.

Instead Mary decided a nice vacation to the beach would be best to deal with her loneliness. She was going to treat herself to something nice rather than betray her love.

After all, she did really love him. It had just been a moment of weakness. So instead she planned a trip and set out...unaware that the one thing she had neglected to remember was to cancel her online fling.

You, however, know none of this. Was he a repair man? An online acquaintance meeting her for the first time? A consultant?

Regardless, turning away someone who was supposed to meet Mary today would only rouse suspension.

You smile and take a step back holding the door open for Finn. Your clothes cast a sexy silhouette, as you allow Finn inside before closing the door.
15533223333332333333112112.title: He’s there to be intimate, unaware you aren'...

choices: Finn decides to be a little bold
155332233333323333331121121.content:
“Well, Finn...can I get you something to drink?” You ask, trying to hide the nervousness building inside you as you make your way into the kitchen.

You crack open the refrigerator. So much food...maybe you could make something expensive to eat after this guy left before you got back to “work”.

You leaned in, pushing some things aside as you both searched for something for Finn, but also yourself later...

The sight of Mary leaned over into the fridge, her butt clearly on display for him was almost more than Finn could handle. This was his first time doing an actual meet up using the app, so the sight of Miss Thomas actually sending signals his way was both exciting and making him a little nervous... especially the sight of that bit of skin around her hips left exposed by her top...
155332233333323333331121121.title: Offer him a drink
